story:
Please read the reviews and if you would like to order Amp.i.Am then visit our campaign for Super Buoy as it is offered as part of the perks and it would ship shortly after the campaign ends. https://igg.me/at/SuperBuoy/x/13354964
Small.  Powerful.  Feather light.   Stylish.   Battery-free!

 

Meet Amp.i.Am

Digital-to-Analogue Converter and Amplifier that is small, light, battery free and connects to your headphones in seconds via Lightning port and makes any headphones sound amazing with clearer, louder, richer-sounding music and superior bass.

Many of us have come to rely on our phones as our primary listening devices, they hold thousands of songs and they are easy to use but cramming so many features into one device comes at a cost and that cost is sound quality.

Listening to music on a smart phone sounds a bit flat, doesn't quite have the edge or the impact you would expect? Try to drive a high-end pair of headphones with your phone’s built-in Digital-to-Analogue Converter and Amplifier (DAC & Amp), and things get even less optimal.

 

If you are a music lover then your phone just isn’t delivering the quality of sound that you could have. That's because your phone has been designed as a phone and not an audio playback device. Cheap parts in your phone mean you just aren't getting the sound you deserve, so we have poured years of audio expertise into a new high quality DAC and amplifier. 

We believe the pleasure gained from listening to music is priceless. HiFi amplifiers for headphones are pricy, bulky and need a lot of power.

With the newest iPhone 7, Apple killed the headphone jack.

While Apple will ship with the iPhone 7 an adaptor so you can plug your existing headphones into the Lightning cable. This is simply an adapter that does noting to improve the iPhone sound quality.

 

With Apple adapter, you are still using the iPhone’s built-in DAC/Amp (Digital-to-Analogue Converter and Amplifier), which does not deliver the quality sound you would expect because the iPhone's Amp & DAC is not designed for optimal quality to keep size and cost down. 

Amp.i.Am on the other hand is not just an adapter, It’s a tiny DAC & Amplifier which can produce the kind of premium quality audio that you expect from hi-end audio equipment used by audiophiles and sound producers. And with Amp.i.Am you can now use your favourite 3.5mm audio jack headphones and get amazing quality sound because you bypass the iPhone builtin DAC & Amp and use the DAC & Amp in Amp.i.Am for clearer, louder, richer-sounding music with a superior bass.

Amp.i.Am: The World's Lightest Battery-free Micro Headphone DAC & Amplifier for your iPhone, iPad and iPod devices using Apple Official C68eX2 Audio Lightning Adapter.

It is easy to setup Amp.i.Am. Just plug the MFi-Certified lightning connector into your iPhone, iPad or iPod then plug your headphone jack into Amp.i.Am. That’s it. That simple and now you can listen to amazing quality music the way the artist intended.​

 

​

Amp.i.Am is a link between your i-Device such as your iPhone, iPad or iPod and your headphones. While some people carry around bulky external USB DACs and amplifiers to improve the audio quality of their mobile devices. What we managed to do was to compact all that power and design the right architecture and components all onto a tiny Printed Circuit Board that fits into Amp.i.Am tiny control box. Don’t be fooled by its size, it comes with amazing results!

While we have taken every effort to test the compatibility of Amp.i.Am with many headphones, we cannot guarantee compatibility with every headphone set out in the universe. There are simply too many to test with and we are sure there will be several headphones that Amp.i.Am cannot fully support including but not limited to performance, controls or amplification. We guarantee compatibility and performance with Apple supplied wired headphones with the 3.5mm audio jack.

Small, Portable inline headphone DAC and Amplifier designed to take the digital files from your iPhone, iPad or iPod and provide significantly improved headphone sound quality and experience. It is small and light and will become part of your headphone cables. It does not have a battery and requires no charging and once you plug it in, you will hear a significant improvement to the quality of the music.

Amp.i.Am is for everyone. It works with all headphones on the market. If you use expensive headphones, you’ll know that they need a more powerful amp to work well and if you’re like me and use those standard white earbuds that come with your iPhone, you’ll be glad to know that Amp.i.Am improves sound quality on cheaper headphones as well by utilising bit-matching technology to deliver a louder bass sound with balance and clarity and far less distortion.  Amp.i.Am is fully compatible with your earphones, and you can use that mic to control media or take calls. It is Light, small, battery-free, affordable and makes music on any headphones sound amazing.

No Headphone Jack? No Problem! With Amp.i.Am you are ready for the iPhone 7 and beyond and can be used with any iPhone, iPad or iPod with an 8-pin Lightning connector!

       Amp. i. Am: Amplifier for i-Devices that makes music sound Amazing!

 

 

Whatever you're doing, jogging, on your way to work, or just chillaxing, anytime, anywhere; with Amp.i.Am you now can enjoy an exquisite listening experience; studio-quality music that is clearer, richer and crisper the way the artist intended.


See what people say...

Your Favourite Headphones Companion for Perfect Sounding Music

 

Your listening experience reinvented. Live concerts on the go. Powerful. Feather light. Stylish. And battery-free!

The high quality components in Amp.i.Am will give your music a greater sense of space, enabling you to hear more clearly the separate instruments, voices and melodies. Detail is greater, so the subtle nuances in vocal intonation or the way a note is played can be heard more easily.
Grip on the lower frequencies will also be better, so bass notes should sound more tuneful, driving their own rhythm, rather than just being heavy and loud. All of this leads to a more emotionally engaging, and therefore enjoyable experience. 

Music is an emotional experience; it triggers emotions in us that makes us happy, smile or even to get up and dance; and when it comes to music, most of us have come to rely on our phones as a primary listening devices; they hold thousands of songs and they are easy to use but cramming so many features into one device comes at a cost and that cost is sound quality.

 

 

 

 

 

With Amp.i.Am, listening to the music simply becomes more fun.

 

With Amp.i.Am your emotional experience will be so enhanced that you will go WOW the moment you have it plugged in. 

 

FULL, CRISP, CLEAR, STURDY, ACCURATE, OPEN, RICH are some of the few adjectives that came out of those who tried Amp.i.Am Prototype.

 

 

 

 

The Digital to Analogue Converter delivers an optical sampling rate of 24bit at 48 to 192KHz and coupled with a high-performance headphone amplifier, it makes your favorite headphones sound their best and all within an extremely portable form factor that is designed to feel like part of your headphone cable.

Who we are?

 

Magtunes is a small company based out of Sydney and was founded by a 3 passionate individuals from the worlds of business and technology. At Magtunes, we are on a mission to make premium audio products accessible to everyone. Premium audio products at affordable prices and achieve a perfect balance between size, price and acoustics. We are small but fearless trio that think outside the square and love challenging the status quo.

In recent months we launched Lumiére followed by Buoy and BigBuoy, As you can see from both campaigns, we delivered 3 great products as described with high quality craftsmanship on time.

We are hoping that the Magtunes design philosophy would continue to resonate with & be validated by the IGG community.

 

Risks and challenges

We’ve worked hard over the last few months to get the Amp.i.Am to this point and we've successfully completed critical milestones with the help of many knowledgeable people. We have interviewed, visited and selected a very reputable manufacturer who offers great engineering support and development tools. What remains is completing the manufacturing phase and so we're confident that manufacturing risk is at a minimum.

We anticipate a manufacturing period of 2 months from the end of the campaign to start shipping Amp.i.Am to you. This is possible because we’ve already completed our R&D, obtained our Apple MFi certification and the rest we can complete with your help and have Amp.i.Am shipped to you 10 weeks after the end of this campaign and in time for the holidays and with you no later than December 15.

While we have taken every effort to test the compatibility of Amp.i.Am with many headphones, we cannot guarantee compatibility with every headphone set out in the universe. There are simply too many to test with and we are sure there will be several headphones that Amp.i.Am cannot fully support including but not limited to performance, controls or amplification. We guarantee compatibility and performance with Apple supplied wired headphones with the 3.5mm audio jack.

 

FAQ

Does Amp.i.Am improve sound quality with a mediocre pair of headphones?
To deliver detailed and delicate sound to headphones requires many things. An amplifier is one of them. The purpose of AMP.I.AM  is to enhance the sound source by using hi-fi codec to make a difference in your overall listening experience. 

Does AMP.I.AM  support Windows or Android Phones?
No. Amp.i.Am is strictly for i-devices such as the iPhone, iPad or iPod touch with a Lightning connector.

So this AMP.I.AM  thing can't be plugged into the headphone jack? 
That's right. AMP.I.AM  can only be connected to Lightning

Does AMP.I.AM  consume a lot of power then?
Take iPhone 6 as an example, an hour of music playing consumes 5% power. 

Can I use a Lightning to 30-pin adapter to make it fit on iPhone 4S? 
Sorry. The Audio Lightning Adapter does not support an adapter

Will you consider making a Bluetooth version?
We'd not consider a Bluetooth version before finding an effective solution to improve the sound quality of compressed files

Is Amp.i.Am compatible with all headphones?
No. While we have taken every effort to test the compatibility of Amp.i.Am with many headphones, we cannot guarantee compatibility with every headphone set out in the universe. There are simply too many to test with and we are sure there will be several headphones that Amp.i.Am cannot fully support including but not limited to performance, controls or amplification. We guarantee compatibility and performance with Apple supplied wired headphones with the 3.5mm audio jack.

It is just for headphones or could I use it with loudspeakers too?
Amp.i.Am  can also connect to active speakers

Will there be a type-C version?
We don't have plans to develop type-c models for now

Can I still receive phone calls with my ear buds mic?
You can still receive calls and the inline mic of your earbuds would function correctly

Besides iPhones, does it work with iPads, iPod Touch, and iPod nano?AMP.I.AM  works with iOS devices that support USB audio. So only iPhones, iPads, and iPod touch with Lightning. Not compatible with iPod nano

How do I give you my address / choice of color / combination?
We'll send you a survey to confirm your choice of color/ combination and address after the project's successfully funded.

Have a question we have not addressed? Drop us a line. team@magtunes.com.au

story:
Audeqs are designed to deliver consistent, high quality audio streaming  along with features including active noise cancellation, ambient sound control, adaptive equalizers, 9mm Graphene drivers and customizable skins.

Audeqs are equipped with adaptive sound technology to give you the best audio experience with any type of music due to its active equalizers which automatically set Bass, Mid, and Treble depending on the genre of the music playing.

 

Smart Pass-Through Audio Technology lets you hear important sounds, like the horn of a vehicle while you’re on your morning jog.

Audeqs come fitted with one of the highest performing batteries in the industry today, designed with durability and flexibility. Your devices will be fully charged in less than 70 minutes with a play 10 hrs play time (8hrs with ANC on) and 60 hours of play time with the charging case, you can take your devices on-the-go without worrying about their dependability.

Audeqs are conveniently charged in a portable charging case that can be charged wirelessly or with a USB-C fast charging cable allowing the device to be more adaptable, functional and universal.

 

Audeqs sleek and lightweight design helps you look stylish without compromising your comfort, and with a variety of skins to choose from.

Comparison

 

 

 

 

Nathan, our CTO along with Jason (Acoustic Engineer) and Derrick (Test Engineer) have worked for organizations including Samsung and Panasonic creating high end audio products. They have over 10 years of experience in Audio system design for ipods & laptop speakers & design consulting for webcams, and speakerphones.

We believe in delivering the best audio devices that not only sound right but also are equipped with the latest technology to deliver the best user experience. Further more Audeqs are owned by Magnifitech Solutions Inc. that have an official SLA with Qualcomm for Audio Bluetooth Products.

For any questions or comments, please contact info@audeqs.com

story:
Introducing the 6" Sonic Blocks with WiFi & Bluetooth 


The World's First Modular Wireless Music EcoSystem!


Introducing  the world's first high fidelity wireless sound system that puts you in charge of your sound. Sonic Blocks is a unique, high tech music ecosystem that allows you to enjoy your music one on one or throughout your home — and beyond, with incredible fidelity, and complete customization. Sonic Blocks are audio system building blocks, portable, powerful, and  flexible. Swap components, connect multiple units, and tweak the sound in endless ways.


Yep, it's a completely reconfigurable music system that let's you change out speakers, panels, lights, or expand the the number of units to your individual needs. Just like the days of playing with Lego's, Sonic Blocks created multiple size blocks that can all be connected together to expand and grow your system.

System Features

Sonic Blocks are much more than another wireless, portable speaker. Our concept is much broader and is a completely unique approach to system design, customization, and ease of use. Start with the basics — great sound, connectivity, portability — and add unsurpassed ease of use and limitless expansion options.


Our modular approach means that you can upgrade individual speakers, add additional components, or expand your system throughout your house or apartment — even take your Sonic Blocks on the road.


The Sonic Blocks System

We live in a world of customization and personalization. Don't settle for a one size fits all audio experience! Sonic Blocks are the world's first modular wireless audio system where you can “control your sound” by swapping out or adding additional modules, speakers, and other accessories.

Customize your Sonic Blocks as a home theater or office music system.

Lighting Features

Every face of your Sonic Blocks has a built-in lighting element.  From your app you can program the colors and patterns, and light up individual faces of your blocks. Great  for entertaining; set your blocks to pulse with your music. Your lights are also part of your visual indicator system. With a quick glance, you can determine your battery power, WiFi strenghth, control the volume, incoming call indicator, email notifications, and so much more. 





Exploded Blocks

Don't worry, you don't need to assemble all this yourself.  We just wanted to give you a peek at all the parts and pieces that make up your Sonic Blocks.  The good news is that each section is a separate assembly that snaps on and off, so you can remove and replace them any time you want, or expand and grow your system at your own pace. 

Press
“The concept is potentially revolutionary concept, given its flexible approach and one of the most interesting ideas to come from the audio sector in years.”

“Sonic Blocks picked up on the modular trend to create customizable speakers.”

“Build the Frankensteinian speaker you’ve always dreamed of with Sonic Blocks!”

“The Sonic Blocks ecosystem is a unique entry in the wireless speaker sector...”

“Legos for listening to music, you’re going to love it!”



The Modular Approach

Sonic Blocks has a huge advantage over other wireless music systems — a modular approach. Imagine having multiple units providing surround sound for your home theater.  Our modular approach means that you can upgrade individual speakers, add additional components, or expand your system throughout your house or apartment — even take your Sonic Blocks on the road.


The Brain

The Sonic Blocks brain is a marvel of flexibility, capability, and elegant design that serves as the central input and output node for your music system.


The App


Use the Sonic Blocks App to setuo your system, access your local and online music libraries, control the individual DSP engines for exacting timbral adjustments, and distribute audio through your home network.



Timeline

It was an original idea of Jordan Wilker that triggered the amazing development of Sonic Blocks starting in 2014. We've done our homework, worked out the bugs, and are ready to bring this unique system to you...our backers.

Patents

Sonic Blocks is extremely pleased to have been granted patent protection on our unique products.

 

The Making Of

It's been a long, arduous path from initial concept to working prototype. JD's desire to allow user customization in a music system has resulted in a unique product.

 

Technical Specifications

Sonic Blocks deliver great sound by incorporating cutting-edge technologies, optimizing individual components, and adopting a rigorous testing and evaluation process. You won't find a better sounding wireless speaker system.


Features Expanded


WiFi Wireless connectivity: Most wireless speakers use Bluetooth to receive music from a server or SmartPhone and the fidelity of your music suffers as a result. Bluetooth is a "lossy" process meaning not all of the original music is delivered to your speakers. Sonic Blocks uses WiFi (802.11n) to provide "lossless" high fidelity sound. When circumstances require the use of Bluetooth, Sonic Blocks can still deliver great fidelity.

Custom Speaker Selection and Configuration: Identify, mix, and match different speakers on your Sonic Blocks system. You can quickly and easily swap tweeters, midrange drivers, and woofers…no technical expertise or tools are required. Sonic Blocks is a completely flexible music delivery ecosystem — the first of its kind! Tailor the sound of your playback system to your own personal preferences. Listen to your favorite music the way you want.

Powerful amplification: At the heart of each Sonic Blocks unit is a Play-Fi® full fidelity Dual Class D digital amplifier capable of outputting a booming 90 dB+ SPL (Sound Pressure Level). That's enough power to meet any requirement.


The Team

Sonic Blocks is a family operation The original concept grew out of an idea that Jordan Wilker had while he was still in high school. However, it was his father's background in product development that spurred the project forward. The family is the heart of the operation but Scott has gathered a very talented group of people around him. The advisory board and university connections combine to create an ideal synergy that assures the success of Sonic Blocks.

The Advisory Board

University Partnerships & Interns

Project Management


Paying It Forward


BENEFITS CORPORATION: Sonic Blocks is a Benefits Corporation. We chose this business organization option because we strongly believe that out company has an obligation to society at large in addition to our investors. We "pay it forward" by donating a percentage of our profits to organization and non-profits dedicated to supporting the health and welfare of children. CASA (Court Appointed Special Advocates) is among the first groups that we support.

CERTIFIED STARTUP NEW YORK COMPANY: Sonic Blocks was one of only 41 emerging companies awarded Startup NY Certification by New York Governor Cuomo in July of 2014. Based at Binghamton University, the company receives numerous benefits from this special certification including: 10 years of tax free operations and company employees can earn up to $300,000 without paying state and local taxes (based on filing status).

NEXT-GEN ENTREPRENEUR OUTREACH: As a Startup NY organization, Sonic Blocks was granted unprecedented access to the resources of Binghamton University, as well as the Science & Technology Law Center at Syracuse University. The company engaged with the Office of Entrepreneurship & Innovation Partnerships, staff, faculty, labs, law students, and over a dozen student entrepreneurs in multiple fields of study.

WOMEN IN TECHNOLOGY: Sonic Blocks supports the fight for gender equality. All women deserve equal pay for equal work, equal treatment, equal influence over the company's development, and the opportunity for advancement, ultimately leading to greater financial independence. Let us know your skill sets. We are hiring engineers (EE-ME-SW), industrial designers, social media experts, and more.

MADE IN AMERICA: We are committed to manufacturing Sonic Blocks in the US. We feel strongly about putting people back to work in this country in the manufacturing sector. The challenge is finding at least 50% of our parts that are made domestically and we must incur 75% of our total costs in the USA in order to achieve this designation. If not, we will strive for Made in USA of foreign parts, or Assembled in the USA. Let us know if you can help.

CASA: Court Appointed Special Advocates (CASA) are extensively trained volunteers, assigned by a Family Court Judge, that advocate for the best interests of children who have been removed from their homes due to abuse and/or neglect through no fault of their own. CASA's navigate within a severely overburdened and broken system ensuring every assigned child receives the services they so desperately need.


 In advance of the campaign, we have engaged with numerous best in class manufacturing operations, with our desire to keep all production within the USA for greater hands-on quality control and just-in-time modifications. Additionally, we are working with one of the world’s largest component part supplier, and they are assisting with contract manufacturing operations.  One of the larger US based surface mount technology equipment suppliers has also offered their services in support of our operations, should we wish to stand-up our own manufacturing.  We are prepared to drive scalable volume regardless of the success of our campaign.

FAQs

Q:     Can I buy just one Sonic Blocks Starter Kit or do I need to buy the entire system?

A:    You can buy one Sonic Blocks Starter Kit, or you can buy several and build up your own customized system.  The Sonic Blocks music system is expandable, and allows you to build your customized Sonic Blocks over time, and your system is works in conjunction with any other DTS Play-Fi enabled system. 

Q:  Can my Sonic Blocks handle Multi-zone Streaming?

A: Sonic Blocks with Play-Fi supports streaming different audio to different rooms or zones, directly from your Play-Fi app.  So, for example, you can send Songza downstairs for a dinner party, and keep Radio Disney playing upstairs for the kids.

Q:     What’s the maximum # of rooms or zones supported by the Sonic Blocks system?

A:    We recommend connecting a maximum of 16 Play-Fi products to your home network.

Q: Do the Sonic Blocks products support AirPlay streaming?

A: Play-Fi products allow for AirPlay integration, currently we are working on getting those licenses!

Q: Can I stream Spotify in multiple rooms?

A: Yes, all you need is to create a Spotify Group within the Play-Fi app.

Q: How Flexible is the Music Aspects of the Sonic Blocks System?

A: In addition to supporting the open Play-Fi platform, it is compatible with open file systems such as WV, FLAC, AIFF, and iOS products.  Additionally, we support Pandora, SiriusXM, Deezer, QQ Music, and KK Box, and a number of internet radio stations, and HD Radio Channels. 

Q:     Do I need a router with my Sonic Blocks system?

A:     In order to utilize the Wi-Fi connectivity of your system – especially for wireless distribution of HD files, you will need a router.  If your router is more than a few years old, we strongly recommend that you consider upgrading to a new model that is compatible with 802.11n  Wireless-N, or 802.11ac.

Q:     Will Sonic Blocks work with Wi-Fi range extenders and repeaters?

A:     Yes. To get optimal performance, ensure that the DHCP server is properly configured, and that each extender/repeater is set up as an access point that does not overlap with the Wi-Fi channel.

Q:    What sound quality can you expect from your Sonic Blocks system playback?

A:    Sonic Blocks features a lossless transmission of all audio files up to a 48k/16 (DVD quality).  The system also manages high resolution music up to 192k/24.  Sonic Blocks also supports both FLAC and WAV files, and all are controlled via the mobile application for both Android and iOS.

Q:    Can networked music be managed from the Sonic Blocks App or does it require a computer client to configure?
A:    Networked music is managed from the App.

Q:    When using a PC, can the Sonic Blocks system support any audio file format and anything that can be played by the Windows OS?
A:    Yes. Via the Sonic Blocks Windows app (Play-Fi Active), the Sonic Blocks products will play any file capable of being played by the Windows operating system and HD Audio.

Q: Can I connect my Sonic Blocks to my TV?

A: Yes. Sonic Blocks come equipped with a 3.5mm stereo input. Most TV have either an analog RCA output or a 3.5mm output, allowing for two channel stereo playback.

Q:     If I have HD Audio (96/24, 192/24) files on my smart device or home network, will the Sonic Blocks system play and distribute these files?

A:    Sonic Blocks will play HD Audio at up to 48/16. 192/24 is not supported at this time. 96/24 files will be down sampled and played at 48/16 resolution. 

Q:    Can I setup my Sonic Blocks as a Stereo Pair?

A:    Play-Fi allows you to configure two speakers into a stereo pair by selecting one to play Left channel audio, and the other to play Right channel audio.  Play-Fi will then synchronize the audio into a single stereo stream, wirelessly.

Q:    What is the Warranty?

A:    We provide a one (1) year limited warranty. We guarantee you receive your Sonic Blocks Product free of manufacturing defects, or we will repair or replace your Sonic Blocks at our cost.

Q:    Can I change or cancel my perk?

A:    Indiegogo has now made it easier than ever to upgrade your perks. You can now do so on the contributions tab of your Indiegogo profile. Indiegogo policy dictates that campaign owners have no ability to adjust perk selections nor are we obliged to cancel or refund a perk. Such requests will be handled on a case-by-case basis. 

Q:    How much is shipping and handling?

A:    Shipping, handling, packaging and fulfillment costs  are included for standard shipments for Domestic United States destinations and most of Canada.  All other shipment costs  are identified with each perk, and don’t  include VAT, or any other customs preparation or costs. P.O. Box shipment costs are not included.


Why Are We Crowdfunding?

JD and I quickly realized that our product was intended for those of you that think for yourselves, desire greater control over your own music environment, and don’t want others dictating to you what or how you should consume your entertainment. Sonic Blocks is very much a "Want" product, but your patronage allows us to do so much more, and helps supports our charities related to the health and welfare of kids, and that is a real "Need". So instead of allowing the investment community to control the introduction of the product, we took on the risk of financing 100% of the startup costs ourselves, and put it all on the line. Now we are ready to introduce you to Sonic Blocks, and hope that you will help us take the product to the next level. We fully expect that you will tell us the good, bad, and ugly of what we are offering, and what we should do to make it better for you. You will help guide our development, and in turn, we will dedicate our teams to bringing you products and accessories that you "Want", in the hopes that you will be using our products for generations to come, and we can help some kids that are in serious need. We hope you agree.


Risks

Having worked in the consumer electronics and product development field conceptualizing and producing new products from scratch for the past twenty years, we have a high degree of confidence in our ability to deliver this product.

As inventors, we have to focus on the details, and putting together a talented team representing all of the engineering disciplines that go into our Sonic Blocks.  Even though we are utilizing and incorporating many existing technologies, we are doing so in ways never before done in the consumer electronics industry.  This alone brings an element of risk to our project, as consolidation and implementation of anything new requires vigilante testing and careful modifications.  Given that we have many interdependent elements in our system, a change in any one area can potentially impact other areas.  We strive to balance modifications, against functionality, and the best user experience.  Risk examples include changes or modifications to our printed circuit board production (PCB), any delays from our module supplier, battery producers, injection molding companies, speaker driver production companies, and the impact of any of these elements on the mobile application development.  Turn times run differently with each of these parts.  However, we aim to mitigate any potential delays via domestic manufacturing and assembly.


Thank You For Your Support!

It gives us great joy to be able to share Sonic Blocks with you, and we are really excited to receive your feedback and suggestions.  We designed the product for you, and to allow you to control your sound like never before. Let us know what accessories you would like us to develop for your Sonic Blocks next.  We are already starting to work on lighting, cameras, and projector concepts that you can plug into your blocks. Once the first campaign is successful, and the initial products are in your hands, we will be assembling a great development team to keep up with demand and the great ideas for new products that we expect to come from you in the User community.

Also, if you have talents that you think would be of help to Sonic Blocks, be it electrical or mechanical engineering, prototyping, social and digital media, graphic design, programming, mobile applications, eCommerce, distribution, international sales, etc. drop us a line.  We are looking for great people to join the Sonic Blocks team.  Thanks for your contribution.
© 2016 Sonic Blocks, Inc. All Rights Reserved. All product and company names are trademarks™ or registered® trademarks of their respective holders. Use of them does not imply any affiliation with or endorsement by them. All specifications are subject to change without notice.
story_txt:
Introducing the 6" Sonic Blocks with WiFi & Bluetooth 


The World's First Modular Wireless Music EcoSystem!
Introducing  the world's first high fidelity wireless sound system that puts you in charge of your sound. Sonic Blocks is a unique, high tech music ecosystem that allows you to 
enjoy your music one on one or throughout your home — and beyond, with incredible fidelity, and complete customization. Sonic Blocks are audio system building blocks, portable, powerful, and  flexible. Swap components, connect multiple units, and tweak the sound in endless ways.


Yep, it's a completely reconfigurable music system that let's you change out speakers, panels, lights, or expand the the number of units to your individual needs. Just like the days of playing with Lego's, Sonic Blocks created multiple size blocks that can all be connected together to expand and grow your system.
















System FeaturesSonic Blocks are 
much more than another wireless, portable speaker. Our concept is much 
broader and is a completely unique approach to system design, 
customization, and ease of use. Start with the basics — great sound, 
connectivity, portability — and add unsurpassed ease of use and 
limitless expansion options.






Our modular approach means that you can upgrade individual speakers, add
 additional components, or expand your system throughout your house or 
apartment — even take your Sonic Blocks on the road.



The Sonic Blocks System
We live in a world of customization and personalization. Don't settle for a one size fits all audio experience! Sonic Blocks are the world's first modular wireless audio system where you can “control your sound” by swapping out or adding additional modules, speakers, and other accessories.




Customize your Sonic Blocks as a home theater or office music system.

Lighting Features
Every face of your Sonic Blocks has a built-in lighting element.  From your app you can program the colors and patterns, and light up individual faces of your blocks. Great  for entertaining; set your blocks to pulse with your music. Your lights are also part of your visual indicator system. With a quick glance, you can determine your battery power, WiFi strenghth, control the volume, incoming call indicator, email notifications, and so much more. 



Exploded Blocks
Don't worry, you don't need to assemble all this yourself.  We just 
wanted to give you a peek at all the parts and pieces that make up your 
Sonic Blocks.  The good news is that each section is a separate assembly
 that snaps on and off, so you can remove and replace them any time you 
want, or expand and grow your system at your own pace.  

Press


“The concept is potentially revolutionary concept, given its flexible approach and one of the most interesting ideas to come from the audio sector in years.” 



“Sonic Blocks picked up on the modular trend to create customizable speakers.” 



“Build the Frankensteinian speaker you’ve always dreamed of with Sonic Blocks!”



“The Sonic Blocks ecosystem is a unique entry 
  in the wireless speaker sector...”






“Legos for listening to music, you’re going to love it!”

















The Modular Approach
Sonic Blocks has a huge advantage over other wireless music systems — a 
modular approach. Imagine having multiple units providing surround sound
 for your home theater.  Our 
modular approach means that you can upgrade individual speakers, add 
additional components, or expand your system throughout your house or 
apartment — even take your Sonic Blocks on the road.





The Brain
The Sonic Blocks brain is a marvel of flexibility, capability, and elegant design that serves as the central input and output node for your music system.




The App
Use the Sonic Blocks App to setuo your system, access your local and online music libraries, control the individual DSP engines for exacting timbral adjustments, and distribute audio through your home network.






Timeline
It was an original idea of Jordan Wilker that triggered the amazing development of Sonic Blocks starting in 2014. We've done our homework, worked out the bugs, and are ready to bring this unique system to you...our backers.


PatentsSonic Blocks is extremely pleased to have been granted patent protection on our unique products. 


The Making Of
It's been a long, arduous path from initial concept to working prototype. JD's desire to allow user customization in a music system has resulted in a unique product. 


Technical Specifications
Sonic Blocks deliver great sound by incorporating cutting-edge technologies, optimizing individual components, and adopting a rigorous testing and evaluation process. You won't find a better sounding wireless speaker system.




Features Expanded

WiFi Wireless connectivity: Most wireless speakers use
Bluetooth to receive music from a server or SmartPhone and the fidelity of your
music suffers as a result. Bluetooth is a "lossy" process meaning not
all of the original music is delivered to your speakers. Sonic Blocks uses WiFi
(802.11n) to provide "lossless" high fidelity sound. When
circumstances require the use of Bluetooth, Sonic Blocks can still deliver
great fidelity.
Custom Speaker Selection and Configuration: Identify, mix,
and match different speakers on your Sonic Blocks system. You can quickly and
easily swap tweeters, midrange drivers, and woofers…no technical expertise or
tools are required. Sonic Blocks is a completely flexible music delivery
ecosystem — the first of its kind! Tailor the sound of your playback system to
your own personal preferences. Listen to your favorite music the way you want.
Powerful amplification: At the heart of each Sonic Blocks
unit is a Play-Fi® full fidelity Dual Class D digital amplifier capable of
outputting a booming 90 dB+ SPL (Sound Pressure Level). That's enough power to
meet any requirement. 



The Team
Sonic Blocks is a family operation The original concept grew out of an idea that Jordan Wilker had while he was still in high school. However, it was his father's background in product development that spurred the project forward. The family is the heart of the operation but Scott has gathered a very talented group of people around him. The advisory board and university connections combine to create an ideal synergy that assures the success of Sonic Blocks.


The Advisory Board



University Partnerships & Interns

Project Management





Paying It Forward








BENEFITS CORPORATION: Sonic Blocks is a Benefits
Corporation. We chose this business organization option because we strongly
believe that out company has an obligation to society at large in addition to
our investors. We "pay it forward" by donating a percentage of our
profits to organization and non-profits dedicated to supporting the health and
welfare of children. CASA (Court Appointed Special Advocates) is among the
first groups that we support.

story:
Shock & Awe – that’s what we aim to create with every product – and we’ve knocked it out of the park with The Howlers in so many ways

One of WisePrimates' founding principles was “We believe small is beautiful, but with our BIG technology at your fingertips you will feel connected wherever you go”. Very appropriate for our new twin Bluetooth speakers, The Howlers.

At WisePrimate we’ve been making travel electronics since 2012. It’s what we do. And we do it really well, we’ve won awards along the way.

However, The Howlers are something really special. The concept has been worked on for years, the technology now makes it deliverable and we are SO excited to be able to share these with you.

To our collective mind, by far the finest speaker product we have developed. And there’s 2 of them in each box! And like most things, when they work together, they achieve more than the individual unit.

 

Single box speakers have a fundamental problem – separation isn’t achieved. This is simply the ability to differentiate clearly the different between right and left speakers, to give that stereo sound.

1.8m is the commonly accepted minimum to achieve this, and you’ll appreciate this as soon as you set up you Howlers and listen to your favourite track. The game has moved on. Box speakers can’t compete – simple.

Music is something we all have in common. We appreciate it, dance to it, reminisce from it, choose the soundtrack of your life with it.

WisePrimates appreciate the importance of this, and that’s why we bring you the awe-inspiring Howlers, our new portable twin speaker wireless solution. They will rock your world, jazz up your day, punch up your pop, provide clarity for your classical, hammer out your house, spark up your Spotify, ignite your iTunes, bring the magic to your movies…. You get the idea – they are epic.

This year whether you are enjoying living life in London, magic in Montreal, nights in New York, chilling in California, balle balle in Birmingham, toasting in Texas, or getting glammed up in Glasgow, raving in Reykjavik, dancing in Dublin, partying in Paris, romancing in Rome, thanks to the Indiegogo platform, WisePrimate can share our new speakers with you.

 

Why take our word for it? See the reviews from our first production samples:

 

Tony Helgren

If you're not an Audiophile enthusiast, then these speakers could convert you. They should be regarded as studio monitor speakers. I've played all genres through them. Excellent sound staging and accurate lower bass performance. Dynamic range is unbelievable from such a compact speaker. Provides a rich organic timbres/colours, smallest details are easily heard, a spatial perspective brings musicians into your acoustic space with a sense of Holographic Sound Imaging.

Scott Boyd

For such small speakers the sound quality blew me away. I have bought bigger speakers that need plugged in and wires to connect to my laptop don’t produce sound quality as good as these.

Stacey McCulloch

I’m a big music fan, I find I’m always buying speakers that don’t quite live up to my expectations so I took a punt on these!

I’M SO GLAD I DID!

I can’t believe how loud these speakers are! I could literally fit both in one pocket but don’t let their size fool you! 

 

Hamish Lambert

“It would appear that Wise Primate didn't get the memo that said speakers this size can't be this good!!!”

Megan

Such a brilliant set of extremely compact speakers! Very easy to pair and the sound quality is second to none. So, impressed I’m going to have to treat myself to a pair of WisePrimate wireless headphones to match!

 

Richard Chalmers

Once paired I was shocked at both the consistent clarity and the volume these speakers produce! Would definitely recommend these to anyone!

 

Challenges?

WisePrimate isn’t like other companies. We don’t want you to back our concept. We are asking you to back our reality. We’ve done it. We’ve invested, we believe in it. We are ready to ship, product is in our warehouse!

We’ve already produced the first 1000 units, more are shipping as we speak.

It’s not our first rodeo, but as an organically funded UK Tech business, we want to broaden our reach. We want to increase the number of truly WisePrimates out there.

 

Please join the troop.

In an increasingly saturated market, innovation, creativity and acoustic excellence have increasingly been replaced by marketing, bought reviews, and more of the same products.

That’s not us. Quite simply we want to be the best at anything we do. We keep pushing, striving, dreaming, working, succeeding, failing, planning, executing, delivering.

Since 2011 we’ve been creating products for the travel industry. We’ve made many speakers before these.

And let’s be frank, we are fussy – REALLY fussy. We demand exceptional audio, we want to delight our customers, we want people to ask how we managed it, to be shocked by the sound the value, the build quality, and in awe of the acoustic, the size, the experience and with The Howlers we have delivered…….

Now we are ready to deliver to you!

 

So why would you support The Howlers?

You get twin speakers for true stereo sound and separation – the high-quality drivers used give incredible sound, in stereo. Shock & awe will be delivered by the bucket load when you hear these bad boys!

We should warn you they are very loud, despite their size, and beautifully crafted from aluminium, making them both light and strong. Having separate units allows you to create the best audio setting from your environment to enjoy the awesome audio. They will wow you with their ability, with zero distortion.

Style with substance – our speakers are beautifully machined alloy, strong and resilient, stylish and dynamic. (Don’t like the logo, we’ve designed so they can be rotated to hide the monkey!). Oh, and they are Space Grey – they look supercool in this colour.

Bored with your buddies’ tunes? Kids want to listen to their own tunes? They work individually also, so when we say you get 2 speakers you do, literally. Separate them, pair them up again, they are as flexible as you need them to be.

With up to 8 hours wireless playback, in testing we have seen more than 8.5, the powerful lithium cells delivery power, and when your done just pop them back on the dock to charge both at once or connect the units direct to Micro USB to charge.

Bluetooth Wireless Connectivity – combining the latest Bluetooth 5.0 and a clever amp circuitry for compact size with astounding performance.

Our goal is to achieve the following;

  1. Start the second production run of Howlers
  2. Continue to fund further R&D projects to deliver you more awesome products
  3. Establish and build our Social Media and Marketing Campaigns
  4. Work on our new projects
  5. To set up a global sales network to deliver products to you directly, quickly and taking advantage of our adaptability, flexibility and knowledge.

 

What about the Perks I hear you howl?

I want to bring you some awesome offers. The normal msrp of the product is $69.99/£69.99, so we are going to do the following to entice you to be "Wise Primates" and get on board

  1. Early Bird Howlers - Purchase for £34.99 (instead of £59.99)
  2. Early Bird Howlers x 2 - Purchase for £75.99 (Instead of £139.98)
  3. Early Bird Howlers + Blubasslite our new Bluetooth Earbuds - £79.99 (Instead of £130) 
  4. Howlers x 2 + Blubasslite x 2 - £149.99 (instead of £260)
  5. Discounted Howlers for £49.99 (instead of £69.99)
  6. Howler Multipack  x 5 for £180
  7. Howler 10 pack £340 (instead of £699.90)

Now even if you can’t join the troop for now, we'd still love to hear from you. Be a WisePrimate, help share and get the word out, take to social media and help us get across the line on our first campaign. We won’t forget it.
story_txt:
Shock & Awe – that’s what we aim to create with every product – and we’ve knocked it out of the park with The Howlers in so many waysOne of WisePrimates' founding principles was “We believe small is beautiful, but with our BIG technology at your fingertips you will feel connected wherever you go”. Very appropriate for our new twin Bluetooth speakers, The Howlers.At WisePrimate we’ve been making travel electronics since 2012. It’s what we do. And we do it really well, we’ve won awards along the way.However, The Howlers are something really special. The concept has been worked on for years, the technology now makes it deliverable and we are SO excited to be able to share these with you.To our collective mind, by far the finest speaker product we have developed. And there’s 2 of them in each box! And like most things, when they work together, they achieve more than the individual unit.

 
Single box speakers have a fundamental problem – separation isn’t achieved. This is simply the ability to differentiate clearly the different between right and left speakers, to give that stereo sound.1.8m is the commonly accepted minimum to achieve this, and you’ll appreciate this as soon as you set up you Howlers and listen to your favourite track. The game has moved on. Box speakers can’t compete – simple.Music is something we all have in common. We appreciate it, dance to it, reminisce from it, choose the soundtrack of your life with it.WisePrimates appreciate the importance of this, and that’s why we bring you the awe-inspiring Howlers, our new portable twin speaker wireless solution. They will rock your world, jazz up your day, punch up your pop, provide clarity for your classical, hammer out your house, spark up your Spotify, ignite your iTunes, bring the magic to your movies…. You get the idea – they are epic.This year whether you are enjoying living life in London, magic in Montreal, nights in New York, chilling in California, balle balle in Birmingham, toasting in Texas, or getting glammed up in Glasgow, raving in Reykjavik, dancing in Dublin, partying in Paris, romancing in Rome, thanks to the Indiegogo platform, WisePrimate can share our new speakers with you.

 
Why take our word for it? See the reviews from our first production samples: Tony HelgrenIf you're not an Audiophile enthusiast, then these speakers could convert you. They should be regarded as studio monitor speakers. I've played all genres through them. Excellent sound staging and accurate lower bass performance. Dynamic range is unbelievable from such a compact speaker. Provides a rich organic timbres/colours, smallest details are easily heard, a spatial perspective brings musicians into your acoustic space with a sense of Holographic Sound Imaging.Scott BoydFor such small speakers the sound quality blew me away. I have bought bigger speakers that need plugged in and wires to connect to my laptop don’t produce sound quality as good as these.Stacey McCullochI’m a big music fan, I find I’m always buying speakers that don’t quite live up to my expectations so I took a punt on these!I’M SO GLAD I DID!I can’t believe how loud these speakers are! I could literally fit both in one pocket but don’t let their size fool you!  Hamish Lambert“It would appear that Wise Primate didn't get the memo that said speakers this size can't be this good!!!”MeganSuch a brilliant set of extremely compact speakers! Very easy to pair and the sound quality is second to none. So, impressed I’m going to have to treat myself to a pair of WisePrimate wireless headphones to match! Richard ChalmersOnce paired I was shocked at both the consistent clarity and the volume these speakers produce! Would definitely recommend these to anyone! Challenges?WisePrimate isn’t like other companies. We don’t want you to back our concept. We are asking you to back our reality. We’ve done it. We’ve invested, we believe in it. We are ready to ship, product is in our warehouse!We’ve already produced the first 1000 units, more are shipping as we speak.It’s not our first rodeo, but as an organically funded UK Tech business, we want to broaden our reach. We want to increase the number of truly WisePrimates out there.

Quite simply we want to be the best at anything we do. Shock & awe will be delivered by the bucket load when you hear these bad boys!We should warn you they are very loud, despite their size, and beautifully crafted from aluminium, making them both light and strong. Having separate units allows you to create the best audio setting from your environment to enjoy the awesome audio. They will wow you with their ability, with zero distortion.Style with substance – our speakers are beautifully machined alloy, strong and resilient, stylish and dynamic. (Don’t like the logo, we’ve designed so they can be rotated to hide the monkey!). Oh, and they are Space Grey – they look supercool in this colour.Bored with your buddies’ tunes? Kids want to listen to their own tunes? They work individually also, so when we say you get 2 speakers you do, literally. Separate them, pair them up again, they are as flexible as you need them to be.With up to 8 hours wireless playback, in testing we have seen more than 8.5, the powerful lithium cells delivery power, and when your done just pop them back on the dock to charge both at once or connect the units direct to Micro USB to charge.Bluetooth Wireless Connectivity – combining the latest Bluetooth 5.0 and a clever amp circuitry for compact size with astounding performance.Our goal is to achieve the following;

Continue to fund further R&D projects to deliver you more awesome products

Work on our new projects

story:
see the entire Elipson video here:

    & 



Our main effort here on Indiegogo is to bring Elipson's amazing new Turntables & their Lifestyle Music Systems to the US market. 


The vehicle for that is our new eCommerce store, www.evoqmusic.com

(click the link to check it out) & our brick & mortar showroom 

on the southside of Old Town Scottsdale, Arizona

just north of the Tempe, Arizona State University area.

The good news is that music lovers are becoming increasingly aware, informed and connected. You don’t want cheap any more. You want quality.  You are searching and you must find it somewhere. 

We have it and I believe that you’ll beat a path to our door. Value and performance combined with knowledgeable advice. We are hard to beat!

There are only just a few affordable high-performance turntables available in the US today and most are very basic and seriously complicated to set-up and live with.

We feel passionately that we need to change this, to bring value, to bring performance, to bring back the old school ways, but updated to the latest highest state of technology. 

This is the vision that Elipson calls "Invisible Technology". 

The main "benefit" of the all-in-one record players at Urban Outfitters is that they are easy to deal with. You just plug them in and spin a record, easy.

The opportunity that the Elipson wireless turntables offer is that same level of easy, combined with audiophile level performance. Add the real benefit of being able to stream Vinyl to the same Bluetooth Speakers and Systems that we stream our digital  music too blows minds. Such a big step forward.

We are encouraged by the trend of music lovers who want to get back to substance with their music collection. They are eager to (re)discover the joy of sliding an LP out of it's jacket (the feeling and scent of nostalgia), placing it on the turntable, cleaning the surface, not just pushing a button but carefully and lowering the stylus onto the record to start the chain reaction. Sending the music to the speakers and out into the room, reaching their ears and following the flow of the players emotion into their heart and soul: the joy, the love, the peace, but also the raw aggression, the anger and the angst, the frustration… the darkness and  the light. They long to feel what the artists were feeling, when they put pen to paper and then instrument to air, and then electricity to vinyl and tape and digits. 

Elipson is a well established 70 year old French company, just not as well known here in the States. It's very easy to imagine it as the French incarnation of B&W or KEF but with a lot more style and it's own long, storied and noteworthy history.

They are selling two new series of turntables, the Alpha & Omega in Europe. We need your teamwork to share them with our North American friends.

Both series have a basic table, a table with a RIAA phono stage built in and a deluxe version with USB & an aptX® bluetooth transmitter onboard. All come with an Ortofon phone cartridge pre-installed. Very cool!


Along with the basic perks, we will also make some special purchases to say thank you as Premium Perks



8" 10" & 12" Subwoofers


Elipson Timber Bluetooth Speaker

Edwards Audio Apprentice LITE


Elipson Lenny Bluetooth Speaker


Blue Aura v30 Blackline Music System



We Need You & your Teamwork!

  • We just need this little boost to kick things into high gear and we'd love to offer you an opportunity to save some significant money as a thank you!
  • We need to outfit our new Scottsdale showroom in a basic way, set up a few demonstration systems and fund our lease & baseline overhead costs related to that until we get this off the ground.
  • We need to kick off our Programmatic Web-based Marketing System – Targeted Banners/SEO/PPC/Email Updates, etc.
  • We need to follow up throughout the year with a few special events and shows with them and our selected music associate Vinyl Me, Please is an important part of our promotional plans. Check them out here: www.vinylmeplease.com
We do have several of the necessary major parts of the project in place. The website is written and live, the online store is fully operational, we have worked out brand availability with our suppliers, we have selected our retail space, we have a receiving warehouse and shipping services in place. We are in motion and will do what ever is required to help spread the enjoyment of music to as many people as we are able. 

Your teamwork is very much appreciated. We would really like to keep in contact with you as we move past this founding stage in our history. As we go forward together, we will make other special buys available to you in the Indiegogo INDEMAND space, share our group's knowledge and experience on the blog, host live events & drop parties and things that we haven't even thought of yet. We look forward to meeting you and learning more about what you want and need from us, extending the good will and creating a tight knit community is our goal.

The Benefit to You

  • contribute and get in on the special Premium Perks,
  • or just get some pretty cool swag and know that you have made it a lot easier for music lovers everywhere to share the enjoyment of music on a proper HiFi system & GET THEM OUT FROM BEHIND THE EARBUDS!


Risks & Challenges

We believe that the risks and challenges here are minimal.

Everything related to our perks is already in our online store, is brand new and current model.

Physical Perks will ship ASAP.

Our assortment will only get more diverse, if you want something that we don't offer, tell us about it and we will see if we can get it added to the INDEMAND slate.

We are seasoned Consumer Electronics Pros, we can do this and you can rely on me to take care of you all along the way. 

The risk of failure is also reduced by the fact that this is not our main source of income. We have been operating a successful Home Theater & Home Systems Custom Installation business in the Phoenix area for more than 15 years. 



Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you feel good about what we are building here, but just can't part with any hard earned money right now, you can still get on the team. It would be great if you would help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign, we would sincerely appreciate it.

The easiest way to have some real fun is to get referral rewards by sharing our campaign using the share buttons to the left of the video at the top of the page. 

As long as you're logged in to Indiegogo, each time you share using those buttons, Indiegogo tracks contributions that come in from those shares. Simple!

  • When you refer 10 Contributors the premium perks, you get a Free Perk of the same level as your baseline referral!

=


 

                Lenny                  8"SUB     8" SUB   10" SUB      10"SUB            Timber

=

         Timber                      Timber                      Timber                     Timber


     Please track your referrals as you go! Just log in to Indiegogo, click on your name in the upper right corner of the website, then click on My Profile. At the top of the next page, click Referrals. On the next page you’ll see how many people have clicked your share, how many of those people backed the project, and how much you’ve referred to the campaign.

You can get some great stuff for free AND save some serious dough with all this, break out your little black book and get busy!

Good Luck, we only have a month left!

We aren't lawyers or accountants, so all applicable taxes are your responsibility, please consult your accountant for their advice & your local taxing authority for their requirements.

As with everything purchased in the store, local delivery & basic set-up is always free. Local backers, please deduct any shipping charges from your contribution amount & I'll bring along a small extra gift too, see you soon!

Thank you, we appreciate your consideration, your potential teamwork and positive energy! 

Loren Roetman,

Proprietor, 

www.evoqmusic.com


P.S., please also check out our true passion project, every time we ship any T-shirt out from the website, we donate $5 to Touch of Hope to support 
Tytoo Gardens in Simonette, Haiti. Check them out: https://touchofhopehaiti.com/donate-here/ & http://www.tytoogardens.com/


                        

& we've got some even more SERIOUS HIFI for you too!

story:
How to made it?

                                      

                                                                                            Parameters






                                           

                                           Perks




                           Question

*When would you receive the speaker?

When the end of this item, I will ship them in November, you can receive them within a week. Some ones may be late, but you will also receive them before Christmas.

*Shipping

UPS or DHL to worldwide ,about 3-5 days you will receive.

*About Failure 

If fault, we would like to  exchange  a new one to you, if within three months.but you should pay the shipping(about $20.00)

*Compatibility

Compatible with Apple, SAMSUNG, MOTO, Microsoft's Tablet PC、Smartphone、laptop。

*Radio

You can automatically search for FM radio channels in you city, and can quickly store by the remote control.

Who design it and made for you?and why?

My name is TAKEMOTO(pen name and brand ).In fact, I am a handmade eyewear designer and craftsmen, since 1999. Currently, about 3,000 fans (customers) in the world, mainly from the United States.It is one of the most expensive handmade eyewear brand. I designed and made furniture since 2012. Why do I want to launch all raise? I lost a lot of money to the cause of handmade glasses, in the past five years, so, although I have good sales, but has been unable to achieve financial freedom, can even say that I was very poor, most of the time, I work for the banking .So, I need a chance to change my situation, I have a lot of great design, but it takes time and money。

       A little money, you get a great speaker, at the same time, you help me,.

        Welcome to visit my ETSY shop, you will know who I am.

story:
HEAR the beat, FEEL the beat and SEE the beat.

Headphones are much more than a pair of speakers on your head. They’re an expression of your style.  Jealous Angel’s Heartpulse headphones command attention by merging function and fashion by combining the latest LED and battery technology, an oversized 50mm driver, a proprietary pulsing circuit and house it in a shape we can all relate too.  DJ’s will stand apart from the rest with a heart shaped pulsing light, pumping to the tempo of the music.  Jogger's will be seen crossing the street at night, adding visibility for oncoming traffic.  A switch gives you the choice to turn them off, pulse to the music you’re listening too or stay on.

Ergonomics- The human ear is half the shape of a heart. One side of the heart wraps perfectly around the ear to isolate the outside noise while providing perfect natural acoustics to your ear’s shape. The other side allows space for internal ports to add more volume and bottom-end. The combination gives unsurpassable clarity and detail.

The TEAM
Designed by Paul Rivera Jr of Rivera Amplification.  Rivera amps are known for  creating high quality products with desirable tones and is extensively used by legendary Grammy award winning producers, engineers and top musicians from around the world.  Paul brings this same "Build the best" philosophy to the Jealous Angel brand.

We also teamed up with one of the best manufacturers of high-end headphones and suppliers of well known brands to make sure we deliver something special.  Besides the patent pending LED pulsing features, the internal bigger 50MM drivers (most headphones use 35 or 40mm) will give maximum bass even the ultra low 10Hz frequencies. Perfect for DJ’s to match that beat, especially in the world of Hip Hop and EDM.

Heartpulse headphones are created out of passion to merge fashion and function and take headphones to a whole new level  in high-fidelity sound and appearance.  Help us make these into a reality by donating to our campaign. We need your support. Without you, none of this would be possible.


Club DJ's will LOVE making rememberable impression with glowing hearts beating to the tempo of music they're spinning!

Joggers will LOVE the added visibility and safety when jogging near traffic in the evening hours.


Composers, DJ's and Producers will LOVE the big bottom-end of 50MM drivers without losing the clarity and definition.

Starpulse headphones have the same pulsing LED circuitry and 50mm drivers.  These will available to ship a couple of months after the Heartpulse versions.


Features:

  • Bright LED lights pulse to the beat of the music
  • Plug-in USB port to recharge internal lithium battery
  • 50MM drivers for maximum bass and definition
  • switch for either pulse effect on or off
  • Pulsing LED's add high visibility providing safety for evening joggers
  • DJ's can beat match by hearing or seeing
  • Over-ear design for maximum isolation from outside noise
Reach Goals
If we reach $200K we will include Bluetooth!

Timeline

Challenges
Manufacturing is always a challenge, however I have 22 years of manufacturing experience with strong vendor relationships and already work with the supplier on other products.  Their reputation of building the highest quality audio products for other high-end brands is undeniable.  Most of the design is finished and ready for production.

Follow us on Instagram @jealousangelaudio for more Heartpulse headphone videos and images.

story:
A SOUNDTRACK FOR THE OUTDOORS

 

Bluewire Audio has created a safer and more convenient way to listen to music while exercising or participating in any outdoor activity.  Our wearable Speakers and Bluetooth Receiver are designed with safety and convenience in mind. They mount interchangeably to any running or baseball hat, eliminating dangling wires and the need to continually readjust your earbuds. They easily connect to any Bluetooth enabled device and allow you to listen to your favorite music without losing touch with your surroundings. 

 

 

OVERVIEW

 

  • SAFETY //  Preserves ambient sound to keep you safe and in touch with your surroundings
  • CONVENIENCE //  No tangled wires or need to readjust earbuds
  • SUPERIOR SOUND QUALITY //  Designed to strike the perfect balance between listening to your favorite playlist and hearing the world around you 
  • BLUETOOTH //  Seamlessly pairs with any Bluetooth enabled device
  • WATER RESISTANT //  Suitable for use for all outdoor activities no matter what the weather
  • PHONE CAPABILITIES //  Make and receive phone calls

 

 

PRODUCT FEATURES

 

 

SPEAKERS

  • Our open-ear Wearable Speaker System easily clips onto any hat or visor
  • The speakers are located just above your ear so that ambient sound is preserved
  • Sound is directed downward towards your ears so that you can listen to your own personal audio but there is no spillover for others to hear
  • Once set up on the hat, the speakers will remain in place despite vigorous activity and will not require any adjustments during use

 

 

BLUETOOTH RECEIVER

  • Conveniently clips onto the back of any hat with an adjustable band
  • Full functionality for music and phone controls
  • Provides up to 6-7 hours of listening time and over 150 hours of standby time
  • Easily syncs with any Bluetooth enabled device

 

​  

 

HATS

  • Our Wearable Speakers and Bluetooth Receiver interchangeably mount to any running or baseball hat
  • Bluewire's featured hats with custom artwork will have a grommet in the back to facilitate mounting of the speakers 

  • Either way, patent pending design keeps speakers and wires where they belong!

 

 

 

DEVELOPMENT

 

Not everyone wants to listen to music when they run or work out, but if you do there have always been issues with safety and convenience. Earbuds can require frequent adjustment while your're active, and the wires are just a nuisance. Even more significantly they block ambient sound, and in today's world it's more important than ever to be aware of your surroundings. The co-founders of Bluewire Audio are lifelong runners who understand the need for a safer alternative to traditional earbuds and headphones.

Our patent-pending speakers were developed with the help of several New England design and manufacturing companies and have incorporated the feedback and suggestions of local users. We have self-funded the first limited production run of 500 units that will be used as immediate-shipment rewards for this campaign. 

We are hoping to raise $30,000 for this Indiegogo campaign. It will be used to fund inventory acquisition and begin our first full production round. We plan to sell our Wearable Speaker System both online and at various races and fitness events across the United States. 

 

MEET THE TEAM

 

 

Bluewire Audio was started by the father-daughter team, Andy and Emily Proos. They have always shared a love for running. Andy came up with the idea for these Wearable Speakers while training for his first marathon and when Emily graduated from business school, they decided to team up. To learn more about Bluewire Audio, please visit www.bluewireaudio.com

story:
Soundo looks like a smart watch, but it is actually a powerful wearable wireless speaker. It allows you to listen to whatever you want, wherever you are. Instead of carrying around speakers or fumbling with wires, Soundo’s unique watch style with the detachable wristband gives you great audio in a stylish form. It can be worn on the wrist, attached to bicycle handles, bags, or just placed on your desk. It is your best musical companion for indoor and outdoor use.

 

Tied on the bicycle

 Worn on wrist

Hung on the bag

 

Easy to disassemble

You can easily detach the wristband and get an awesome desktop speaker. 

 

 

At the same time, it is hard to believe that Soundo still can bring high quality sounds in such a tiny speaker.To maximum the volume performance, we designed specific acoustic chamber and customized the speaker to perfectly balance the space and sound volume.

 

With a pair of soundo, you can enjoy or share your favourite melody with your friends in a separated multiple-channel stereo system.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Soundo is made by 100Plus team, we are all designers. In the past nine years, we have designed a lot of smart gadgets for our customers. We love life, passionate about innovation and creation.

Sound is the first product we designed for ourselves, which is designed for indoor or outdoor use. The idea was born on the way home at night after exhausted working. When we felt alone to ride bicycle back home at night, we found that music could help a lot, so we created Soundo to listen to music in the office and carry it on the go. We have been starting massive production since the beginning of March, it won’t take long to be delivered. Hope you like it.With Soundo, With music.

story:
WHO I AM

I'm Luca Galmarini, I am a curious guy. I look for solutions, do research, ask around, and when I don’t find answers I get into the game personally.

I am a drummer and an artisan. While observing amplifiers, speakers, and audio systems I noticed that they are mostly cubic in shape: if they are built like that, how would a similarly shaped bass drum sound compared to a classic cylindrical one?  It was by asking myself this question that everything was born.

Here's how Qua-Drum was initially inventend, the first cubic bass drum prototype.

This project wasn’t born because I wanted to be alternative at any cost and it was not designed to surprise, even if the results left everyone open-mouthed. It is simply the desire to satisfy my curiosity as a sound lover.

I think that new ideas lay the foundations for a more dynamic and functional future: my ambition with this crowdfunding campaign is to promote a beautifully-designed and innovative type of drums that is aimed at musicians who have a particular sensitivity and interest in novelties.

 

MY GOAL

I need fundings of 50.000 € for expanding the production and distribution, allowing me to invest more on R&D for new products.

Reaching my goal will enable more people to know my products and will give me the possibility of presenting the TestaQuadra project to the international market.

 

THE PRODUCTS

The same intuition used for the bass drum was applied to the remaining components of the set, thus creating the Quadratura System.

Briefly, this system consists of two perforated and pantographed rings, allowing to insert four curved wood panels, which together create four 90-degree angles.

That’s where the "Quadratura" name comes from: it means ”squaring" in Italian.

The unique and recognizable sound is the key-feature of all our products: its precise attack, its elevated (but controlled) sustain, its selective exaltation of harmonics, coupled with an incredible sensitivity and precision in tuning, all give musicians infinite timbral possibilities.

 

 

 

The choice of variable thickness of woods is the result of a meticulous research and years of experimentation. Together with the final craftsmanship assembly, all these elements give a soul to products that show unparalleled robustness and reliability when used “on the road”.

The high quality of the product, not only in woods but also in many custom-made mechanical details, makes this set unique.

Its sophisticated design originates from a 100% Italian production that could be appreciated even from a pure aesthetic point of view.

That’s why I would like to hear it in a large concert hall as well as to see it displayed in a design exhibition.

 

HOW YOU CAN HELP ME

You can help me make my dreams come true by funding my campaing and by spreading the word about it.

 

Let my DREAMS become your DRUMS !

story:
Your Music, Your Style

Other earbuds have tried, but none have gotten even close to the amount of color options we offer. With a three-color gradient and the entire color spectrum at your beck and call, there are over 5 million color combinations for you to pick, any time you want!

The Beam's light rings can also pulse to the beat of your music or match color to your album artwork. Our advanced pulsing algorithm was developed in-house and will drive bass-heads wild with the changing light rhythm.

With our app, your earbuds can tap into the entire color spectrum. Our customizable light ring changes on the fly to any color you want!

The customizable light rings shine so bright, they also serve practical uses in your everyday life. Highly visible at nighttime, turn on the light ring when it's dark to alert people of your presence. 

Work in a busy office? Throw on your Wearhaus Beam and switch the color to red to signify you need to concentrate. Swap the color to green when you're ready to chat.

Brilliance in Bluetooth

Our patented Bluetooth technology allows multiple Wearhaus products to wirelessly sync up and listen together, no matter what audio source you use. Share your new music discoveries with your S.O., blast pump up music with your gym crew, or run on pace with your buddy.

  • Double-tap the middle button, then press up to broadcast

  • Double-tap the middle button, then press down to receive

  • Your earbuds will sync up within 10 seconds

Since we transmit audio directly from headphone to headphone, Wearhaus audio sharing technology works with any device, any music player you use and can be used for watching videos too!

The Wearhaus app takes all of our smart features to the next level. Use the app to take full control of your color options, update firmware, collaboratively queue up music for friends, and more. Available on iOS and Android.  

Check out the Wearhaus app in action!

The Wearhaus Beam is the only earbud that gets better even after you own it. Just like how your smartphone regularly receives software updates, our state-of-the-art firmware update system means you are constantly delivered new features and bug fixes.

Some updates we released for our first product (the Wearhaus Arc) include cinema sound, bass boost, voice prompts, antenna enhancements, and audio sharing via the AUX cable. Back our campaign to see what we have in store for the Beam!

Top of the Line Materials and Components

The Wearhaus Beam is a major upgrade to the classic in-ear headphone. We’ve combined the high-quality materials you need with new, smart functions that make your listening experience more exciting than ever.

When it comes to audio equipment, we know what you’re looking for. It’s quality first, and we built the Beam with that mentality. Even if tech specs aren't your thing, you should still know that we truly went all out. With 9.2 millimeter, 16 ohm audio drivers, the Beam delivers precision-tuned sound in a light and convenient form factor.

The Wearhaus Beam is extremely well-designed, inside and out. Anodized aluminum, scratch resistant alloyed plastic, a sweat-proof build, and a full selection of comfortable, ergonomic silicone ear tips come together to create a super durable product.

Charged through micro USB, our battery boasts 8 hours of music-bumping and only needs a 1 hour charge to go from dead to full battery.

Since the development of our first product, the Wearhaus Arc, we have established ourselves as manufacturers of audio products that do more than the other guys. The Beam is full of the smart features Wearhaus fans have come to love.

The Accessories

Every ear is different and it's important to us that your Beam fits just how you want it. Along with your earbuds, we have included three different sizes of earhooks and ear tips so you can find your perfect fit. You will also receive clips, a micro USB charging cable, and more!
