story:
"We don't only use the potentiometer on MAX". 
                                                   /the Great Guitarplayers/

Every guitar player has their unique sound, which can be created
by a special setting of the pots.That unique sound, the sweet spot
is somewhere in the mid-range of the pots.Most of the guitar players
face the situation on stage or in studio, when they try to get back
to the chosen setting on the pot. But it is impossible.
This is because only the min and the max positions of the pots
are determined by a physical stop. That’s why we need a solution,
that can create a physical stop point in the mid-range of the pots.

Furthermore, for practical reasons, the device has to fulfill
the following requirements:
- the chosen setting could be redefined anytime,
- easy to install, without the changing of the potentiometer,
- must not change the look or the sound of the guitar,
- works clearly mechanically without any electrical modification. 

At the state of the art no device has been able to fulfill these
requirements, that is why there are no pots on guitars with this function.
So we invented a brand new principle of operation to create such a device.
We call this invention Clutch™.

The principle of operation that Clutch™ is based on has never been used for  
adjustments of any potentiometer. That novelty is approved by the search report
of the World Intellectual Property Organization (WIPO patent no. WO2013093529)
so it is officially an invention, an instrument never been before.
And now it is patent pending worldwide.

Basics
Installation is easy, you only have to change the pot knob
and the washer nut to Clutch™ Knob and  Clutch™ Nut.
The Clutch™ Knob is fixed to the shaft of the potentiometer,
and it is able to move up and down axially.
The Clutch™ Nut is fixed to the treaded collar of the potentiometer,
and comprise two parts : a lower fixed nut and a rotating shim.
By pushing down the Clutch™ Knob it creates
engagment with the Clutch™ Nut's rotating shim,
making them turn  together, only between the position
the engagment created (sweet spot) and the potentiometer's maximum. 
By pulling up the Clutch™ Knob it separates from the Clutch™ Nut.
And now you can set a new sweet spot.

The following animation explains the installation and the operation of Clutch™:


Inside - in pieces
This is a picture with all parts of the device,so you can see it’s a purely mechanical, precision construction. It won’t change the sound characteristics of your guitar.

The Clutch™ Knob is fixed to the shaft of the potentiometer, and it is able to move up and down axially. Pushing down the Clutch™ Knob creates engagment with the Clutch™ Nut's rotating shim, making them turn  together. By pulling up the Clutch™ Knob it separates from the Clutch™ Nut's rotating shim.

The Clutch™ Nut comprise two parts : a lower fixed nut and a rotating shim:

The rotating shim is connected to the lower fixed nut with a spring,
so when it is turned and released, it jumps back to its starting position,
just like a rotary dial phone: 

Released means when the Clutch™ Knob separates
from the Clutch™ Nut's rotating shim, so this "jump-back"
does not effect on the Clutch™ Knob.
The Clutch™Knob turns only when you turn it.
The "jump-back" effect is to reset the rotating-shim,
 so when engagment created it is always starts turning
from the physical stop point. 

You can find more information about the operation of the device
in our website http://guitarclutch.com

The device components were designed, to be able to be built inside
any kind of pot-knob, so it wont change the appearance of your guitar. 

Designs
We are able to build in the Clutch™ mechanism in almost all kind of
the guitar knobs, right now we have the following designs:
GBSN, TELE, JB, STRT-W, STRT-BL 






If you would like to choose different colour or different knob design,
pls leave a comment or contact us info(at)guitarclutch.com,
we are capable of producing more variations.

It’s easy to install!
You don’t have to change the potentiometer, just replace the potknob and the nut
with the Clutch™ Knob and the Clutch™ Nut!

Remove the knob and the nut                            Install the  Clutch™ Nut

Install the Clutch™ Knob                                     Ready to use!

Many of our friends and fellow guitarplayers have been using their Clutch™,
with great success and satisfaction:  

 

We have all  the materials and technologies ready and we are able
to produce Clutch™ samples by CNC in our workshop,
approximately 400-500 units per month.

 

Our goal is to optimize the product for mass production.  
But at the moment very few people heard about this revolutionary guitar accessory,
and we need to break trough the wall of obscurity.

And thats where you come in the picture
If you can choose from the pot knob which can only turn the potentiometer, or the one that can remember your sweet spots, you surely will pick the one with the extra feature.

If you have heard about it.
To make it happen, we need  the publicity that the succesfull IGG campaign
can provide to boost the project and spread the word among fellow guitarists
around the world. Our goal is to step up to a higher level of mass production,
witch tooling costs more than we can afford right now. 

Your support will make this possible. 
When you select a level of contribution from the right, and support our project,
in return you will receive the CNC manufactured, hand made precision device,
we are currently producing.

The kit contains:
• 1 Clutch™ Knob ( you can choose GBSN, TELE, JB, STRT-W, STRT-BL style)
• 1 Clutch™ Nut,  
• 1 Allen key (M3 size),  
• 1 special Clutch™ wrench, 
• 2 adapters for split shafts or metric type solid shafts

Make sure you know the type of your pot: Is it metric or inch standard?
Inch standard pot’s threaded collar is 3/8 inch (9.5 mm approx.) 
Metric standard pot’s is 8 mm (5/16 inch approx.)
Send this info in comment with your contribution.


Perks


 

F.A.Q

Do I have to change the potentiometer in my guitar?

No, Clutch™ works with any potentiometer.

Does Clutch™ works on push-pull pots?

Yes, but it is effective only in "push" mode, 
and you have to install Clutch™ in the pot's "push" position!

Does it change the sound of my guitar?

No, it only makes your play more precise, and easier.

Does it need soldering to install?

No, to install you only need to replace the nut and the knob.

Do I need special tools for installation?

We give you a standard M3 Allen key for the Clutch™ knob’s grub-screw
and the special Clutch™ wrench for the Clutch™ Nut.

Does it have an affect on the electric circuits off my guitar?

No, it is not an electric nor magnetic device, it is simply mechanical.

 

The mechanism that Clutch™ is based upon is patent pending, at
USPTO (appl. no. 14/307026) http://appft.uspto.gov/netacgi/nph-Parser?Sect1=PTO2&Sect2=HITOFF&p=1&u=%2Fnetahtml%2FPTO%2Fsearch-bool.html&r=1&f=G&l=50&co1=AND&d=PG01&s1=20140311279&OS=20140311279&RS=20140311279 and at
EPO (appl. no. EP2807492 A1) https://worldwide.espacenet.com/publicationDetails/biblio?CC=EP&NR=2807492A1&KC=A1&date=&FT=D&locale=en_EP.

The "million dollar" challenge

If you know a better and more simple solution for:
• setting a new minimum level for ANY potentiometer,
• immeditaly change this minimum level at ANY time, during playing,
• able to build in in ANY pot-knob,
Send your idea in a comment and you will receive a free Clutch™ from us!

Should you have any questions or comments contact us:
info(at)guitarclutch.com 
or leave your comments below.

Thanks for your support!

story:
Introducing Pocket Party, the world's best pocket-sized expandable Bluetooth speaker which combines incredibly powerful and bass-enhanced sound with a music-synced light show. 



The Pocket Party is like the Swiss knife of speakers: Versatile, small and expandable with great sound, powerful stunning bass in vibration mode, really cool light show, camping lamp, mood light, suction cup, splash-proof, drop-proof, carabiner with bike-mount strap, iPad stand, and App control too. This speaker has it all. No wonder this little speaker surprises everyone who has seen it.

And with it's unique vibration mode, you can turn any pizza box into a Subwoofer for bigger bass sound.



Small speakers normally lack bass. The X-Bass technology used in the Pocket Party breaks the ‘sound barrier’ of pocket size speakers using advanced acoustic, driver and electronic design. The resulting sound is really amazing.


The built-in smart light show synchronizes with the music to turn a living room into a dance club! It is beautiful, dazzling and just plain awesome.





 

The Pocket Party is drop-proof, splash-proof and very adaptable with its suction cup and carabiner.



You can choose from 4 different colors depending on your style: Pink, blue, green and gray.



We are dedicated to our timeline and will keep you regularly updated on the status of our progress. We are also committed to transparency and keeping our Pocket Party fans and Indiegogo backers informed.


Yes, we will make sure the first batch of over 1000 units are delivered before Christmas.


Two Pocket Party speakers can be connected to double the power of sound and light. This feature is only available to the 'Double the Fun and Sound' perk.


Nick Mazza is a designer and a DJ (left). Michael Zhang (right) is an engineer and a dancer. Encouraged by the great success of his last invention - Near Field Audio (NearFA) speaker (also known as 'induction speaker'), Michael created the expandable/vibration 2-in-1 structure that could greatly improve the bass for a mini speaker. Michael and Nick, together with the supporting teams in both California and China, have developed the Pocket Party speaker that music lovers can bring along anywhere they go for an enjoyable time. 


How to use the Pocket Party

Like most Bluetooth speakers, the Pocket Party is very easy to use. When switched-on the first time, you can pair your smart phone with it by choosing ‘Pocket Party’ on the list of available devices.

How does light show work?

Pocket Party features a colorful light show that intelligently synchronizes with the music being played, and offers user programmability and four preset modes: “beats", “party”, “mood light” and “lamp”.

1) In beats mode, four sets of LED form many dynamic patterns like equalizer, fountain, striking, and firework etc. The patterns automatically match the music in an intelligent way.

2) In party mode, strobe lights kick in to create a dance club atmosphere.

3) In mood light mode, it breathes slowly and still syncs with the music.

4) It can be set as a lamp or even a torch, for table side, camping, or even selfie.

How can I choose the different light show modes?

Pressing the dedicated light show button briefly will cycle through all 4 modes: Beats, Party, Mood Light, Lamp, and OFF.

Can I control the light show from my smart phone?

Yes. The lights in the Pocket Party can be controlled by the web-based app. You can directly choose the setting of each mode. 

How does vibration mode work?

Vibrations of low frequency signal (bass) are passed from the suction cup to any surface it sticks to. A hollow surface such as a card board box will amplify the sound better than a hard surface. A larger and thinner box can produce deeper bass, just like a subwoofer. You can try it on different places. Here are some suggestions: Pizza box, copy paper box, glass window, wooden cabinet, hard suitcase, and refrigerator.

When the speaker is half-way expanded, the vibration mode works better than when fully expanded.

Can I use the Pocket Party as a speaker phone?

Yes. When a phone call comes in, the Pocket Party will ring. You can press the Bluetooth button to answer the call. Double-clicking the Bluetooth button will redial the last number.

What is the battery life?

The average play time is 6 hour. It takes 2 hours to be fully charged.  

What is IPX4 splash-proof?

You can take it to the shower, but you should not submerge it into water.

How about drop-proof?

The Pocket Party can withstand dropping of up to 6-feet.

How much is shipping?

Shipping will be $10 for anywhere in the USA, and $20 for the rest of the world.

story:
Experience clear, powerful and well balanced sound. Lightweight and around the ear fit for all day comfort. We use high quality materials and finishes. We have limitless color combination that suits your lifestyle. Pre-Order Now!

DJ’s, musicians, computer users and people who love good music all know the pain of inadequate or broken down headphones. The Sig Studio Street Pro is Sound Genius – extra-durable, over-the-ears headphones in designer colors. Sig Group Enterprise is offering their headphones for sale through the Indiegogo “Sound is Genius” crowdfunding campaign.

So what makes Sig headphones stand out from all the other headphones on the market? First off, it has great sound quality. If you are a music lover or if you appreciate the nuances of the spoken word, quality is important in a set of headphones. Second, they are over the ear. That means comfort for your ears – no weenty ear-buds that grow uncomfortable after hours of use. It also means that these headphones can be used by people who normally wear hearing aids. Third, they are super durable. That makes them “headphones for the future” because you won’t be buying a new pair the week after you get the first ones! This set of headphones will be part of your future – for a good while.


SIG Group Enterprise, Inc is a designer electronics company. We are seeking funding to complete manufacturing, marketing and to launch our products. Help us make this project into a reality by donating to our campaign. We need your support.  Be a part of a legacy.

THE SIG STUDIO PRO -  FIRST SAMPLE. (ON SALE UNTIL DEC 7th!!!)

SIG BELIEVES IN HIGH QUALITY AND ABOVE STANDARDS WHEN IT COMES TO ENGINEERING AND CREATIVITY. OUR STUDIO PROS ARE FLEXIBLE AS WE KNOW THIS IS AN EQUIPMENT THAT IS USED DAILY BY DJS, ENGINEERS AND THE CONSUMER. WE CREATED A HEADPHONE THAT IS DURABLE.

   

                     

We now have samples and they are currently being distributed to Top Djs for testing and feedback so far the results have been overwhelming.  Everyone who has checked out the sound are saying these are the best in quality, comfort, sound and look.  We’ve harnessed the best engineering technology and design to provide amazing features for the comfort of our consumers.  We have the best quality control specialists our manufacturing partners who will deliver the headphones in a timely manner.

                  

We’ve turned to Indiegogo to open our idea to you and the awesome community of the sound tech-savvy who appreciate greatness around the world. We want to learn from you, and with your support, we will get this product to market that much faster. Our product components are almost ready for mass production, but only your help will get us there. We have expertise in manufacturing products, and we have partnered with manufacturers that are experienced in the electronics industries. All together, we can make this happen.

                 

Presenting SIG STUDIO PRO; fashionable, clear acoustic sounding headphones without distortion. You blast your sounds while in the street, doing yoga exercises, dj'ing, in the recording studio  or studying without disturbance in high fashion. These headphones were carefully designed and engineered to ensure the best sound quality while looking good.  We have been working on this project for over 2 years to get you the best sound. Our engineers are originally from Amsterdam, Holland.  Music genius Wyclef Jean was one of the first music producer/engineer to test the headphones.

SIG STUDIO STREET PRO

Speaker size : 50mm

Sensitivity  :106±3 dB ( at 1kHz 0.5 Vrms)

Impedance : 16 Ohm

Frequency Response : 20-20000Hz

Plug type : 3.5mm

Cord Length: 380±15cm

Microphone  Dimensions :φ 4.0 × 1.5 mm

Sensitivity :﹣42dB±3dB

Frequency Response : 30-16000Hz

Directivity :  Ominidirectional

SIG DICE II SOUNDOFF

Speaker size : 40mm

Sensitivity  :105±3 dB ( at 1kHz 0.5 Vrms)

Impedance : 32 Ohm

Frequency Response : 20-20000Hz

Noise reduction range : 20-1000Hz

Plug type : 3.5mm

Cord Length: 120±15cm

Maximum noise reduction depth:20dB

Rated voltage:3.7v

Battery life:about 80 hours

                      


                                          DICE EDITION WIRELESS BLUETOOTH 

Specs support: SIG01
Hands Free
Bluetooth V4.0
Support Bluetooth HSP, HFP
A2DP and AVRCP
Support iPhone battery status indicator
Multipoint A2DP Connection
Multipoint HFP Connection
Talk time: 20 hours
Music play time: 14 hours
Standby time: 800 hours
Battery specification: 3.7V/400mAh
Weight: 162g
Size: 174*40.7*159.85mm
Frequency responds range: 2.40-2.48GHz Range: 10M = 32ft

                 

We are also compiling a coalition of DJs globally to be ambassadors of which they will tour globally. Part of the DJs responsibility will not only to promote the brand but to be positive role models to the youths. This will be measured by the amount of school and community involvements. Top DJs will receive their own signature product which will improve and increase the sales of the products. DJs will tour with artists while promoting the brand.  Some of these concerts will include the SIG SOUNDOFF (silent concert with headphones only) Concert Series.  This will bring massive promotion to the brand.  All SIG movement with DJs will be filmed and compiled into a docu-series and distributed via our Youtube Channel. 

Our ultimate goal is to build factories for assemble in rural areas of the US as well as the Caribbean to create employment and enhance economic development.  After the first launch we will start our "Its My Turn by SIG" a global campaign for middle - high schools. Each school will invent/design/create their own product and a winner will be decided by our Indiegogo Hall of Fame members. This is our way of giving back. The winning school will receive funding for the 'Student In-Need Program" as well as annual funding from the product designed.  The designing class will collect 50%  from annual sale of the product.


                

December: Crowd funding and Phase 1 of the manufacturing process

January: Intensive Product Testing, Reviews and Aggressive Marketing Campaign

February: Quality Control Checks and begin order fulfillment

March: Delivery!

                   

We have been working for 2 years developing SIG STUDIO PRO headphones and is in full gear for mass production. We created the mold and already have sample products that have been given to celebrities, recording studio engineers, radio personalities and Club DJs. We know what the next steps are for manufacturing and fulfillment and have great partners ready to start. However, we know that while mass production is in progress, we may encounter some problems. We have plans to mitigate all the risks and have enlisted great advisors that will also help.

Marketing and Brand Awareness: 

We need to create the tooling to expose the product to the marketplace and build brand awareness. This process is complex and requires expertise, time and money. Complications could potentially emerge and delay our schedule as well. To tackle this risk, we've selected partners that can work closely with us through the whole process.

FAQ's

We’re overwhelmed with the feedback and questions received here, on email, Twitter, Facebook and everywhere. Here are the questions more frequently asked! Feel free to leave a comment or email us at info@sound-is-genius.com !!!

                     


                                                                  

                           Adam Pasholk - CFO and Co-Founding Member.

New York University graduate in International Studies & Finance. Has 14 years’ experience in Investment Banking and business development. Is an experienced entrepreneur and avid world traveler including Asia, Middle East and Europe. 

                                                               

                                                                

                        Dawn Simpson – CEO and Co-Founding Member.

Extensive background in Investment banking, Advertising  Film and Music. She holds a degree in International Studies  & Global Economics from New York University.  A world traveler including most of Europe, New Zealand, Asia, with background in Music, Advertising and Finance. 


                                                               

                    Richard "Chubb Rock" Simpson - Chief Sound Officer

Legendary recording artist, song writer music producer and radio personality.  A former National Merit Scholar, attended Brown University and is SIG's CSO who monitor's the quality of sound in the products.  He has brought his extensive music experience to assist in the creation of products.


                                                                

                                   Brandon Folkes COO & Co-Designer

Attended Morgan State University. In charge of testing and to ensure customer satisfaction. Music enthusiast and highly involved in nanotechnology materials industry...

                                          

                          

                                    Lorance Roozeno - Acoustic Engineer

I am an electrical engineer with a specialization in acoustic engineering. Developing the circuitry, that is the heart of the SIG Headphones, was a great pleasure to do. My experience at SIG has been and has also allowed me to develop in many other areas including public speaking and team-building

                                    

                                            THANK YOU FROM THE SIG TEAM!!
story_txt:
Experience clear, powerful and well balanced 
sound.  Lightweight and around the ear fit for all day comfort. We use 
high quality materials and finishes. We have limitless color combination
 that suits your lifestyle. Pre-Order Now!DJ’s, musicians, computer users and people who love 
good music all know the pain of inadequate or broken down headphones. 
The Sig Studio Street Pro is Sound Genius – extra-durable, over-the-ears
 headphones in designer colors. Sig Group Enterprise is offering their 
headphones for sale through the Indiegogo “Sound is Genius” crowdfunding
 campaign.
So what makes Sig headphones stand out from all the 
other headphones on the market? First off, it has great sound quality. 
If you are a music lover or if you appreciate the nuances of the spoken 
word, quality is important in a set of headphones. Second, they are over
 the ear. That means comfort for your ears – no weenty ear-buds that 
grow uncomfortable after hours of use. It also means that these 
headphones can be used by people who normally wear hearing aids. Third, 
they are super durable. That makes them “headphones for the future”
 because you won’t be buying a new pair the week after you get the first
 ones! This set of headphones will be part of your future – for a good 
while.SIG Group
Enterprise, Inc is a designer electronics company. We are seeking funding to complete
manufacturing, marketing and to launch our products. 
Help
us make this project into a reality by donating to our campaign. We need your
support.  Be a part of a legacy. THE SIG STUDIO PRO -  FIRST SAMPLE. (ON SALE UNTIL DEC 7th!!!)SIG BELIEVES IN HIGH QUALITY AND ABOVE STANDARDS WHEN IT COMES TO ENGINEERING AND CREATIVITY. OUR STUDIO PROS ARE FLEXIBLE AS WE KNOW THIS IS AN EQUIPMENT THAT IS USED DAILY BY DJS, ENGINEERS AND THE CONSUMER. WE CREATED A HEADPHONE THAT IS DURABLE.    
                      
We now have samples and
they are currently being distributed to Top Djs for testing and feedback so far
the results have been overwhelming.  Everyone who has checked out the
sound are saying these are the best in quality, comfort, sound and look. 
We’ve harnessed the best engineering technology and design to provide amazing
features for the comfort of our consumers.  We have the best quality
control specialists our manufacturing partners who will deliver the headphones
in a timely manner.                   
We’ve turned to
Indiegogo to open our idea to you and the awesome community of the sound
tech-savvy who appreciate greatness around the world. We want to learn from
you, and with your support, we will get this product to market that much
faster. Our product components are almost ready for mass production, but only
your help will get us there. We have expertise in manufacturing products, and
we have partnered with manufacturers that are experienced in the electronics
industries. All together, we can make this happen.
                  
Presenting SIG STUDIO
PRO; fashionable, clear acoustic sounding headphones without distortion. You
blast your sounds while in the street, doing yoga exercises, dj'ing, in the
recording studio  or studying without disturbance in high fashion. These
headphones were carefully designed and engineered to ensure the best sound
quality while looking good.  We have been working on this project for over
2 years to get you the best sound. Our engineers are originally from Amsterdam,
Holland.  Music genius Wyclef Jean was one of the first music producer/engineer
to test the headphones. 
SIG STUDIO STREET PRO
Speaker size : 50mm 
Sensitivity 
:106±3 dB ( at 1kHz 0.5 Vrms) 
Impedance : 16 Ohm 
Frequency Response : 20-20000Hz 
Plug type : 3.5mm 
Cord Length: 380±15cm 
Microphone 
Dimensions :φ 4.0 × 1.5 mm
Sensitivity :﹣42dB±3dB 
Frequency Response : 30-16000Hz 
Directivity : 
Ominidirectional

SIG DICE II SOUNDOFF
Speaker size : 40mm 
Sensitivity  :105±3 dB
( at 1kHz 0.5 Vrms) 
Impedance : 32 Ohm 
Frequency Response : 20-20000Hz
Noise reduction range : 20-1000Hz 
Plug type : 3.5mm 
Cord Length: 120±15cm 
Maximum noise reduction depth:20dB
Rated voltage:3.7v
Battery life:about 80 hours                                                                 DICE EDITION WIRELESS BLUETOOTH Specs support: SIG01Hands FreeBluetooth V4.0Support Bluetooth HSP, HFPA2DP and AVRCP Support iPhone battery status indicatorMultipoint A2DP ConnectionMultipoint HFP ConnectionTalk time: 20 hoursMusic play time: 14 hoursStandby time: 800 hoursBattery specification: 3.7V/400mAhWeight: 162gSize: 174*40.7*159.85mmFrequency responds range: 2.40-2.48GHz Range: 10M = 32ft                  
We are also compiling a coalition of DJs
globally to be ambassadors of which they will tour globally. Part of the
DJs responsibility will not only to promote the brand but to be positive role
models to the youths. This will be measured by the amount of school and
community involvements. Top DJs will receive their own signature product which
will improve and increase the sales of the products. DJs will tour with artists
while promoting the brand.  Some of these
concerts will include the SIG SOUNDOFF (silent concert with headphones only)
Concert Series.  This will bring massive
promotion to the brand.  All SIG movement
with DJs will be filmed and compiled into a docu-series and distributed via our
Youtube Channel.  
Our ultimate goal is to
build factories for assemble in rural areas of the US as well as the Caribbean
to create employment and enhance economic development.  After the first
launch we will start our "Its My Turn by SIG" a global campaign for
middle - high schools. Each school will invent/design/create their own product
and a winner will be decided by our Indiegogo Hall of Fame members. This is our
way of giving back. The winning school will receive funding for the 'Student
In-Need Program" as well as annual funding from the product
designed.  The designing class will collect 50%  from annual sale of
the product.                 
December: Crowd funding
and Phase 1 of the manufacturing process
January: Intensive
Product Testing, Reviews and Aggressive Marketing Campaign
February: Quality
Control Checks and begin order fulfillment
March: Delivery!

                    
We
have been working for 2 years developing SIG STUDIO PRO headphones and is in
full gear for mass production. We created the mold and already have sample
products that have been given to celebrities, recording studio engineers, radio
personalities and Club DJs. We know what the next steps are for manufacturing and
fulfillment and have great partners ready to start. However, we know that while
mass production is in progress, we may encounter some problems. We have plans
to mitigate all the risks and have enlisted great advisors that will also help.
Marketing
and Brand Awareness: 
We need to create the tooling to expose the product to the
marketplace and build brand awareness. This process is complex and requires
expertise, time and money. Complications
could potentially emerge and delay our schedule as well. To tackle this risk,
we've selected partners that can work closely with us through the whole process.
FAQ's
We’re overwhelmed with the feedback and questions received here, on email,
Twitter, Facebook and everywhere. Here are the questions more frequently asked!
Feel free to leave a comment or email us at info@sound-is-genius.com !!!

New York University graduate in International Studies & Finance. Has 14
years’ experience in Investment Banking and business development. Is an experienced
entrepreneur and avid world traveler including
Asia, Middle East and Europe.                                                                                                                                   

                        Dawn Simpson – CEO and Co-Founding
Member.
Extensive
background in Investment banking, Advertising 
Film and Music. She holds a degree in International Studies  & Global Economics from New York
University.  A world traveler including
most of Europe, New Zealand, Asia, with background in Music, Advertising and
Finance.                                                                  
                    Richard "Chubb
Rock" Simpson - Chief Sound Officer
Legendary
recording artist, song writer music producer and radio personality.  A
former National Merit Scholar, attended Brown University and is SIG's CSO who
monitor's the quality of sound in the products.  He has brought his
extensive music experience to assist in the creation of products.
                                                                


                                   Brandon
Folkes COO & Co-Designer
Attended
Morgan State University. In charge of testing and to ensure customer
satisfaction. Music enthusiast and highly involved in nanotechnology materials
industry...

story:
Sonic Unity presents the NuPrime WR-100 (MSRP: $99 USD, $119 Euro), an easy to use, multi-zone wireless audio receiver powered by Qualcomm® AllPlay™, that allows you to stream music simultaneously across as many as ten different audio zones throughout your home.

[Crowdfunding price starts at $49 and production has already began. This is a pre-sale project for early adopters. If you need to purchase more than 2 units, contact sales@sonicunity.com or post comment here and we will provide the Perks if there is sufficient demand]

Demo showing Master Bedroom playing music from local server and Living Room music streaming from Spotify.

The NuPrime WR-100 connects easily to your existing stereo or powered speaker, instantly transforming it to a state-of-the art, high-resolution wireless streaming audio device.

Stream studio master sound files up to 24-bit/96kHz throughout your home. Multi-zone or all zones together in party mode!

Steam your favorite music to the living room, kitchen, dining room, bedroom - the NuPrime WR-100 can deliver audiophile quality streaming audio to any place in your home.

With the WR-100, you can stream high-resolution music from the following sources:
  • Online music services such as Spotify, Rhapsody, Napster and many others*
  • Music from local network media server or NAS
  • Music local to your smart phone or tablet.

For a complete list of supported online services, refer to https://www.qualcomm.com/products/allplay
*Both iOS and Android systems are supported.

The NuPrime WR-100 is very easy to use with the NuPrime iOS and Android app.

  1. The App will detect the presence of the receivers in the network.
  2. Name the WR-100 receivers, e.g., "Living Room," "Master Bedroom," etc.
  3. Select the music source.  In this demo, music is streamed from Spotify to the Living Room and to the Master Bedroom from local server.
  4. Play the music and select the speaker.  Local music is played from NuPrime app and online music is played from Spotify app. You select the music and speaker from within Spotify app. 

NuPrime WR-100 is compatible with the NuPrime Omnia Audio system (releasing June, 2016) for a complete whole home audio solution. It is expandable!

Why choose the Qualcomm® AllPlay™ compatible system?
  • Wireless speakers and audio devices that use the Qualcomm® AllPlay™ smart media platform can work together seamlessly regardless of product brand.
  • AllPlay media streaming synchronisation technology lets you play a song in sync in multiple rooms.
  • Switch to multi-zone to play different music in every room from a single device.
  • Use separate volume controls for each zone or one master control for all.

Features

  • Wi-Fi Audio Adapter 
  • Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n dual band 2R2
  • RJ45 port
  • Decode high resolution music formats 24-bit/96kHz
  • Multi-zones 
  • Party Mode (sound synchronization)
  • DLNA compatible 
  • Over-The-Air firmware upgrades from internet 
  • Select between WPS and Direct mode / Reset
  • WPS & Direct Mode (AP mode)
  • LED Display: One multicolour LED (Yellow: Booting, Flashing White: Connection, Stable White: Connected) 
  • Internet radio service (Tune-in service via companion App) 
  • Accessories: USB-A to micro USB cable 80 cm. 
  • Power requirement: 5V - 1A (via AC adapter not included). Compatible with standard 5V USB charger and NuPrime digital port.
  • Size: 130 (W) x 80 (D) x 30 (H) mm
  • Requires usage of Android or iOS tablet/Phone

Bluetooth and Airplay are not supported for this model.

Inputs:

  • 1 X 3.5mm Analog Stereo Line-In with re-streaming capability, controlled by APP.

Outputs:

  • 1 X Optical SPDIF and 1 X 3.5mm Analog Stereo Line-Out (OdBm) sharing the same output jack
  • 1 X Coaxial (SPDIF on micro USB connector). Compatible with NuPrime digital port for data and power supply

Comparison with Chromecast Audio ($35)

  • WR-100 has RJ-45 for wired internet streaming
  • WR-100 has analog input for re-streaming
  • WR-100 can operate with its own WiFi network in AP mode. 

Add the Celsus Sound SP One (MSRP $649 USD) active speaker system (Bluetooth and Line-In) in natural bamboo and brushed metal finish for incredible sound quality in a compact wireless package.

"Spacious sound stage, commanding bass, exemplary coherence and musicality"
Size notwithstanding, the Celsus SP-One speaker can fill a room with audiophile-quality sound. The SP-One’s expansive soundstage, commanding bass and overall musicality puts it at the forefront of “bookshelf” speakers. 
For more personal applications, the SP-One’s excellent nearfield characteristics, especially at low volume settings, makes it the perfect desktop companion. The SP One's enclosure is made of a dense, premium-quality, naturally finished bamboo. The carbon-fibre woofer, featuring an aluminum waveguide, nicely complements the cabinet's sophisticated styling

Premium-quality, naturally finished bamboo

Carbon-Fibre Woofer and Tweeter with Aluminum Waveguide plus premium connectors and parts used throughout

Features

  • Enclosure is made of a dense, premium-quality, naturally finished bamboo
  • Carbon Fiber Woofer with wave reflection structure and custom-designed magnet together produces 55Hz deep bass and the most coherent sound.
  • Soft dome, horn-loaded tweeter for a wide dispersion of highs
  • A single custom capacitor replaces complex crossover for a more detailed and vivid sound.
  • Double cavity cabinet design allows for deep bass and powerful dynamics.
  • Optimized active speaker design

Specification

  • Frequency Response: 55Hz to 22kHz
  • Impedance: 6 Ohms
  • Power Rating: 60W
  • Sensitivity: 88db
  • Inputs: Bluetooth & Line In
  • Power Supply: AC adapter (DC19.5V, 3.16A)
  • 5V DC charging Port for external accessory
  • Dimension (H x W x D): 195 X 130 X 180mm
  • Weight: 2.3Kg


* AllPlay is built on the AllJoyn™ framework, hosted by the AllSeen Alliance, to break through limitations of vertical solutions, such as a lack of flexibility and uncertain interoperability. With AllPlay, your favorite speakers can also interact with other connected devices in the larger ecosystem of the Internet of Everything. 

The WR-100 has been designed by NuPrime Audio and D-Stream Audio. NuPrime Audio is the designer and manufacturer of some of the best audio products available on the market today. NuPrime has been awarded four, 2015 - Product Of The Year Awards from The Absolute Sound and SoundStage! Network, an unheard-of achievement in high-end audio.  D-Stream's CEO Denys Roussel is an expert in wireless technology and was instrumental in developing the world's first digital TV receiver at a telecommunication company in France.

Together with the award winning design team at NuPrime and wireless experts at D-Stream, Sonic Unity is proud to present the NuPrime WR-100. It's guaranteed to provide you with the very best in sound quality. NuPrime has the accolades to back up this claim.

Sonic Unity was formed in early 2015 as a collaboration between a group of music lovers, audio experts, musicians, and audiophiles. Our aim was to offer the best possible sound regardless of price -- products that offer the listener a true high-end audio listening experience.

Together with their manufacturing partners, Sonic Unity CEO Rick Hopkins and development partner Jason Lim have created a worldwide on-line store, dedicated to offering unique high-quality audio products and unique portable audio devices.

With a background in music, concert design, consumer and pro audio, Rick's experience and passion for sound reproduction, is unique. As a designer, Rick has created concert events for Bryan Adams, Rush, Van Halen, Spinal Tap, Rod Stewart and The Rolling Stones. He has provided planning and site management for music festivals such as Lollapalooza featuring acts such as Primus, Alice in Chains, Tool, Rage Against the Machine, The Smashing Pumpkins, and Green Day. Rick has also worked with architect Mark Fisher, designer for U2, Genesis, Pink Floyd, The Rolling Stones and many others.

Jason Lim is an established audio industry leader who co-founded NuForce and served as its CEO from 2004 to 2013. Jason and NuForce have been featured in Forbes magazine as well as Wired, Stereophile, c|net, The New York Times, The Absolute Sound, Hi-Fi+ and Sound and Vision. Serving as CEO of NuPrime Audio, Jason has led the company to four Product Of The Year Awards in 2015, achieving a new record in the high-end audio industry.

Among the top awards that Jason gathered over the years were: 

  • Four Product Of The Year Awards for 2015 from The Absolute Sound and SoundStage! Network.
  • Two Editors Choice Awards for earphones by Wired magazine, with one being awarded the "Best Under $50"
  • Two Power Amp Of The Year Awards from audiophile magazines in the USA and Japan

With a proven track record developing high-fidelity audio products, Jason Lim has the industry experience to deliver the products as promised.

Sonic Unity, together with our development team, brings new high-performance audio products to market through crowdfunding and social media campaigns. We invite you to share in our goal of providing superior sounding, high quality audio products that perform well above their price point, to a greater number of people.

With our team of audiophiles and our experienced manufacturing partner, we have what it takes to make this happen! Our combined experience designing award winning audio products has resulted in numerous audio awards and industry accolades. 

As our third crowdfunding project and fifth audio product introduced through Indiegogo, we have the experience not only to create this exceptional audio product but to deliver your product in a timely fashion. 

Production will begin in March with the first units shipping at the middle of April. We are very confident with the production schedule being on time.

The risks and challenges are minimal. We already have several working samples created. Research and development has been completed. All we need now is your support and you can own one of the most high performance, wireless audio solutions available on the market today.

We need your help. Tell your friends about us. Share us on Facebook, Pinterest, Instagram, Twitter and other social media. Post on reddit and other audio forums like Head-Fi and Headphonics. Use the Indiegogo share tools to get the word out and let people know about this great new product. 

Visit the Sonic Unity on-line store and sign up for our newsletter. We will keep you informed every step of the way throughout the manufacturing process as well as about new products. You will be among the first to hear about what we have planned next.

Interested? Sign up and tell your friends about us. There is more to come!

What we have to offer is outstanding value but we can't depend on marketing dollars to get us there. Lend us a hand and together we can create a truly remarkable products that anyone can afford.

The NuPrime WR-100. Whole home, audiophile quality, high-resolution wireless hi-fi audio.

Excellent sound quality. Affordable pricing. That's what we have to offer.

Sonic Unity. We are passionate about music.

www.sonicunity.com

story:
Let us start by saying we are aware of that large goal we set. We are shooting for the stars with our flex fund & happy with whatever we get - We know most pods start with nothing & are just looking for whatever help we can get - Preview is coming!

SEND US TO CRIMECON & GET OUR TRADING CARDS GOING!

Jasmine & Sara met over their love of True Crime, Murder, Serial Killers, Oddities, the Macabre.... oh ya & reality TV... (but that doesn't make us any less badass)

The goal is to be a highly researched, funny, witty dark podcast about everything that makes them *Morbidly Curious*

We will never sell out, we will never guess at a fact, we will always have fun!

 

The beginning of JASARA:
 

JASARA met in a weeeeird way (because you see, it was FATE!)

Both huge fans of True Crime & Podcasts, the girls are both active in many True Crime Podcast Facebook groups.

Sara had to go to LA for business & while there was desperately hoping to visit The Museum of Death in Hollywood. Since she was with her co-workers & wasn’t sure she’d be able to get anyone to go with her, she reached out to one of her pages asking if anyone would be in the area & would like to meet her there. GUESS WHAT! Two girls from the group reached out & actually met her there to enjoy the morbidly curious museum. One of those girls was JAZZY!

After that, they became instant friends & talk every day, mostly about the dirty, creepy, CURIOUS world of murder, deceit & DEATH! (oh ya… & Bravo TV…)

 

A plea from the girls:

 

To kick off our podcast, we are hoping to attend the 2017 CrimeCon in Indianapolis in June. In order to do this, we need to raise funds to attend, equipment to record our experience there so we are able to share the content with our listeners, purchase some commemorative memorabilia that we hope to give away to listeners & network with the True Crime community!

We want to put out the best podcast we can. This means we need to upgrade our equipment. We are asking for your help to get us appropriate equipment so we can put something out that isn’t horrible to listen to!

We really want an interactive community. This means we are working to have a very open forum with our social media & even have teaser hints about what our next case will be. Followers will be encouraged to follow & respond with their guesses of what case/topic we will cover next & we will be open to public votes!!!

follow @extramorbid on twitter & Instagram!

 

We’d also like to get a head start to have merch available for our listeners. T-shirts, stickers, posters of our beautiful faces (ok, maybe not posters) everything we hope will be an incentive to get in on the ground floor with us, since we know you’ll own them proudly & you’ll be able to say “I helped them get started!” (Merch will be available once we get launched & established. Discount codes for future merch will be provided to all backers because we love you!)

In addition to the merch, we'd also LOVE to start a collection of "Killer Trading Cards". We've seen the ones that are out there &... eh. We think we can do better. We'd like to get these printed up nicely & send out some special trading cards to our backers, too! (see concept cards below!)

 

For our backers, you’ll get fun stuff like postcards, trading cards, original Macabre art by Sara (see options of prints below), shout outs on the pod! Go You!!!

We also both work full time, so we need help with the little things: website design & upkeep, audio editing, social media. Any little amount we can afford to raise to help pay for someone to help us with these little things would be a huge get!

 

We are currently trying to twist the arm of our buddy Zach (who Sara actually did end up dragging to the Museum of Death with her, too!) to help us out, at least part time (Hi Zach!). Hopefully, Zach will be our Producer/Assistant. This means we need to get him the equipment he needs, too. (& perhaps enough to bribe him with a six pack of Heineken) 

 

We’d like to start as soon as possible. We are making this a 45-day campaign in hopes we can get the word out & have enough time to raise our goal.

Final Thoughts:

If listening to two dope ass bitches teach you about some of the craziest cases from well known to obscure, help us out!!!

story:
Short Summary

I'm Lex Nappa and I'm passionate about encouraging people to tell their stories. As a former psychologist and member of the LGBTQ+ community, I want to use my ability to talk to folks in order to spread stories of success from people and identities that have traditionally been marginalized or erased. Dream Catchers podcast is all about highlighting people who are following their passion and pursuing a dream, spreading positivity throughout the community and beyond in creative ways. Anyone who contributes is supporting the telling of these stories!

What We Need & What You Get

Here are just a few of the things we need to keep this project going:

  • Website Maintenance
  • Syndication/distribution/advertising costs
  • Hardware improvements
  • Software improvements
  • Podcasting space improvements

The Impact

Your contribution will keep the life force behind this project flowing. This is a unique opportunity to be part of a project that values stories from all voices and all identities, which is so needed, especially in this political climate.

Other Ways You Can Help

Here are some other ways you can help if donating isn't an option:

  • Get the word out about the campaign! Share with friends through social media.
  • Visit and interact on my social media through facebook (fb.me/dreamcatchpc), twitter (@dreamcatchpc), and instagram (dreamcatcherspodcast).

story:
Make the American Boxcar Chorus Great Again

Great artists produce great albums. The Great American Boxcar Chorus produces Great American Boxcar Chorus albums. But to actually be great, you must do. The GABC last put out a studio project in 2011. It's time to do what we do best. Time to do. Time to be GREAT again.

  • With the collection of songs we have assembled, coupled with John Evans- the King of the Underground- as our producer, we are well on our way to achieving just that.
  • Making a new Boxcar album with all of the stops pulled is important because these songs help to provide highly original GABC music for those who are without- which is everyone in the world.
  • A record is being made. What kind-of a record that gets made depends on the level of involvement from those who contribute. For this to be GREAT, we need a great pledge from all of our fans, friends, and family that are in a position to do so. We need YOU to be GREAT! 

What We Need & What You Get

It is very simple:

  • We need about $9,000 to cover everything we would like to do. That added to the thousands we have already saved will cover studio time with a producer and engineer, mixing and mastering, artwork, printing/pressing costs, etc. We are making an album whether we meet this goal or not, but if our goal is not met, we may have to record only a small handful of songs vs. a full-length album, and we may have to cut other corners that would limit the scope and sound of what we are trying to accomplish as a whole. 
  • This isn't something for nothing! We have some very unique perks! Everyone who backs us gets a copy of the album, but only those who pledge at particular levels will get a house concert by the GABC & John Evans, or handmade BOXCARt, etc. 
  • If we do not reach our goal, the funds will still go toward helping us make the best album that money can buy with the money that we have to work with. It is gonna be good no matter what... but with your help, it will be GREAT!

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone is in a position to contribute, but that doesn't mean that you can't help:

  • Help us get the word out and make some noise about this record! Our fundraising efforts will only last a few short weeks; spread the love!
  • Just hit share by using the Indiegogo share tools on the far right of the page!

We appreciate your support and encouragement. This thing is gonna be a dandy!

story:
- MINI TROLL -

THE WORLD'S SMALLEST VIBRATION SPEAKER

Mini Troll turns anything into a speaker by literally
spreading the sound waves through the material it is placed upon

Available in 5 exclusive colors

TROLL MINI IS THE SMALLEST RESONANCE SPEAKER ON THE MARKET

Mini Troll is small enough to fit in your jeans mini-pocket.

  

High quality standards, designed in Italy

     

Discover the complete product range: see also Troll PLUS, Orbit and Mamba below in this page.

FEATURED ON

  

OUR CUSTOMER SAY ABOUT US

Dylan
"This is truly amazing, I love my friends' reaction when I hold it in my hands, it plays music at a very low volume then I just put it on the table and BOOM!
You definitely did an awesome work on this product!"

Dakridis
"Just to say, my Mini Troll is awesome. The sound is superb and the design is simply brilliant."

Patrick
"I'm using the Mini-Troll for a about a month now. It works perfectly for me. The sound depends as expected on the surface but delivers very nicely. Great work."

Junewon
"I'm pleasantly surprised with what it can do. Tried it on multiple surfaces and you can definitely tell the difference with the size of the surface area. Very happy with it so far"

Banks
"Massively impressed. No connectivity issues & really good Bluetooth range. The Trolls themselves look terrific & I had great fun playing audio whilst carrying it around before placing it on different surfaces. Super cool! Can't wait to use these on holiday."

Matthew
"I love that the sound of the song reflects what it is attached to!"

Naveen
"Must say I was surprised to see the sound output: bigger the surface, better sound. I was not expecting to get such output from such small device."

: POWER BEYOND SIZE

  

Thanks to their innovative Vibration Resonance Technology, Vibe-Tribe Vibration Speakers allow much higher sound compared with traditional speakers of equal size on the market and still maintain extremely portable dimensions.

 WHERE DOES POWER COME FROM?

Vibe-Tribe's technology is able to multiply the effectiveness of the audio source leveraging on the VIBRATION RESONANCE principle.

  

Mini Troll's Vibration Core exposed - 3D animation

The revolution in this technology comes with its RESONANCE CORE, which converts electromagnetic pulses into vibrations and spreads the sound directly across any surface, transforming it into a powerful sound source.

TRADITIONAL SPEAKERS VS

          1. Sound directivity

Traditional speakers project the sound in one single direction. Instead, all Vibe-Tribe vibration speakers transfer the sound to the surface upon which they are placed and spread the soundwaves 360° throughout the surrounding area, creating a Surround Effect.

2. Sound transmission

In all traditional speakers the sound is propagated from a small membrane and this naturally limits the sound power. Instead, with Vibe-Tribe vibration speakers the sound is projected by the mass of the chosen surface, allowing much higher sound level.

 

HOW WORKS

 

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

           

  • Dimensions: Ø 1.6" x H 1.6" (Ø 4,2 cm x H 4,2 cm)                 
  • Weight: 150 grams
  • Output Power (RMS): 3W
  • Audio Sources: 3.5" jack from PC, phones, tablets, MP3 players, consoles... Wireless from any Bluetooth enabled devices
  • Mic: Built-in Microphone with noise cancellation for Hands Free calls
  • S/N Ratio: 80 dB
  • Frequency Range: 160Hz - 16kHz
  • Battery: Li-Ion 400mAh / 4h playback time
  • Bluetooth Range: Up to 30m
  • Bluetooth Specs: V 4.0 compliant
  • Bluetooth Profiles: Advanced Audio Distribution Profile (A2DP) 1.2, Hands Free Profile (HPF) 1.6, Audio/Video Remote Control Profile (AVRCP) 1.4
  • Package includes: Mini Troll Resonance Speaker, Jack+USB / microUSB cable, Spare Vacuum Base, User Manual in 6 languages (En, Fr, It, Es, De, Pt).
     

NEED FOR MORE POWER?
TAKE A LOOK AT TROLL PLUS, ORBIT AND MAMBA

Troll PLUS is Troll Mini's bigger version, with its 12W power, Bluetooth 4.0 and NFC technology for wireless connection, built-in microphone for Hands Free calls, vacuum base for perfect adherence to surfaces and still extremely compact.

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

  • Dimensions: Ø 2.5" x H 2.5" (Ø 6,4 cm x H 6,4 cm)                 
  • Weight: 450 grams
  • Output Power (RMS): 12W
  • Audio Sources: 3.5" jack from PC, phones, tablets, MP3 players, consoles... Wireless from any Bluetooth enabled devices
  • Mic: Built-in Microphone with noise cancellation for Hands Free calls
  • S/N Ratio: 80 dB
  • Frequency Range: 160Hz - 16kHz
  • Battery: Li-Ion 1100mAh / 5h playback time
  • Bluetooth Range: Up to 30m
  • Bluetooth Specs: V 4.0 compliant, Supported by Near Field Communication
  • Bluetooth Profiles: Advanced Audio Distribution Profile (A2DP) 1.2, Hands Free Profile (HPF) 1.6, Audio/Video Remote Control Profile (AVRCP) 1.

In case you have any other question, please take a look at FAQ's or email us.

15W of pure energy, an irresistible design and the extraordinary Vibration Resonance technology concentrated in a sphere that can you can carry in your hand: this is the portrait of Orbit, one of Vibe-Tribe's family bestsellers.
Orbit integrates Bluetooth 4.0 and NFC technology for wireless connection, built-in microphone for Hands Free calls and vacuum base for perfect adherence to surfaces.

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

  • Dimensions: Ø 2.5" x H 2.5" (Ø 6,4 cm x H 6,4 cm)                 
  • Weight: 450 grams
  • Output Power (RMS): 15W
  • Audio Sources: 3.5" jack from PC, phones, tablets, MP3 players, consoles... Wireless from any Bluetooth enabled devices
  • Mic: Built-in Microphone with noise cancellation for Hands Free calls
  • S/N Ratio: 80 dB
  • Frequency Range: 160Hz - 16kHz
  • Battery: Li-Ion 1400mAh / 5h playback time
  • Bluetooth Range: Up to 30m
  • Bluetooth Specs: V 4.0 compliant, Supported by Near Field Communication
  • Bluetooth Profiles: Advanced Audio Distribution Profile (A2DP) 1.2, Hands Free Profile (HPF) 1.6, Audio/Video Remote Control Profile (AVRCP) 1.4

In case you have any other question, please take a look at FAQ's or email us.

Mamba is world's most powerful Vibration speaker: 18W power in just 2.5"! Its daisy chain interface is a brand new feature that allows to link more Mambas together, multiplying the power by the number of connected devices. The vacuum base guarantees perfect adherence to surfaces.

It is incredibly complete, with Bluetooth 4.0 and NFC technology to connect the device with a simple touch. The built-in speakerphone, with a latest generation echo-cancelling microphone, allows to manage calls directly with touch controls.

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

  • Dimensions: Ø 2.5" x H 2.5" (Ø 6,4 cm x H 6,4 cm)                 
  • Weight: 450 grams
  • Output Power (RMS): 18W
  • Audio Sources: 3.5" jack from PC, phones, tablets, MP3 players, consoles... Wireless from any Bluetooth enabled devices
  • Mic: Built-in Microphone with noise cancellation for Hands Free calls
  • Controls: Capacitive Touch Panel
  • S/N Ratio: 80 dB
  • Frequency Range: 160Hz - 16kHz
  • Battery: Li-Ion 1400mAh / 5h playback time
  • Bluetooth Range: Up to 30m
  • Bluetooth Specs: V 4.0 compliant, Supported by Near Field Communication
  • Bluetooth Profiles: Advanced Audio Distribution Profile (A2DP) 1.2, Hands Free Profile (HPF) 1.6, Audio/Video Remote Control Profile (AVRCP) 1.4

In case you have any other question, please take a look at FAQ's or email us.

COMPATIBILITY

        

WORLDWIDE WARRANTY        

SHIPPING DETAILS

  • United States: delivers within 8-10 business days after it ships.
  • Canada: delivers within 8-10 business days after it ships.
  • Europe: delivers within 8-10 business days after it ships.
  • Everywhere else: delivers within 10-15 business days after it ships.

RETURNS & REFUNDS POLICY

For returns and refunds please contact us within 7 days from delivery and ship items back within 15 days from delivery.

Buyers are responsible for return shipping costs. If the item is not returned in its original condition, the buyer is responsible for any loss in value.

To be eligible for full refund, your article must be returned in its original packaging and must appear in the same conditions as you have received it.

For further information about our refund & return policy, please visit our Terms & Conditions.

For cancellation of order, please request cancellation within 24 hours from purchase.

  FAQ's

On what surfaces can I use Vibe-Tribe vibration speakers? Vibe-Tribe speakers work on any surface. The secret for an excellent sound reproduction is choosing the right one: our speakers work best on smooth surfaces, not too thick so that they can spread sound vibrations.

Can I stick them to windows or vertical surfaces? Vibe-Tribe speakers' suction base is engineered to guarantee perfect adherence to horizontal surfaces.

Is it possible that sound changes depending on surface? Yes, this is exactly how vibration speakers works. Sound timber depends on the surface characteristics:

Wood ► enwrapping bass & mid-sound;
Metal ► powerful bass effect
Cardboard ► vinyl effect
Glass ► clean and crystal-clear sound
Hollow wall ► "all around" effect

Does Vibe-Tribe speakers support microUSB input? Yes, Troll Mini, Troll PLUS, Orbit and Mamba come with a microUSB cable for USB (charging battery) and jack 3.5mm (line-in connection mode).

Can I use the speakers while they're charging? Yes

How long does it take to recharge battery? 1-2 hours

What if I have any other question? You can email us at any time and we’ll try to answer to your questions as best as we can. Also, you will find much more information on our WEBSITES:

Stay up to date with our latest news
► Website: www.vibe.tribe.eu

Discover the complete product range
► Official store: www.vibe-tribe-shop.com

Find out what Vibe-Tribe can do for your business.
► Business solutions: www.vibe-tribe-corporate.comFollow us on social media
► Facebook: www.facebook.com/vibetribeofficial/
► LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/vibe-tribe/
► Instagram: www.instagram.com/vibe_tribe_official/

A LOOK INSIDE 

          

 

  

 

PLAY YOUR EVERYWHERE

MEET THE TEAM

Vibe-Tribe was founded by Michele and Pietro, two engineers with a passion for electronics and music. They both have 15 experience in their respective domains ranging from design, engineering, sourcing and business administration.

They have brought together a young and committed team of employees but also freelancers and experts to help on specific tasks such as electronics design, component sourcing and logistics.

If your dreams don't scare you, they are not big enough

We bring this attitude in Vibe-Tribe, the company that was born in a garage 6 years ago and that has now more than 300'000 customers enjoying our speakers worldwide.

  FAQ's 
On what surfaces can I use Vibe-Tribe vibration speakers? Vibe-Tribe speakers work on any surface. The secret for an excellent sound reproduction is choosing the right one: our speakers work best on smooth surfaces, not too thick so that they can spread sound vibrations.Can I stick them to windows or vertical surfaces? Vibe-Tribe speakers' suction base is engineered to guarantee perfect adherence to horizontal surfaces.Is it possible that sound changes depending on surface? Yes, this is exactly how vibration speakers works. Sound timber depends on the surface characteristics:Wood ► enwrapping bass & mid-sound;Metal ► powerful bass effectCardboard ► vinyl effectGlass ► clean and crystal-clear soundHollow wall ► "all around" effectDoes Vibe-Tribe speakers support microUSB input? Yes, Troll Mini, Troll PLUS, Orbit and Mamba come with a microUSB cable for USB (charging battery) and jack 3.5mm (line-in connection mode).Can I use the speakers while they're charging? YesHow long does it take to recharge battery? 1-2 hoursWhat if I have any other question? You can email us at any time and we’ll try to answer to your questions as best as we can. PLAY YOUR EVERYWHERE

 MEET THE TEAM 
Vibe-Tribe was founded by Michele and Pietro, two engineers with a passion for electronics and music. They both have 15 experience in their respective domains ranging from design, engineering, sourcing and business administration.They have brought together a young and committed team of employees but also freelancers and experts to help on specific tasks such as electronics design, component sourcing and logistics.If your dreams don't scare you, they are not big enoughWe bring this attitude in Vibe-Tribe, the company that was born in a garage 6 years ago and that has now more than 300'000 customers enjoying our speakers worldwide.

story:
Designed from the ground up with the latest wireless and audio technology. Cupid now has an industry-leading 36 hours of listening time, QI-certified wireless charging and advanced Active Noise Cancellation. So you can rediscover the music you love.

Need to hear what’s going on around you? With a simple touch you can enter transparent mode and be more aware of your surroundings. Cupid comes equipped with full touch control convenience, so you can answer calls, skip songs, and even activate your Siri or Google Voice Assist all with a finger.

Cupid is a company that is building its heritage on the belief that “only real music will last forever.” Two German engineers, one 74 year old Canadian sound tuner, and a Chinese innovator came together to realize their vision — the universal language of sound should be made available to everyone at the highest quality.
People dance at weddings, jump up for joy when hearing their favorite song on the radio or weep during an opera performance; music transcends cultural boundaries and time itself. The team believes that such vivid experiences should be lived to their full potential.
After lots of time and dedicated efforts, the team got one step closer to their vision when they crafted a masterpiece — Cupid. With this high-performing audiophile product which features a “natural and unadorned” classic design, the world is one step closer to experiencing what wireless audio in true high-definition feels like.
