story:
As you can see in the video and from our website, we have been in business since 1991, designing and building communication products for Police, Military and Security personnel worldwide.

To make something unique, functional and comfortable for gamers, we looked to our line of products.  We wanted to eliminate the wires and bulk of headsets.  Our tactical throat microphone has always been a favorite of our SWAT and Military clients, so we went to work adapting it to Bluetooth and gaming.

Now we need to finish the coding, and go to production.

We plan to launch into retail chain stores after the campaign is funded, so by supporting us and contributing, you will receive true wholesale pricing on these, as well as VIP status on any other accessories or versions of the device we launch.

Retail price will be around $ 149.00 each.

For $ 25.00, we will send you a logo branded soft cotton t-shirt, and a coupon for 10% discount when the product launches.

For $ 79.00, you will be one of the first in the world to receive the tactical bluetooth gaming throat mic system!

For contributions of $ 349.00, we will send you a 5-Pack!  This is great for gifts to all your gaming buddies, and a big savings as well.
Thanks so much for supporting us. 
Team Klein Electronics, Inc. - Since 1991
Disabled Veteran Owned.
story_txt: As you can see in the video and from our website, we have been in business since 1991, designing and building communication products for Police, Military and Security personnel worldwide.To make something unique, functional and comfortable for gamers, we looked to our line of products.  We wanted to eliminate the wires and bulk of headsets.  Our tactical throat microphone has always been a favorite of our SWAT and Military clients, so we went to work adapting it to Bluetooth and gaming.Now we need to finish the coding, and go to production.We plan to launch into retail chain stores after the campaign is funded, so by supporting us and contributing, you will receive true wholesale pricing on these, as well as VIP status on any other accessories or versions of the device we launch.Retail price will be around $ 149.00 each.For $ 25.00, we will send you a logo branded soft cotton t-shirt, and a coupon for 10% discount when the product launches.For $ 79.00, you will be one of the first in the world to receive the tactical bluetooth gaming throat mic system!For contributions of $ 349.00, we will send you a 5-Pack!  This is great for gifts to all your gaming buddies, and a big savings as well.Thanks so much for supporting us.  Team Klein Electronics, Inc. - Since 1991Disabled Veteran Owned.

story:
Murel™ is proud to bring the Murel Venom™ to you!
These headphones are truly different from what you've come to expect from wireless headphones. The Murel™ Venom offers incredible HD sounding audio from a completely wireless headphone! We've specially designed the Venom to withstand and stay securely in your ears during the most aggressive and strenuous workouts. And last but not least...The Murel Venom™ features a patent-pending antenna, CUx™ (Copper Alloy Antenna), which maintains an amazing 200-feet open-air connection with Bluetooth 4.2 and an incredible 400-feet open-air connection with Bluetooth 5.0. We are confident that the Murel Venom™ are the last headphones you'll ever need!


- HUGE DRIVER - 
With a huge 8.6 mm driver, the Murel Venom™ delivers incredible sounding HD audio. You can expect to experience a deep bass with defined and sharp mids and highs. The Murel Venom supports lossless CD-quality audio to ensure an uncompromising audio experience.

- BLUETOOTH CHIP - 
The Murel Venom™ features a Bluetooth™ chip made by Airoha™ Technology—a leading Taiwanese chip maker. This bluetooth™ chip helps the Venom™ to maintain it's incredible Bluetooth™ connectivity...even during the most strenuous activities and workouts.

- HOOK DESIGN - 
We've spent extra time and care in the design and development of the Venom™ ear hooks. They are made of a soft TPU which wraps around, and securely hugs your ears. The material is soft so you won't feel any fatigue or pain...even with hours of usage.



- ANTENNA - 
The Murel Venom™ is outfitted with a Patent-Pending CUx™ (Copper Alloy Antenna). This antenna has an unbelievably strong signal. You can expect a consistent and interruption-free user experience while listening to your music. In addition, the Bluetooth™ connection is so strong, you will be able to stay connected with a 200-feet open-air connection with Bluetooth 4.2 and an incredible 400-feet open-air connection with Bluetooth 5.0.

- MICROPHONE - 
We've equipped the Murel Venom™ with dual Omni-Directional Microphones for a crisp and clear audio experience while speaking on the phone.
 

- LARGE BATTERY - 
We've also included a large lithium-ion battery which will accommodate up to 8.5 hours of listening between charges. Never run out of fuel while working out again!
 

We plan to produce a very limited number of initial units for the Murel Venom at these promotional launch prices. So hurry and reserve yours before they are gone! Join us on the journey to make this special product.

 

True Wireless Headphones Features Incredible Audio with:

  • Huge 8.6 mm Driver for Deep Rich Audio
  • Dual Omni-Directional Microphone for Hand Free Calls
  • 100 mAh Lithium-ion Battery (Each Earbud)
  • 600 mAh lithium-ion Battery (Charging Case)
  • Rare-Earth Copper Alloy Antenna for Superior Connectivity
  • Bluetooth 4.2 & 5.0

Compatability:  

  • IOS and Android Smart Phone Devices
  • Packaging Includes:  3 Sets of Ear Tips, Charging Case, USB Charging Cable, User Manual

 Specifications:

  • BLUETOOTH RANGE: 400ft
  • WORKING VOLTAGE: 3.4-4.2V
  • LITHIUM BATTERY CAPACITY: 100MAH X 2
  • CONSISTENT WORKING TIME: 8.5+ HOURS
  • CHARGING TIME: 1 HRS
  • FREQUENCY RANGE: 2.402-2.480GHZ
  • CHANNEL SPACING: 2MHZ
  • TRANSMITTED POWER: CLASS 2
  • TALKING FREQUENCY: 8KHZ & 16KHZ
  • MUSIC FREQUENCY: 44.1KHZ & 48KHZ
  • MODULATION MODE: GFSK, (π/4)DQPSK, 8DPSK
  • DRIVER DIAMETER: 8.6MM
  • IMPEDANCE: 32Ω
  • FREQUENCY RESPONSE: 16～26KHz
  • MICROPHONE: 4015
  • MICROPHONE SENSITIVITY: 42db±3db
  • MICROPHONE DIRECTION: OMNI-DIRECTIONAL 
     

The Murel Venom™ securely and comfortably hugs your ears. Experience comfort and security even after hours of use. Your ears won't get fatigued liked they do with other truly wireless earbuds.

 




- POWERFUL DESIGN - 
We've designed the Murel Venom™ to be as small as possible and still deliver an incredible HD audio experience. We strongly feel that current truly wireless headphones on the market completely miss the mark by designing their headphones with small and weak drivers--which produce weak and poor sound. In addition, many truly wireless headphones only offer 1-2 hours of listening between charges.

IN THE BOX: YOU WILL RECEIVE: THE MUREL VENOM HEADPHONES, CHARGING CASE, 3 SIZES OF SILICON EARTIPS, USB CHARGING CABLE, AND USER MANUAL.


We've taken extra care in the design and development of the Murel Venom™ charging case. The Charging case will charge your headphones up to 3 times...thereby extending your music playtime to an incredible 25.5 hours before you need to charge the case!


 

- PERFECT FOR EVERY ACTIVITY - 
The Murel Venom™ is the perfect headphones for almost any activity. The unique one-size-fits all hook design keeps the headphones securely in your ears while doing the most aggressive workouts, bike riding, jumping, running, etc. Feel secure and confident your headphones will stay put doing any activity! The Murel Venom™ is also great for the not-so aggressive activities, like watching movies, taking calls, or just listening to music. The Murel Venom™ delivers HD-quality sound while doing all of your favorite activities.


 




 

- THE BEST TECHNOLOGIES - 
The Murel Venom™ boasts a partnership with companies like Liquipel™ and Comply™.  Liquipel™ has an incredible nano-coating treatment which protects against water and sweat. And Comply™ supplies us with foam ear tips which enhance both the sound and fitment when paired with the Murel Venom™.


- MUREL ZERO - 
Last year we launched and successfully delivered the Murel Zero™. Our backers loved the HD-sound quality as well as the incredible strong Bluetooth™ connectivity. But we realized through customer feedback that security of the fitment was lacking.

- FRANKEN-PROTOTYPE - 
So we set out to improve upon the current design by adding a flexible hook that wraps around the ear. We took the Murel Zero™ and a hook from another set of headphones and used special bonding puddy to create our first rough prototype of the Murel Venom™. We personally used this custom prototype in the gym and loved the fitment! We realized we were onto something big! 

- ROUGH SKETCHES - 
From the hand-made sample, we developed sketches that would give a rough outline for the dimensions of the new design.

- 2D SCHEMATICS - 
From these rough sketches, we designed and developed in more detail the outside shell of the new design. Every angle and dimensions was added to make sure the overall form of the Murel Venom™ was covered. In fact, we used giant circles to give the outside curves their form. If you look closely you'll notice that every line on the Murel Venom™ is curved. This gives the overall design a very futuristic and avant-guard feel to it.

- 3D MODEL - 
From the 2D design we had a 3D designer create the 3D CAD files in SolidWorks. This design only included the outside walls and did not include the inside components. Those inside details would come later once we've finalized the outside form.

- RENDERINGS FIRST ROUND- 
We were a little early in doing the 3D photo-realistic renderings from these early 3D files. But we wanted to get an idea of how the final product would look. These renderings would later be modified and altered slightly by the factory in order to accommodate the design of the components on the inside.

- DFM - "DESIGN FOR MANUFACTURING" - 
We then started to work closer with the factory. In order to get the 3D files ready to be manufactured, the factory engineers created the DFM files "Design for Manufacturing". These files are the final and complete files the factory will use to create the injection molding tooling, as well as source the components which will be used during the manufacturing process. The DFM file is the last step before the manufacturing process can be started.

- MACHINE PROTOTYPE ONE - 
From the DFM files the factory produced two different sets of prototypes. These are hi-fidelity prototypes which are used to test the overall design of the headphones. As you can see in this photo, we did consider embedding wire inside the ear hook in order to allow the user to custom form the hook to fit the ear. In the end we decided against this final design. Instead, we use the natural spring of the TPU material to maintain a comfortable and snug fitment around the ear.

- MACHINED PROTOTYPE TWO - 
The second prototype set was identical to the first with exception to the hooks--which didn't include the internal wire. We decided this was the best design for the headphones. We added some modeling paint to see how the finished and final colors would look.

- FUNCTIONAL PROTOTYPE - 
Our last prototype is a 100% functional prototype. It features all of the electronic components that will go into the final product. This is the unit we've been testing for sound quality and Bluetooth™ distance and connectivity. We can confidently say it has exceeded our expectations. The fitment is secure and doesn't fatigue the ear. Also, The HD audio sounds incredible! And the Bluetooth™ connection is hands down the best we've ever experienced.



- FINAL RENDERINGS - 
From the final DFM (Design for Manufacturing) 3D model we were able to generate hi-fidelity photo-realistic renderings to show how the final product will look once in production. We love how the white looks in this final design embodiment, However, we are open to doing other color combinations once certain milestone are met.



- BE PART OF THE MUREL VENOM STORY - 
You are the last step in the Murel Venom™ story. We have come as far as we can without your support. With your support we can bring this awesome product to market and into your hands! let's do this!

 

 

We are putting together some killer Stretch Goals for the Murel Venom backers. Stay tuned...we'll announce our Stretch Goals once we are confident we'll achieve our funding goal.

As part of the stretch goals...we've got some additional color options we are putting together that we think you'll love!





 

Murel™ has multiple patents pending on the Murel Venom™. One of which is the CUx™ (Copper Alloy Antenna) which has both an incredible extended range of connection as well as superior connection without interruptions. Secondly, we have a design patent pending for the Venom's™ unique design. We feel strongly that these two patents along with the superior manufacturing capability of our factory, the Venom™ will provide an experience like none other.


Q. How do I choose my color?
A. The color selection will happen shortly after purchase...once the stretch goals have been met.

Q. Is there a microphone included?
A. Yes! You'll be able to take and make calls. Each of the two headphones contains a omni-directional microphone. No hands!

Q. Is there a risk if I'm contributing?
A. We feel fully accountable to the backers. You can be sure that we'll keep a rigorous eye on the financials. We have a highly talented team and we are 100% dedicated to ship an outstanding product, no matter what.

Q. Is there a warranty?
A. We are committed to providing the very best experience possible for our backers and loyal customers. We offer a 1-year warranty on all the electronic components.

Q. I have small / abnormal ears, will the earbuds fit?
A. Yes, the unique ear-hook design of the Murel Venom allows it to fit on any ear regardless of shape or size. Also, you will receive multiple sizes of silicon ear tips to fit any size ear canal.

Q. How is the sound quality?
A. Sounds Quality is the most important priority for us. We are committed to delivering to you HD quality sound. We are confident that our audio quality and experience is as good as the best you've experienced and better than anything else in this category. Our audio engineers have worked with top brands like Sennheiser and others, so we are confident we can deliver an incredible audio experience to you.

Q. Are the earbuds waterproof?
A. They are water resistant. They are treated with a nano-coating over the electronics called Liquipel,  which makes them extremely resistant to water and sweat. So feel free to use them in the rain. 

Q. What happens if I change my address before you ship?
A. We'll make an announcement 1 week before we ship. You'll then be able to update your address on your Indiegogo profile.

At Murel™ we love designing and manufacturing incredible product for our customers and backers. Anyone who backs one of our projects on a crowdfunding platform like Kickstarter or Indiegogo will  automatically become part of the Murel™ Family. Being part of the Murel Family means your name will be added to our family list and you'll be able to participate in special discounts and receive extras in future crowding campaigns we do. As you can see from the very first perk listed above, our previous supporters and backers get a special family price and family extras. By pledging for the Murel Venom™ you will automatically become part of the Murel™ Family and have access to these extras in the future.


At Murel™ we pride ourselves on delivering superior product design, quality, and customer service. Here are some nice things our customers have said about us:

 

"These headphones are the best I have ever owned. I love the long battery life and the portable charging case. The sound quality is on par or exceeds that of wired headphone that I have owned. And it is true that the Murel Zeros have no skipping. Thanks for a great product and hope to see more outstanding products in the future!" 
– Richard 

 

"The Murel's are one of the best campaigns I've ever backed. You guys delivered in a timely manner with a great product. The bluetooth connection is smooth and the music is strong and clear. Love that they are priced for the average person" 
– Isabel

 

"Personally i like sound to be represented in a spacious, lively way with the emphasize on the bass. Finally i understand that comparing wired to wireless and earbuds to headphones is not a fair comparison in soundquality but my goal is simply giving an idea of the soundquality. Songs: Editors - Honesty (44.1 khz / 16 bits mp3) Pearl Jam - Man of the Hour live (44.1 khz / 16 bits FLAC) Raging Fyah - Fight (44.1 khz / 16 bits mp3) Kim André Arnesen - Magnificat performed live (2822.4 khz DSD) While doing this comparison i found that i am even more impressed with these wireless earbuds then beforehand. The overall sound is neutral and for earbuds very spacious with good details. The quality is definitely above average. It does however all come to down to the perfect fit. In my case this means i regret not buying the extra comply tips since i am guessing this would improve the overall fit in my case. So would i recommend the Murel Zero's to others? Yes, rid yourself of wires but not from good quality and get these Zeros"
– Etienne

 

"I have been thinking of sending yall a thank you since I got my headphones. These headphones have joined my all my other tech in my gig bag for everyday life. The headphones are a true life saver whenever I just need to sit back and relax with my music. The simplicity of turning them on and getting them connected before getting out of my car makes my life quick and easy. The clarity and sound of the drivers are exceptional and I'm so glad I backed this project. keep up the great work, I'll be buying more products soon" 
– Ricardo

 

"I must say that I am very happy with my murels. I have backed fireflies earbuds and murels on KS and there is no comparison which earbuds sound better and hold a longer charge. Another bonus is being able to answer incoming calls whereas with my fireflies I always had to take one earbud out to answer incoming calls." 
– Dan

 

"I had a pair of wireless sport headphones from another company that just weren't performing up to par for my needs. With only 11 reviews at the time of purchase, I took a risk on these headphones and couldn't be happier. Great headphones; I can't recommend them enough."
– Tony

 

"I Love these headphones. Design is great, sound is loud and clean. I am confident that this company will continue to put out great products and continue their exceptional customer service."
– Gary

 

"I have been using the Murel P01 earbuds for about a year and a half. I have loved their fit and length of charge. They will last 8 hours on a charge. I run ultramarathons and spend a lot of time running at one outing. The earbuds stay comfortable and don't fall out of my ear. I'm looking forward to my next pair, the P02's!"
– Mark

 

"These are great buds! I love mine. They fit nicely and are sweat resistant. I highly recommend these. Their customer service is excellent!"
– Mike

 

"I have to say that this company stands behind there product and will go above an beyond to make sure there customers are happy and that to me is the greatest thing about these headphones. When I was having issues they were quick to respond and provided excellent assistance. I couldn't be happier with my purchase."
– Shopaholic

 


Murel™ is proud to be a company that is born from crowdfunding. We believe that together we can make something much greater. We’d like to thank all of our backers and customers who support the Murel™ brand. Murel™ was founded with the quest to improve upon the past. Our last company CruxCase LLC, received international acclaim including being featured in Wired, Forbes, Wall Street Journal, as well as being highlighted in two recent books: “iPad Secrets”  and “Crowdfund Investing For Dummies”. In October of 2012 Crux launched a high-end aluminum product called the CruxSKUNK. This product succeeded in raising $500K on both kickstarter.com and the website. In total, Crux has pre-sold nearly $1 Million in product through crowdfunding. Crux was sold to BGZ Brands in July of 2014. Murel™ is a company founded on our passion for sport combined with our unique design-crowdfunding DNA. Our mission is to design and develop incredible products for sport & adventure enthusiasts. We hope you'll join us on this new journey!

 

Risks and challenges
The risks and challenges that Murel faces are very manageable. We already have a working prototype that is functioning exactly the way we want it to. We are aware that there are always shipping challenges to international backers which may be a challenge. Also, we are aware of and have experienced the challenges of shipping, customer service, and replacements. We plan to increase our shipping and customer service capacity by hiring out help for these two potential bottlenecks. But we plan to address each of these by a case by case scenario. Finally, there are quality control issues that may arise. We plan to personally do a quality control check of the shipment before it leaves China. We are confident that we can overcome any challenges that come our way.

We are confident that our audio quality and experience is as good as the best you've experienced and better than anything else in this category. Our audio engineers have worked with top brands like Sennheiser and others, so we are confident we can deliver an incredible audio experience to you.Q. Are the earbuds waterproof?A. They are water resistant. They are treated with a nano-coating over the electronics called Liquipel,  which makes them extremely resistant to water and sweat. So feel free to use them in the rain. Q. What happens if I change my address before you ship?A. We'll make an announcement 1 week before we ship. You'll then be able to update your address on your Indiegogo profile.At Murel™ we love designing and manufacturing incredible product for our customers and backers. Anyone who backs one of our projects on a crowdfunding platform like Kickstarter or Indiegogo will  automatically become part of the Murel™ Family. Being part of the Murel Family means your name will be added to our family list and you'll be able to participate in special discounts and receive extras in future crowding campaigns we do. As you can see from the very first perk listed above, our previous supporters and backers get a special family price and family extras. By pledging for the Murel Venom™ you will automatically become part of the Murel™ Family and have access to these extras in the future.At Murel™ we pride ourselves on delivering superior product design, quality, and customer service. Here are some nice things our customers have said about us: "These headphones are the best I have ever owned. I love the long battery life and the portable charging case. The sound quality is on par or exceeds that of wired headphone that I have owned. And it is true that the Murel Zeros have no skipping. Thanks for a great product and hope to see more outstanding products in the future!" – Richard  "The Murel's are one of the best campaigns I've ever backed. You guys delivered in a timely manner with a great product. The bluetooth connection is smooth and the music is strong and clear. Love that they are priced for the average person" – Isabel "Personally i like sound to be represented in a spacious, lively way with the emphasize on the bass. Finally i understand that comparing wired to wireless and earbuds to headphones is not a fair comparison in soundquality but my goal is simply giving an idea of the soundquality. Songs: Editors - Honesty (44.1 khz / 16 bits mp3) Pearl Jam - Man of the Hour live (44.1 khz / 16 bits FLAC) Raging Fyah - Fight (44.1 khz / 16 bits mp3) Kim André Arnesen - Magnificat performed live (2822.4 khz DSD) While doing this comparison i found that i am even more impressed with these wireless earbuds then beforehand. The overall sound is neutral and for earbuds very spacious with good details. The quality is definitely above average. It does however all come to down to the perfect fit. In my case this means i regret not buying the extra comply tips since i am guessing this would improve the overall fit in my case. So would i recommend the Murel Zero's to others? Yes, rid yourself of wires but not from good quality and get these Zeros"– Etienne "I have been thinking of sending yall a thank you since I got my headphones. These headphones have joined my all my other tech in my gig bag for everyday life. The headphones are a true life saver whenever I just need to sit back and relax with my music. The simplicity of turning them on and getting them connected before getting out of my car makes my life quick and easy. The clarity and sound of the drivers are exceptional and I'm so glad I backed this project. keep up the great work, I'll be buying more products soon" – Ricardo "I must say that I am very happy with my murels. I have backed fireflies earbuds and murels on KS and there is no comparison which earbuds sound better and hold a longer charge. Another bonus is being able to answer incoming calls whereas with my fireflies I always had to take one earbud out to answer incoming calls." – Dan "I had a pair of wireless sport headphones from another company that just weren't performing up to par for my needs. With only 11 reviews at the time of purchase, I took a risk on these headphones and couldn't be happier. Great headphones; I can't recommend them enough."– Tony "I Love these headphones. Design is great, sound is loud and clean. I am confident that this company will continue to put out great products and continue their exceptional customer service."– Gary "I have been using the Murel P01 earbuds for about a year and a half. I have loved their fit and length of charge. They will last 8 hours on a charge. I run ultramarathons and spend a lot of time running at one outing. The earbuds stay comfortable and don't fall out of my ear. I'm looking forward to my next pair, the P02's!"– Mark "These are great buds! I love mine. They fit nicely and are sweat resistant. I highly recommend these. Their customer service is excellent!"– Mike "I have to say that this company stands behind there product and will go above an beyond to make sure there customers are happy and that to me is the greatest thing about these headphones. When I was having issues they were quick to respond and provided excellent assistance. I couldn't be happier with my purchase."– Shopaholic Murel™ is proud to be a company that is born from crowdfunding. We believe that together we can make something much greater. We’d like to thank all of our backers and customers who support the Murel™ brand. Murel™ was founded with the quest to improve upon the past. Our last company CruxCase LLC, received international acclaim including being featured in Wired, Forbes, Wall Street Journal, as well as being highlighted in two recent books: “iPad Secrets”  and “Crowdfund Investing For Dummies”. In October of 2012 Crux launched a high-end aluminum product called the CruxSKUNK. This product succeeded in raising $500K on both kickstarter.com and the website. In total, Crux has pre-sold nearly $1 Million in product through crowdfunding. Crux was sold to BGZ Brands in July of 2014. Murel™ is a company founded on our passion for sport combined with our unique design-crowdfunding DNA. Our mission is to design and develop incredible products for sport & adventure enthusiasts. We hope you'll join us on this new journey! Risks and challengesThe risks and challenges that Murel faces are very manageable. We already have a working prototype that is functioning exactly the way we want it to. We are aware that there are always shipping challenges to international backers which may be a challenge. Also, we are aware of and have experienced the challenges of shipping, customer service, and replacements. We plan to increase our shipping and customer service capacity by hiring out help for these two potential bottlenecks. But we plan to address each of these by a case by case scenario. Finally, there are quality control issues that may arise. We plan to personally do a quality control check of the shipment before it leaves China. We are confident that we can overcome any challenges that come our way.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Introducing Fantany Unbound

Bluetooth 5 Wireless Earbuds

________________________________________________

Made with ❤️ by Fantany

Fantany Audio’s first product, the Unbound Bluetooth 5.0 Earbuds, are a result of endless research. We’ve created faily priced product which contains the Original Design from California, latest Qualcomm Bluetooth chipset, premium sound, stable connection, long battery life and wireless charging.

These earbuds are meant to join you on every adventure of your life! From exercise to working on the go, we have you completely covered.

If you want something special on your ears, try Fantany Unbound!

Product Overview

Over two years of development have gone into perfecting these lightweight earbuds that are packed with the following features. Our expertise in electronics manufacturing and industrial design for the audio industry allows us to bring to you affordable, incredible quality pieces.

 

Features

✔️Bluetooth 5 up to 66ft/20m

✔️Stable Connection Between Both Earbuds and Phone 

✔️aptX/AAC

✔️Perfect Sound & Bass

✔️Auto Pairing

✔️Stereo Voice Call with cVc Noise Cancellation

✔️Long Life Battery for Both Earbuds and Case

✔️Sensitive Touch Control

✔️IP54 Protection

✔️Dimmable LED Indicator

✔️Wire & Wireless Charge

✔️Designed in California, USA

 

Tech Spec

 

Competitor Chart

Original Design, Long Battery Life, More Functions but Affordable.

 

Touch Control

Fantany Unbound offers a smooth touch control experience just like your smart phone.

 

 

Stable Connection & Fit

We've spent months to improve the connection performance. Fantany Unbound won't annoy you by disconneting randomly. Also securely fit for workout.

 

Perfect Sound & Bass

The sound system is adjusted in professional acoustic lab, offering perfect sound performance.

 

cVc Noise Cancellation

cVc (clear Voice capture) by Qualcomm is a set of noise reduction algorithms built into the microphone audio processing circuit for Bluetooth headsets. It's specifically designed to REDUCE ambient sound to the listener and enhance the voice of the caller at the other end of a call.

 

Long Life Battery

With the single weight of 0.2oz/6g, Fantany Unbound can keep playing music at 80% volume for up to 9 hours, without any pause or recharge!

 

Breakdown View

 

What's in the box?

Including a leather style carrying bag.

Order now to get an extra FREE wireless charging pad!

Limited only for INDIEGOGO backers.

Perk Options

Three Colors Available

Order now to get an extra FREE wireless charging pad!

Limited only for INDIEGOGO backers.

 

Timeline

 

3D Printed Prototype

 

CNC Prototype

Trial Production

 

 

About the Team

Designed in San Francisco, we spent over two years developing and perfecting these wireless ear buds. We meticulously resized and re-engineered the headphones to increase portability and the quality of sound. Our team hopes that you love these as much as we do, and can’t wait to see where our backers take us! Your backing allows us to create more technology products that can make a difference in every day life.

 

The Mission

We've created a set of accessible and powerful headphones that are meant for everyone. We need your help and support to bring this project to life, and to share limitless sound with every consumer. The funds raised from this campaign will help to pay for our first round of Fantany Unbound Earbuds.

 

Risks and Challenges

With any new idea that you bring to market, there are some risks and challenges. One of the challenges we faced was in the design process, deciding to create a more unique earbud pushed back our timeframe. With any electronics manufacturing, we anticipate being able to deliver this product as soon as possible, but there may be some minor delays due to the manufacturing process. We'll do our best to share updates along the way via the updates section on Indiegogo!

story:
Agora Studio 1 is made of the most advanced technology. The minimalist design contrast with its amazing capabilities. The extraordinary sound is materially crafted by emulating the high quality of a professional studio. The incredible design and its pure sound will make you fall in love with it. with stereo and mono connections Studio 1 is an essential tool for both professionals and music enthusiasts.  Studio 1 is easy to use and it is specially designed to be comfortable, specially for the professionals that spend hours using headsets. 

 

We are already working on a prototype and soon we will start mass production. The reason we turned to Indiegogo is because with the funds we get from the campaign we will be able to speed up both production and distribution. We are asking for 150,000$ to speed up production and start a worldwide media campaign to promote Studio1. By supporting us you will help us on getting Agora Studio1 everywhere and settle the brand as a reliable and high quality product maker, and you can get the headphones at a bargain price! The retail price is 549$ but you can get for almost 200$ less, why this big difference of price? This is a professional product intended and designed to suit the most demanding music industry professionals which makes it costly to produce. You can get it cheaper in here because we will be funding a big part of the production, this campaign is intended to aid the production process, not to fund it whole.

With your help we will be able to make Studio1 available to everyone in the world! what is better than this?'

You can't make a donation? don't worry! Just spread the word and share this campaign!

story:
Tranquil is designed to be extremely comfortable to wear while reducing noises for multiple situations.  Tranquil allows you to reduce noises like plane engines or that disruptive snoring allowing you to achieve peace and tranquility when you want it. With a simple flip of a switch, Tranquil has the ability to change between three modes: Quiet Mode for near total silence, Voice Mode for allowing you to hear someone speaking to you while still reducing noises (can be used for conversations on an plane trip) and Sleep Mode which is used to mask noises while you sleep. Tranquil's housing is designed to fit comfortably and securely over the ear, making it discreet and nearly invisible when worn.  Tranquil is also lightweight making it comfortable to wear for extended periods of time.

 

Tranquil Can be Used Everyday 

  • When traveling by plane or train 
  • For mowing the lawn or leaf blowing 
  • Sleeping in noisy settings or if disturbed by snoring
  • If you need to concentrate in noisy settings
  • If you have trouble focusing
  • When you just want quiet time to relax

 Nearly Invisible when Worn 

Tranquil is very discreet and nearly invisible when worn because it hides behind your ear (as depicted in the line drawings above). 

How small is Tranquil? 

At only 1" by 1.5", Tranquil vanishes behind your ear and the clear cable connecting to the ear tip is nearly invisible when worn. 

Extremely Comfortable 

Tranquil uses an expanding memory foam tip that gently expands to your ear canal for a perfect comfortable fit every time. Other brands may use rubber or silicone tips which can sometimes feel uncomfortable or even hurt when worn for a short time. 

Designed for Multiple Noise Settings 

Tranquil has three modes: Quiet Mode, Voice Mode and Sleep Mode that are activated by a simple flip of a switch. 

Quite Mode is active and passive noise cancellation for the utmost silence when you want to reduce busy urban street noises, factory noises or for just total concentration.

Voice Mode allows you to hear conversations clearly even when Tranquil's active noise cancellation is on. This means you can hear someone talking over the roar of a plane engine, or when someone wants to speak to you when you are doing tasks like mowing the lawn. Other products need to be taken off or out of your ears every time you want to talk, but this is not required when using Tranquil.

Sleep Mode is used while sleeping if you are disturbed by a snoring partner or when there are other loud distracting noises.  

 

 

How does Tranquil work? 

 

 

Tranquil's compressible foam tip provides passive noise cancellation for the high frequencies, while the device uses active noise cancellation for low frequencies.  This is Quiet Mode. Without the active low frequency cancellation loud sounds would be almost unchanged in volume. Tranquil's active noise cancellation uses a microphone placed inside the ear to provide the strongest low frequency noise cancellation. When in Voice Mode, Tranquil processes high frequency sounds electronically to allow clear voice communications. This overcomes the passive noise cancellation provided by the foam tip. The ability to allow clear communication when needed is not available on most noise cancellation systems including QuietOn and Hush. When in Sleep Mode, Tranquil can mask snoring sounds or other disruptive sounds to give you a restful night's sleep.

 What is included in my Perk? 

 

 

  • 2 Tranquil Active Noise Cancellation Devices (1 for each ear, Left and Right)
  • 6 Foam Tips in 3 sizes for Left & Right Ears
  • 1 USB Charging Y-Cable 
  • 1 Carrying Case 

 FAQ's 

What makes Tranquil unique compared to other products? 

Tranquil is currently the only product that hides behind your ear making it very discreet and nearly invisible.  Tranquil will remain secure on your ear and is very comfortable to wear for extended periods of time. Tranquil also has multiple noise reduction modes that is unique for an active noise cancellation system. 

 How does Tranquil compare to standard noise ear plugs? 

Normal noise earplugs are not able to block low frequency noise. Tranquil can block low frequency noise and still be used to hear speech when needed with Voice Mode.  When in Sleep Mode, Tranquil can mask snoring or other disruptive sounds.

Can I wear Tranquil with eye glasses?  

Yes, Tranquil can be worn at the same time.  Tranquil is very similar to behind the ear hearing aids worn by millions of people with eye glasses. 

What is the expected battery life? 

Our goal is to achieve 30 hours of use on a single charge. 

 What colors are available?

Currently we plan to release Tranquil only in black.

When will the first orders be shipped by? 

See below section titled "Manufacturing & Fulfillment Timeline". 

 

Looking for something that can replace your hearing protection on the pistol range?

Tranquil will provide a level of protection while on a shooting range. The Voice Mode feature will also limit sound pressure levels in a broad range of frequencies found from most small-arms ammunition while still giving the ability to hear speech.


Will Tranquil stay on the ear while sleeping?

Yes. The 'wire cable' is pre-formed in shape which allows it to ‘hug’ the ear and help hold Tranquil in place. The design of the housing, wire cable and ear tip used in Tranquil came from ‘behind-the-ear’ hearing aids commonly known as RITE or RIC styles. These style hearing aids have been proven to remain in place while in use.

 

How durable is the 'wire cable' used on Tranquil?

The design used in Tranquil for the ‘wire cable’ system that extends from the foam tip section to the case behind the ear comes from ‘behind-the-ear’ hearing aids commonly known as RITE or RIC styles. This has been proven a very reliable system on millions of hearing aids in use today.
 

Manufacturing & Fulfillment Timeline

 

Possible Risks & Challenges 

One potential risk is moving from a prototype to mass production. We have a good understanding of the components and assembly but there is always a risk when making a product in high volumes.  We will select only high quality components from reliable partners.  We have many contacts who have worked with components like these for many years. The products functionality will be ensured by proven production methods and quality control for every unit manufactured.

 

Meet the Team

                                         

                                         Tad Ell - Designer/Electrical Engineer
Tad Ell has over 20 years of experience working with acoustic devices that fit in or over the ear. He was a project manager at Siemens Healthcare, and was an Engineering manager at Unitron Hearing for over 15 years while holding a worldwide patent on a cross-over hearing aid design.  His extensive hearing aid and ear anatomy experience has allowed him to design Tranquil to be a discreet but yet very comfortable product to wear.  
 

                                      

                                                   Jake Ell -  Marketing Manager 
 Jake Ell heads the marketing effort for Tranquil.  Jake is studying Marketing & Communications and is a full time college student.

Tranquil also has multiple noise reduction modes that is unique for an active noise cancellation system. 
 How does Tranquil compare to standard noise ear plugs? 
Normal noise earplugs are not able to block low frequency noise. Tranquil can block low frequency noise and still be used to hear speech when needed with Voice Mode.  When in Sleep Mode, Tranquil can mask snoring or other disruptive sounds.
Can I wear Tranquil with eye glasses?  
Yes, Tranquil can be worn at the same time.  Tranquil is very similar to behind the ear hearing aids worn by millions of people with eye glasses. 
What is the expected battery life? 
Our goal is to achieve 30 hours of use on a single charge. 
 What colors are available?
Currently we plan to release Tranquil only in black.
When will the first orders be shipped by? 
See below section titled "Manufacturing & Fulfillment Timeline". 
 
Looking for something that can replace your hearing protection on the pistol range?
Tranquil will provide a level of protection while on a shooting range. The Voice Mode feature will also limit sound pressure levels in a broad range of frequencies found from most small-arms ammunition while still giving the ability to hear speech.

Will Tranquil stay on the ear while sleeping?

Yes. The 'wire cable' is pre-formed in shape which allows it to ‘hug’ the ear and help hold Tranquil in place. The design of the housing, wire cable and ear tip used in Tranquil came from ‘behind-the-ear’ hearing aids commonly known as RITE or RIC styles. These style hearing aids have been proven to remain in place while in use.
 
How durable is the 'wire cable' used on Tranquil?
The design used in Tranquil for the ‘wire cable’ system that extends from the foam tip section to the case behind the ear comes from ‘behind-the-ear’ hearing aids commonly known as RITE or RIC styles. This has been proven a very reliable system on millions of hearing aids in use today. 
Manufacturing & Fulfillment Timeline



 
Possible Risks & Challenges 
One potential risk is moving from a prototype to mass production. We have a good understanding of the components and assembly but there is always a risk when making a product in high volumes.  We will select only high quality components from reliable partners.  We have many contacts who have worked with components like these for many years. The products functionality will be ensured by proven production methods and quality control for every unit manufactured.
 
Meet the Team
                                         
                                         Tad Ell - Designer/Electrical Engineer
Tad Ell has over 20 years of experience working with acoustic devices that fit in or over the ear. He was a project manager at Siemens Healthcare, and was an Engineering manager at Unitron Hearing for over 15 years while holding a worldwide patent on a cross-over hearing aid design.  His extensive hearing aid and ear anatomy experience has allowed him to design Tranquil to be a discreet but yet very comfortable product to wear.  
 
                                      

                                                   Jake Ell -  Marketing Manager 
 Jake Ell heads the marketing effort for Tranquil.  Jake is studying Marketing & Communications and is a full time college student.

story:
Not only is it a new product, it's an entirely new A/V product category we call Audiostand.

CANVAS Audiostand is a true HiFi sound system in a new form factor. It transforms LG OLED TV into real HiFi sound systems with 3D stereo imaging like you'd normally only get from the best High End sound systems.

CANVAS can also work as a stand alone wireless HiFi sound system, with AirPlay 2 and Chromecast, both multiroom compatible. It's the first one-box real HiFi system with realistic 3D stereo imaging being brought to market.

CANVAS also work with any other TV, the elegance from the integrated solution with LG OLED won't be there, but you'll still get the awesome sound. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The image quality of LG OLED TVs is now close to the highest fidelity that’s technically achievable. However, this is not the case in terms of audio, even with the best soundbars as they are still limited by the constraints of their size. High quality audio has until now required separate HiFi speakers as they’re infinitely better in terms of performance. With CANVAS we want to match the audio quality to the picture quality LG OLED TV’s without having to rely on free standing HiFi speakers.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The short answer, because they are the best. LG is the only manufacturer of large format OLED panels, so whether you buy Panasonic, Philips or Sony, it’s all LG panels inside. Thereby you get the most value for money getting an LG OLED TV. And don’t take our word for it, the vast majority of reviewers worldwide agrees LG OLED is the King of TV’s, so if you haven’t got one already, you should seriously consider getting it!

 

 

 

 

 

 

CANVAS can be used both floor standing and on the wall, with it’s optional wall mount. Initially, CANVAS is compatible exclusively with LG OLED B and C Series TV's 2016 - 2020.  

CANVAS can also be used as a standalone wireless HiFi system or with any other TV models, even though it will not be able to physically connect to the TV.

 

 

 

 

 

CANVAS works as a stand alone wireless HiFi sound system, with AirPlay 2 and Chromecast, both multi room compatible. It is the first one-box real HiFi system with realistic 3D stereo imaging.

 

 

 

 

 

CANVAS also works with any other TV, the elegance from the integrated solution with LG OLED won't be there, but you'll still get the awesome sound.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our early prototypes of CANVAS had the right drivers, a rock solid speaker enclosure, and DSP crossovers – but the left and right speakers were still close to each other and the drivers were so near to the door and walls that the stereo imaging was not meeting our goals.

The missing key ingredient was BACCH 3D Sound – and it was invented just in time!

While the basic technology has existed for a decade, a recent breakthrough developed by BACCH Labs, licensed from Princeton University allows listeners to hear astoundingly realistic 3D sound through just two speakers placed in close proximity to each other. It achieves this using crosstalk cancellation essentially repositioning the sound so that the left and right speakers can only be heard by the respective ear. The result is real three-dimensional stereo imaging similar to free-standing High End speakers, without any form of coloration to the sound.

 

 

 

 

 

 

The contemporary TV ecosystem is made up of a range of devices, and we’ve made sure that CANVAS can connect your preferred listening option in whichever way you choose – whether it’s via Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Toslink, or HDMI ARC. CANVAS has Apple AirPlay 2 multiroom and Google Chromecast multiroom, so the possibilities for integration are almost limitless. It can even be hooked up to work in an existing Sonos setup with Sonos Connect via Toslink input.

 

 

Even the best speaker system in the world can still be compromised if the listening room isn’t a good fit for the frequency response, and this is all too often the case. To address this, we created a room correction system to optimize the frequency response to the room where CANVAS will be used, simply through the App.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We wanted CANVAS to be an unobtrusive yet beautiful addition to your home – simple, elegant, and free of the distracting visual clutter typical to soundbars and HiFi systems. After experimenting with concepts around TV furniture with built-in speakers, we realized that what we were trying to achieve was the idea of uninterrupted flow – and so we created a speaker that connected to the TV physically, fusing them into one seamless unit.

 

 

 

 

 

When designing CANVAS, one of our core principles was that this speaker should look as good as it sounded. We want it to fit into your home seamlessly, blending naturally in with your décor. CANVAS features interchangeable color panels that click on magnetically to let you choose the perfect look.

All backers will be able to choose one of the five tones, we will be sending out a survey after the campaign asking all backers to select their selected color.

 

 

 

 

 

 

CANVAS is built up of readily available components, which means that all the really difficult, expensive and time consuming stuff is taken out of the equation. The electronics and speaker drivers exist and are in production, the enclosure/cabinet is manufactured of CNC machined MDF board and the TV bracket is made of bent, laser cut steel.

 

 

 

In fact, only 3 components will need tooling which is illustrated in this exploded view. These are expensive, but not difficult or very time consuming. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

In 2017, Kim Neeper who previously manufactured $20 000 High End speakers realized the huge disconnect between OLED TV's near perfect picture quality, and the sound products (soundbars) that typically go with them. Stubbornly devoted, "I cannot stand listening to this stuff", he embarked on a journey to solve TV sound, to get the sound quality up to par with the image quality of OLED TV. 

 

 

The plan was, let's use all the tricks from real High End audio engineering, and get this as good as possible. Well knowingly there was some huge challenges, mountains to be climbed, and that it would probably never be a true challenger for a real stand alone High End HiFi system. 

 

 

CANVAS solved this by creating an extensive bracing system, BridgeBrace, binding together enclosure walls so the hollow speaker acts like a solid object.

 

Which is a solution that will only work well in around 1 out of 10 rooms. Given CANVAS is fixed to one spot against a wall we needed to find a solution for all rooms. As such, we have incorporated a room correction system, where you use an iPhone (mic for Android coming, until then use your friends iPhone) to measure out the room and correct the bass response to ensure linear frequency response. 

 

The solution to the biggest challenge of them all was solved by incorporating BACCH 3D crosstalk cancellation technology. This ensures that only sound from the right speaker reaches your right ear and vice versa. This opens up the sound image with realistic 3D stereo imaging.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

In 2016 the OLED technology was ready and this sparked the inception of CANVAS – the OLED TV needed the perfect sound to go with it. CANVAS is on a mission to integrate High End sound quality of free standing speakers, but without the visual clutter of free standing speakers or HiFi racks. A design for a TV furniture with built-in speakers reduced the number of elements to just two, but nonetheless lacked the essential  flow – then in an epiphany, Kim realized that a simple square that incorporated the OLED TV into its shape was the solution.

story:
If you are reading this, then you probably know that Eurorack is the most "popular" modular synth standard nowadays.

Moto Mods™ are Motorola's commitment to modular accessories in the smartphone field. At the moment two variations of the Moto Z incorporate this technology.  Motorola has also guaranteed compatibility for at least one more generation of Moto Z's.

We think that despite the vast assortment of modules available now for Eurorack none of those that currently exist can offer the same usability, price and functionality as the one we are developing.

The module

An example of the integration of Euromod into a modular synthesizer could be as follows:

 

Euromod is a powerful tool that:

  • Has a form factor of a standard 32 HP Eurorack module
  • Accommodates a Moto Mod compatible smartphone using magnetic physical connection
  • Operates with a dedicated Android app or standalone
  • The companion app will have the option to share audio and MIDI with other apps
  • Can process and store digitally 4 analog signals at 24 bits and 48KHz resolution
  • Generate digitally 4 CV signals (14 bit resolution) from live performance, stored data and/or external MIDI
  • Interface controls are a combination of touchscreen, five physical level knobs and a multipurpose pushing encoder
  • Mix 4 analog signals and convert external MIDI to CV when smartphone is not connected
  • Four red/green LEDs monitor CV outputs activity
  • MIDI input to interconnect external gear or other modules is provided through DIN to jack special cable (provided with each euromod)
  • Both module firmware and dedicated app seamlessly updatable from cloud
  • Audiophile grade selected components
  • It's powered by A-100’s System Bus standard socket (with cable provided)
  • Smartphone battery charging from Eurorack power supply

With these features, the module could perform nearly unlimited functions. However, we preferred to focus on it as a tool for analysis and audio recording from the synthesizer on one hand and for the control signals generation on the other. At the moment, we are choosing to leave out the audio signals generation and processing as there are already excellent digital and analog tools for this task.

Four screens have been selected to focus on a first version of the application. As stated before, a second version will be deployed to all fabricated units. But for now, the app we are developing is based on a fixed routing workflow and made up of real-time mixing, sequencing and modulation functions. Although the current sequencer is quite simple, special attention has been paid to the optimal use for a live performance.

Our intention for the second phase of development is to attack more crazy topics such as advanced sequencing, input signal analysis and control of 2 (or 3) simultaneous control parameters using simple gestures.

This is the overview of the core workflow. The graphic designer still has to improve the look and feel, but I think it's indicative of the functionality of the module:

General features

  • CV outputs are generated as a sum of either values adjusted in “Font” screen (offset) and/or “Pads” screen played notes in addition to “Mod” screen corresponding oscilators
  • If total value for a CV output exceeds the absolute range of -10V to +10V the signal will be clipped to this boundaries ("CV distortion")
  • If sequencer is in Play state a 4 tracks of 16 stepped CVs will be reproduced
  • 2 output modes (4 modulation outputs/monophonic with CV2 and clock)
  • Tap tempo with physical push-button
  • When user is touching a control in app, the encoder acts as physical adjust control
  • External MIDI in clock overwrites internal app tempo

Mixer

  • Adjust of record level for each input (or CV amount passed to “Font”) with vumeter monitoring
  • 2 Rec modes (external inputs/app performance)

 

CV Font

  • Global scale selection to generate quantized values
  • Individually selectable range for each of 4 sources

 

Pads

  • When in "4 modulation output mode" note pad value overwrites CV value for each output adjusted in the CV generator. First pad overwrites CV1, second simultaneous pressed pad overwrites CV2, and so on up to CV4
  • When in "monophonic mode" each pad generates corresponding note in legato mode
  • 2 configurable pad banks with note and velocity

 

Modulation LFOs

  • Up to 4 able to sync oscillators (sine, square, triangle waves) with a range from .003Hz to 50 Hz when in "4 modulation output mode"
  • When in "monophonic output mode" only 2 LFO’s to modulate pitch and CV2 are active
  • Rate controls switches to multiplier/divider factor when an oscillator is synched (1:8, 1:4, 1:2, 1:1, 2:1, 4:1, 8:1)
  • 4 phase values for each synched LFO (0º, 90º, 180º and 270º)

 

More details will be announced in the updates section as they are developed. If you have any suggestions, we will be more than happy to respond your comments.

 

The challenges

We have already adquired the basic technical knowledge needed to develop the product, and have a dedicated team commited to the task. At this moment the concept, physical design, system architecture and some app functionalities have been defined. We also have two development environments ready to prototype thanks to the support of Motorola.

From the launch of this campaign we will be developing an initial pack of funcionalities within the accompanying app and testing the whole system. We hope that relying on Moto Mods technology we can achieve latencies not perceivable during a live performance. This is a risk and as soon as we can confirm this, we will provide detailed results.

Finally, we are aware that this product will not interest everyone. Eurorack is a popular format in a niche area of modular synthesizers. While the Motorola Moto Z is a smartphone that has garnered good reviews, but as we know the smartphone market is very competitive. To tip the balance in our favour we are offering a previously non-existent combination of technologies that provide a new experience of control, flexibility and inspiration.

A realistic development schedule has been planned to include testing, documentation, partnership with Motorola and certification in order to manufacture the product by the end of June.

 

The reason

We're now launching this campaign to guarantee the development effort and manufacturing costs required for the first 50 units production run.

The price of the product has been kept as low as possible while at the same time selecting the best possible components. A project like this besides hours of work, also requires prototypes, test equipment, development tools and so on. We have the initiative and drive however to achieve our goal we require funding, hence we are here.

Reaching the target will help us to solve the economic risks associated within the project, make the first series of units and prepare the second.

 

The team

Euromod project team is formed by a multi discipline group of enthusiasts. We are two software engineers, a graphic designer, a social media manager and an electrical engineer.

All of us are working professionals in the software industry. This is a guarantee that we have the necessary know-how. In addition, the whole team is committed and has a passion for technology, innovation and music. We only need your support!

 

Who is talking about Euromod?

  • Many sites informed that we are included in the 12 finalists of Motorola contest. New Atlas, Clove News,  Android.es ...
  • People at Gear News have understood the main concept of the module and made some interesting comments. View the page

story:
Short Summary

What we would like to present to you is, a story about Shenzhen and Makers, a story about doonne M1.Shenzhen, one of the China's fastest developing cities, enjoys reputations as "City of design", "City of Makers". Today, Shenzhen has become the world's largest origin for electronic products, provides one-stop service from design into production, The Economist, a British magazine, praises Shenzhen as the " Global preferred city for hardware entrepreneurs', where entrepreneurship and maker have been integrated into the Shenzhen's blood.

As a young city only aged 30, Shenzhen's population is 15 million, most of which are young, the average age is only 30 years old, as young as the city.While we are a young team of makers from Shenzhen, mates in work and friends in life. We have common interests: Music and Sport.

Most of our team keep the habits that listing music while exercising, and often gather together with the phone and earphone to run.But the wired earphone easily get winded, the worse is that wired earphone will bound us for movements and limit our enjoyment of listening to music and playing sports freely.

However, nothing could be difficult for a group of makers. In order to solve this problem, we decided to create a wireless Bluetooth earphone, especially designed and developed for music and sports fans, which is shown in front of you now, the doonne M1.

On the basis of ideas and recommendations from our own and friends around us, we focus on three areas: the sound quality, design and performance during the development process of doonne M1.

1.Audio quality

The good audio quality is the most basic requirement of an earphone .there are a number of factors impact on the quality of the earphone, such as: type of Bluetooth chip , audio transmission protocol, earphone cavity design, sounding the horn unit, EQ for regulation, dust, etc...We should handle every detail of doonne M1 earphone well enough to create perfect sound quality.

1.1 Powerful hardware

Powerful hardware is the basis of all, the high-end bluetooth Chip CSR8645 from British CSR's is selected as the main chip, whose performance has been fully verified in market.

1.2 Powered by atp-x

Regarding the audio protocol, we adopt lossless audio code-decode and transmission protocol atp-x from CSR, which make the transmission result equals to wired earphone.

1.3 Elaborately designed acoustics structure

We designed the acoustics cavity structure of the earphone elaborately, repeatedly modified and tested every detail that could impacts on the sound effect.

1.4 A most suitable horn for doonne M1

For the most critical devices of earphone - audible horn unit, we even choose one  out of hundreds.After extensive tests and compares, a most suitable horn for doonne M1 in the chamber is finalized.

1.5 Elaborately sound adjustment

Further more, we also fine-tune the EQ parameters for chip's output according to cavity and horn of the earphone. Even the small details such as the ear cap and dust web of the earphone are carefully handled by the doonne M1 Team as well.


2.Fantasy design

In order to make M1 doonne more attractive, sense of sport and technology, and  more easily accept and use as well, we need continuous deliberate in industrial design, structural design, material selection, surface processing, function design and so on.

2.1 Iterative design 

We carried out repeated iterations in areas such as industrial design, structural design, 3D printing, etc.

2.2 Extreme dimension

We utilized every inch inside the space of the earphone, thus allowing doonne M1 has a very small size.

2.3 Magnet adsorption

For more convenient use and accept, we integrated magnet for adsorption and Hall sensors for smart switch function into doonne M1.

2.4 Advanced TPE material

Taking into account the customers may be doing a fierce campaign during using doonne M1, We need M1 doonne has sufficient strength to avoid be damaged.The wire rod for earphones, we selected a flexible, robust and advanced TPE material.

pvc material of Other poor quality earphones
tpe aterial of doonne M1

2.5 Five Colours

Five colours are designed for doonne M1 to meet different people's favours.

3.CVC6.0 noise reduction technology

When you use the doonne M1 listening to music, if there is a phone call arrives, you can use doonne M1.answer the call directly. The CSR CVC6.0 noise reduction technology used to ensure good conversation quality.

4.Large capacity polymer battery

In addition, a high capacity polymer battery up to 100mah is used in doonne M1, fulfils the users' requirements for 6 hours of normal listening to music and 10 hours of phone talk.

5.doonne M1 product parameters

6.team members

Overall, through the efforts of the team, we realize doonne M1 as a nice music Bluetooth earphone in three areas: sound quality, design and performance. Now, time to know our team members.

What We Need & What You Get

We spent a lot of time to research, develop and design doonne M1. Now, it is time to introduced doonne M1 to more music and sports fans, that's why we choose indiegogo platform.

We need friends on indiegogo platform to help us put doonne M1 into mass production, and feedback us more suggestions after experience it, which makes doonne M1 more perfect.Of course, we will provide you with the best return on your supports.


The Impact

Music and sport are two most beautiful things in the world, and the even more beautiful is that doonne M1 enables you experience the two things at the same time.Every member in our team find them very fond of this earphone, we believe that doonne M1 will surprise the whole world, and also hope that doonne M1 brings more music, more sports to everyone own it.



Risks & Challenges

As Shenzhen is one of the world's biggest electronics product base, with the best development team and the supply chain, coupled with a lot of existing experiences for product design and manufacture from our team, we believe that there is almost no risk in doonne M1 R&D and manufacture and we are very confident to manufacture doonnein M1 in the nearest future.

However, there is a potential point of risk to clarify, as indiegogo is an international public financing platform with supporters from various parts of the globe, we need to face the express delivery problem for the product after the end of the public fund-raising. However, our colleagues who responsible for the management of the warehouse  have already contacted international courier companies such as UPS, Fedex, DHL, china post, etc.and negotiated shipments for this public financing project.We believe that through our joint efforts, every user who supports us could get doonne M1 as soon as possible.


Other Ways You Can Help

Doonne M1 is a fantastic product, on which we spent a lot of time to research and design. We believe that all of you will love it.We hope that you can introduce the doonne M1 to more people around you and experience the perfect blend of music and sport.

story:
About us and AltaLed.

First of all, Thank you very much for watching this campaign.

Altaled is a great device with so many functions, you won't believe its possible a device so small have so many functions. See our great perks and take the benefits now!

AltaLed is a speaker, and you can easely connect with bluetooth with your phone, or play FM radio with it. It also supports Micro TF Card (MP3) and it is also a bright flashlight and 3000Mah powerbank with best quality Samsung li-ion rechargeable battery!

Ones connected with bluetooth AltaLed plays your music, music from video's and more and you can make handsfree calls.

You can use AltaLed everywhere and everyday! Home, Work, holiday, in your car, enjoy your music everywhere! Use the bright Led, and charge your device. Walk in the night with AltaLed. With the full pack of accessoires you have everything for every situation!

http://www.altaledspeaker.net/

About my

Together with my suppliers, I am develop and test for over an year samples, and now I am proud to introduce you AltaLed, the smallest speaker with so many functions.

I have do this all by my one. this campaign, the website, the pictures and video. I have no professional team behind my doing this, and also no money to hire people at this moment for that.

But because I am not a big company does not mean that I can make anything beautiful !! So get your best deal now !!

 

I am sorry I am not talking in any video. Friend know my as a man with a camera (I like making pics from nature and birds). I really tried but I am not a man for on the camera.

 

AltaLed bluetooth speaker

After more than one jear personal testing, we now introduce you AltaLed. This great device have some benefits to comparable speakers, and that is that AltaLed is small, light weight and still have a powerfull speaker with the same good and clear sound. It is also a bright Led. Other speakers have Chinese batterys, but AltaLed have a Samsung li-ion rechargeable 3000Mah Battery and is also a quick charging powerbank!

http://www.altaledspeaker.net/

https://www.facebook.com/PowerbankSpeaker/


 

 

We need your help!

After all this time, we now ready to go for production. We have a good contact and a very good supplier for this speaker.

I spend lots of time and money in this project (starting with design, samples, testing samples. update and new samples. But also things like buy and make a website, video program, good camera, music program, and so much more.

Now the final thing, the production. And that is where we need your help.

How do we get to this amount?

Everything added up and calculated we come to a amount of 25.000 euro we do need. First production (device, engraving, shipping to), mold cost, shipping to buyers, tax and fee and other cost (packing, people who want to help my packing, accessoires)


 

Our perks

We can offer you some really good deals!

If you are reseller and interested in bulk lots, contact us!!

We offer zou AltaLed ''loose'', or with a complete set of handy accessoires. We picked and tested this accessoires ourselves, and also some of our testing persons get some of these accessoires. It's recommended to buy the complete set. I say this because I want to sell..      And more,  because this accessoires are Really handy! ;) (not only with AltaLed)

There are the following options:

3 colors: Black, brown and gold. 

and the following options:

* AltaLed With box, usb to usb (for charging AltaLed) and bike holder

* Full pack, Altaled with box, usb-usb, bike holder. Knife usb, universal usb to 10 different plugs. Trousers holder, Arm holder, Car holder (universal), Belt holder, Micro SD/TF Card 4gb.

 

By buying the full pack you get your choice color AltaLed speaker, with this accessoires.

 

 

More things to get with your AltaLed

We are very hopefully you with help us reach our goal. Of course we will reward all our backers if we do! I am not somebody who ask for help soon, but if people want to help and the do, I like to gife things away, as a kind of extra thank you. That might be a weird flip of mine but I want to do it too now.

If the campaign reach his 25.000 dollar goal I will gife every backer a Gold surprise. Have nothing to do with AltaLed, and I bet you've never seen it before.

If the campaign reach 30.000 dollar or more I will gife every backer the knife usb charger cable and gold surprise. Even if you bought the full pack, you will get one extra with it.


Timeline

After a year of contact with our suppliers, lots of patience and all the samples I ordered, we are now at the point that I have a perfect sample and a wonderful speaker that we developed with my suppliers. Now my hope is on you. Our suppliers are ready to go and production starts ASAP after this campaign is ended succesfully. If it's go so well that the goal is reach quickly I will give my supplier order to make immediately. I trust my supplier and they trust my, and I make an appointment that they start production ASAP for my,  So I can deliver your purchase Very Quickly! Maybe..   Maybe you will have your AltaLed with Xmas!!

 

 

Our team

Like I said before, I have no big compagny and have do this all alone. But I have some great suppliers who have lots of patience with my and great family and friends who want to help my. So you will see here no director, managers and CEO's in my team and no tie and suit photos.

See more: http://www.altaledspeaker.net/video-s-pics-and-...

 

Risks & Challenges

For over more than one year I have very good contact with my suppliers. They are ready to go and if needed I have a backup plan/supplier, but there is only 0.01% change I needed this plan. My suppliers quaranteed my they can deliver on time, and they will do, I know for sure.
How I see this, there are no risks or challenges, because everything is ready. There is a product, and if the campaign reach the 25.000 USD goal I will order immediately, even if the campaign still need a month to go, and I can, because I made special appointments for that with my suppliers.
 
 
 

Other Ways You Can Help

It is possible zou are not interested yourself to buy an AltaLed speaker. But you are really helping us if you share this with your friends! Maybe you know people who might be interested.

Thank you very much for watching and your help.

 

http://www.altaledspeaker.net/

Stay connected!

https://www.facebook.com/PowerbankSpeaker/

 

Questions and Answers

Q: Do you have more detailled information about the speaker?

A: Yes we do:

Products size:150*35.6MM
Speaker size:31mm
impedance:4Ω
output power:3W
External Interface:micro USB
Frequency:2.400ghz-2.480ghz
Frequency Response:20Hz-20KHz
Receiver Sensitivity:90d B,@5%BER
Working Distance:10M
Battery capacity:2200mah Li-Rechargeable battery **UPDATED 3000MAH Samsung!!**
Working time::25-30Hours
Charging:DC 5V ,1000ma
Charging time:2-3Hours

Tested times and hours above are with 2200 Chinese battery. You will receive 3000Mah Samsung, and this will hold longer, charge faster.

Q: Do I get any warranty?

A: Yes we give one year on AltaLed. Warranty applies to manufacturing defects. The guarantee applies when not working bluetooth, faulty LED flashlight or speaker (no music). Because it is a small speaker, it is possible that the radio does not reach everywhere, and that is not covered by the warranty. Also, wear on the color or symbols on the buttons can not be guaranteed, as well as letting the rubber strip. If this accidentally happens to solve the last simple with superglue around. When opening AltaLed void the warranty. Always use only the supplied cables.

 

Q: What is the delivery time?

A: We will order during or directly after the campaign will ended, and we hope to ship out in Januari 2017.

 

Q: I read something about AltaLed 2.0?

A: Yes that is possible. I am still working with my suppliers and I am testing now a new update for AltaLed. If we reach 50.000 USD you unlock this new update with new material, better and new functions.

 

Q: I am a reseller / supplier and want to order bigger lots, is that possible and can I get an extra discount to make this more interesting for resellers?

A: We highly welcome bulk lots. Just contact us and we will give you a personal perk by email (get a link to indiegogo and buy the amount you want) How more you want to buy, how better price I can offer you!

Best regards from the Netherlands, Noordeloos. Theo Lock.

story: This project has done enough preparation work, except for force majeure factors, our team will successfully complete the delivery, and follow up the after-sales, with customer satisfaction as the first goal.
