story:
Expressive Playing with Zvuk9

In this video, I play a harp and to add more color to it, I set up a violin in the upper parts of all pads and a guitar to the right by controlling their volumes with X and Y. To add even more expressiveness, I map a tremolo effect to the aftertouch.


Live Act with Zvuk9

In this video, I give you some ideas on how you could use Zvuk9 during a live performance by controlling audio clip levels, adjusting FX controls, and playing notes.


Zvuk9 as a Synth Interface

In this video, I use Zvuk9 to both play and control Sub Phatty's parameters. Zvuk9 becomes an alternative synth interface, which you can use explicitly or together with the knobs and keys on the synth itself.


Zvuk9 Feature List

  • 9 pressure and position sensitive pads
  • Velocity sensitive (3 levels of sensitivity and 3 velocity response curves)
  • X and Y MIDI assignable to CC. CCs can be the same for all pads or unique per pad
  • X or Y can be set to send pitch bend instead of CC
  • Aftertouch (channel or polyphonic)
  • 15 programs for storing settings (scale, tonic, split status, X & Y controls, on/off status for notes, aftertouch, and X and Y)
  • 7 predefined scales available: natural minor, harmonic minor, melodic minor, major, harmonic major, pentatonic minor, and pentatonic major
  • 10 user scales available so you can set which pad will play which note or notes
  • Chords can be assigned through user scales, a maximum of 7 notes can be assigned to a pad
  • Tonic can be set with Notes buttons
  • Notes buttons are illuminated, showing which notes are currently available and which note is currently playing
  • By default, tonic goes on Pad1; by using Notes up/down function, all notes can be moved
  • Encoder controls for X & Y: CC, min, max, curve
  • Total of 13 response curves available for X and Y
  • 4 on/off buttons: notes, X, Y, and aftertouch
  • In Split mode, all controls for X and Y, state of 4 on/off buttons, and MIDI channel are unique per pad
  • Transport controls: play, stop, and record can be set to MCC, CC, or MCC+CC
  • Note off type choice (off channel, on channel/0 velocity)
  • All settings saved during reboot
  • MIDI over USB and MIDI through 3.5mm mini jack out (cable mini jack to MIDI DIN included)


It is simple to use Zvuk9

To show you what we mean by simple, we recorded a few short how-to videos so you can see for yourself.


HOW TO: Expressive Playing


HOW TO: X & Y Controls - CC, Min, Max, Curve


HOW TO: Scale, Tonic, Chords


HOW TO: Split Mode


The Idea

A few years ago, I was planning to buy a MIDI controller. I was tired of using a mouse and a piano roll when playing VST synths. While walking down the street thinking about what MIDI keyboard to choose, I saw a guy playing a Hang instrument. Watching his hands move, I thought "isn't this more enjoyable then pressing keys on a keyboard?"

The unexpected thrill of this eureka moment made me immediately phone my friend Ratko with an idea to make a MIDI controller shaped like a Hang instrument. We quickly realized a huge potential in adding X and Y controls to each pad and, since our first conversation about it, we were hooked. After thinking about it a good while, it seemed much more logical and natural to change the playing surface to square pads and create a square shape for the controller overall, so we went with it.

Now, more than 3 years later, we have fully functional prototypes of an expressive MIDI controller and control surface that is much more than just another pad-based MIDI controller.



What Is the Status of the Project?

Prototypes seen in the videos above are fifth generation. We put a lot of work and many upgrades into the Zvuk9 over the past 3 years to get to where we are today. We chose to wait until we had a prototype ready for use – and now we’re there and ready to offer it to you.

All functionalities mentioned above on this page are fully developed and tested.

Although the latest prototypes look great, we will change some minor details to improve aesthetics. We have quotes in hand for the housing, sensors, electronics, and other minor parts. Taking all that into account, we believe Zvuk9 will be in your hands soon.



Challenges

We will continue to improve Zvuk9, making it better than it already is. In fact, we will upgrade the current AVR architecture to ARM. This allows us to add new features, both those suggested by you and from our own wish list. The most immediate improvement this provides is the ability to play Zvuk9 with drum sticks. The upgrade will require us to port about 10% of our code. We have taken this into account when creating our timeline and added another 4 weeks to deal with any unexpected delays. We will do everything possible to promptly deal with any such delays.

In-house Assembly & Personal Quality Control

  • To ensure every unit ships out in perfect condition we will assemble them in-house so that we have every aspect under our control.
  • Additionally, we, Ratko and Dragan, will calibrate sensors and test every controller before we send it to you.

Perks, Shipping, VAT, Duties

You now have the opportunity to pre-order your Zvuk9 unit at the discounted price $848.00. The estimated price after the campaign ends is $1065.00.

If you are in the EU and buying as an individual, we need to add 25% VAT. The best way to do this at IndieGoGo is to charge VAT at checkout as a shipping charge.

If you are ordering as an EU based company, after the campaign ends, send us your VAT ID via email and we will refund you 25%.

If you live outside the EU region, VAT is not an issue, and you don’t have to worry about it. There might be some charges charged to you by customs office or post office for taxes and duties according to your country's regulations.

Shipping outside the EU region is 38.00 USD.

It's Not Just Zvuk9

We will deliver your Zvuk9 to you, and we’re sure you will enjoy playing it.

But, there's more.

Your support will motivate us to develop new, exciting products.

We already have some fresh ideas waiting...
story_txt:
Expressive Playing with Zvuk9In this video, I play a harp and to add more color to it, I set up a violin in the upper parts of all pads and a guitar to the right by controlling their volumes with X and Y. To add even more expressiveness, I map a tremolo effect to the aftertouch.Live Act with Zvuk9In this video, I give you some ideas on how you could use Zvuk9 during a live performance by controlling audio clip levels, adjusting FX controls, and playing notes.Zvuk9 as a Synth InterfaceIn this video, I use Zvuk9 to both play and control Sub Phatty's parameters. Zvuk9 becomes an alternative synth interface, which you can use explicitly or together with the knobs and keys on the synth itself.Zvuk9 Feature List
9 pressure and position sensitive pads
Velocity sensitive (3 levels of sensitivity and 3 velocity response curves)
X and Y MIDI assignable to CC. CCs can be the same for all pads or unique per pad
X or Y can be set to send pitch bend instead of CC
Aftertouch (channel or polyphonic)
15 programs for storing settings (scale, tonic, split status, X & Y controls, on/off status for notes, aftertouch, and X and Y)

Note off type choice (off channel, on channel/0 velocity)

story:
Meet GALA

GALA unveils astonishing layers of detail in music, opening up the sound-stage, improving instrument separation, and propelling rhythm with irresistible energy. Hear your favorite songs as if for the first time, and get fresh insight on the music you love. With twin flagship Burr-Brown® PCM1794As DACs, GALA will satisfy anyone who loves music, and those who are curious to hear just how good their system can sound.

GALA uses linear power supplies (LPS) to deliver clean DC power to its analog components. This clean DC power has very low noise, which improves the sonic quality of the music. With clean power, you get more natural and transparent music.

In addition to the linear power supplies GALA performs filtering in multiple steps to deliver the most pure analog signal.

What does GALA do?

Many people don't know this, but our human ears can't actually hear digital audio.

Digital data has to be converted into analog before we can hear it. To do this, we use digital-to-analog converters, also known as DACs.

DACs are everywhere: in our phones, in our cable boxes, in our computers. Seriously. They're everywhere. The problem with the DACs that we find in all of our devices is simple: they're made to do the job with the least amount of effort and the lowest cost to build.

The GALA DAC is designed differently. Instead of just barely getting the job done, it goes the extra mile, up a hill, to get the job done well. Very well. So well that there's no other DAC that can do what it does without having to pay much more.

GALA - What's inside?

GALA was designed from the ground up using quality components from the biggest names: Texas Instruments, Linear Technology, Cirrus Logic, and Panasonic, to name a few. 

GALA is a follow-up to the successful crowdfunding of the ApplePi DAC. GALA improves on the design and provides a complete standalone solution.

Full GALA Specs

  • SNR: 130dB (A-Weighted, 10Hz - 22kHz bandwidth)
  • THD+N: <-108dB (0dbFS) or <0.0004%
  • Output Level: 5 Vrms (XLR)
  • Output Impedance: 100 ohm
  • Frequency Response: DC - 22kHz
  • Input: Gold Plated Coaxial S/Pdif
  • Sample Rates: 44.1, 48, 88.2, 96, 176.4 and 192kHz
  • Resolution: 16 and 24-bits
  • Size: 5.5'' x 4.25'' x 2.375''
  • Volume Control: 0 to -80dB, and mute (knob turned fully counter-clockwise)
  • Manufactured in USA
  • Support for upstream MQA decode
  • Support for upstream Dolby Atmos decode
  • Support for upstream Dolby TrueHD decode
  • Support for upstream Dolby DTS-HD decode
  • Support for upstream Dolby DTS:X decode

Using GALA

With GALA you can create a very simple yet very high performance audio system. Besides GALA all you need is a digital source and a power amplifier with speakers or powered speakers.

Using GALA with RCA (single ended devices):

To use GALA with devices that have RCA inputs all you need are XLR to RCA cables. Make sure that the cables have pin 3 floating on the XLR side. Most standard XLR to RCA cables short pin 3 to pin 1 which will not work with GALA. Here is a very good cable at this link.

GALA vs Others

Preliminary Test Data*

Dynamic Range (A-Weighted, 20 Hz to 22 kHz bandwidth)*:

Frequency Response (0dBFS)*:

THD+N vs. Frequency (0dbFS)*:

IMD vs Level*:

*These are preliminary measurements from the prototype final results may vary. It is more than likely that with new tweaks the results will be even better. I will be posting a campaign update with results for the final unit tests in the coming weeks.

Risks & Challenges

Developing GALA was not cheap and required a lot of time. 

With the prototype units, the design has been fully tested and proven. Only some minor fine tuning is needed before moving to mass production. This includes tweaks to components and component placement to improve and streamline manufacturing.

Most of the risk is associated with setting up mass production. I am currently working with three different manufacturers and suppliers to get everything in order.

Project Milestones

  • 200-299 GALAs Sold --> Each unit will also ship with a $10 USD gift card to HD Tracks
  • 300-499 GALAs Sold --> Each unit will also ship with a $15 USD gift card to HD Tracks
  • 500+ GALAs Sold --> Each unit will also ship with a $25 USD gift card to HD Tracks

Funding

The funding from this project will be split in the following manner.

  • moving GALA into mass production (75%)
  • future products and innovation (20%)
  • Orchard Audio website updates, associated with GALA (5%)

About Orchard Audio

Orchard Audio is the brainchild of Leonid (Leo) Ayzenshtat who has multiple patents and decades of engineering expertise with some of the world's most advanced companies (NASA, Lockheed Martin, L3 Technologies, Siemens).

After designing products for several elite names in the industry, Orchard Audio was launched in 2017 to independently release its own line of advanced, high performance audio products.

Anyone can notice the difference in quality, but not everyone will appreciate it. We design our products for those who appreciate excellence in their listening experience.

Referral Rewards

Help us spread the word and earn 10% commission. Joint the referral program at this link:

https://gala-ultra-high-performance-st.kickbooster.me/boost

 

How do you like them apples?

story:
The ETHER Transmitter by ETHER Electronics, is the first low-latency pro-audio all-in-one bluetooth 1/4" adapter. It lets you instantly share wireless audio with any bluetooth capable earbuds, headphones or speakers. This is what the DJ community has been waiting for. Cut those wires, and be liberated!

ETHER Transmitter will allow you to use any Bluetooth headphones or speakers to enjoy an untethered performance. It's the world's first bluetooth 1/4" adapter designed specifically for the performer — as well as musicians interested in a low-latency wireless performance.

Jordy Dazz


Steven Spence

Instagram | Facebook | Twitter | Bandcamp | Website

Low-latency during your performance

A revolutionary approach for performers seeking to cut those headphone wires while in the mix – the ETHER Transmitter will use low-latency Bluetooth technology to stream audio at an un-perceivable listening rate. Our EE team is aiming to get the latency down to as low as 10.5ms (tops 40ms), whereas average Bluetooth ranges upwards of 100ms. It’s a perfect solution for DJ’s, recording artists, and musicians.

The ETHER Transmitter is perfect for...

Compatible with all pro-audio hardware

Easily play audio from any pro-hardware source ranging from DJ mixers, headphone pre-amps, guitar/bass amps, audio sound cards, and more.




ETHER Charging Case

Set the ETHER Transmitter into its Charging Case and the Status Ring will blink while charging. The charging case uses a micro-USB to provide energy to the embedded groove of the ETHER Transmitter.




ETHER Transmitter is making portable DJ’ing even better

In addition to wireless headphones, you can connect to any Bluetooth speakers as well, ￼ which allows you to DJ without having to worry about transporting massive speakers everywhere. Consider this even easier as a mobile DJ for a quick pop-up set-up.




ETHER Transmitter was thoughtfully designed to look great as well as offer perfect portability. Currently available in color choices: ETHER Blue, Green, Pink, Orange, Yellow, Red.


Prototyping & Development

Within less than a year, the ETHER Audio team has worked closely with our design and engineering partners to bring the ETHER Transmitter from a sketch to a sleek and finalized industrial design. Building on what we learned in testing (round 1) – the A/D converters in the standard Bluetooth chip can't process the audio signal fast enough – so we need to get to our next prototype finalized and tested once more before we can bring the ETHER Transmitter to the world as an official product.


Packaging Design Concepts

We’ve collected a small list of “reasons why most DJ’s haven’t trusted common transmitters”, and plan to tackle the remaining issue, latency. The critical next steps are to finish modifying the in progress Bluetooth chip for the final prototype, and begin testing the consumer version hardware (immediately). Now we’re turning to Indiegogo to raise the funds needed to finish our consumer-ready prototype and bring the ETHER Transmitter to the world.



Why IndieGoGo?

When we first started developing the ETHER Transmitter, we quickly realized that we had come up with a game changing solution for the DJ community/performing artists and musicians. The Indiegogo community has been responsible for supporting some amazing projects by creators like us, and we felt that they would be equally as excited about the ETHER Transmitter. Today, we’re proud to be sharing these exciting next steps with our backers and supporters.

Next Steps

Backer Perks


Special Edition ETHER Tee exclusively for our IndieGoGo supporters!

See "Perks" at the top of the page for more info on everything you'll get when you help make the ETHER Transmitter happen!



About Team ETHER

We are a small but skilled group of innovators who seek to share our creations with the world of audio heads. Our diverse backgrounds include experience in the music business, project management, finance, various aspects of product design and development, and more. After years of professional experience working on numerous projects, we all shared the common vision for this first ETHER Electronics, and decided to team up for this startup and selected the ETHER Transmitter as our pilot project. The idea for ETHER Electronics first came about during a rehearsal set, when a friend asked the simple question, “Can I pair my wireless headphones to your mixer?” Immediately we did the research to try to find a product – that we were sure exists – only to find nothing. We knew then that we had to break this barrier and change the game. After countless nights of no sleep, ETHER Transmitter began to take shape, and we enlisted the expertise of product designers, developers and engineers to help us bring the ETHER Transmitter to the point we’re at now. Just a few more steps and we’ll be able to bring the ETHER Transmitter to the world.



What’s different from the ETHER Transmitter compared to transmitters available on the market right now? Why is it so expensive compared to those that already exist?

The ETHER Transmitter is incomparable to existing transmitters on the market, since we’re primarily focusing on the pro-audio users – and the professional standard is a 1/4 headphone jack. Even if you were to add a 1/4 headphone adapter to an existing transmitter, you’re adding an extra step to the signal flow, therefore resulting to a fraction of milliseconds added to the transmitters conversion latency rate. In short, the ETHER Transmitter will still remain ahead of the race in regards to latency.

The ETHER Transmitter is a premium product, and the materials we’re choosing to use aren’t cheap. We focused our attention on building a high quality product that’s not only going to be durable and sleek, in feel, but will also survive a beating and still remain functional. Once you feel it for yourself, we can assure you that you won’t be disappointed.

Why isn’t there a specific latency rate being provided?

Our resource has been developing a proprietary chip for the past 4 years that offers 10.5ms of latency. We plan to integrate and develop that technology into our bluetooth transmitter, and once the development has been paid for, we’ll be able to run tests on the modified chip to provide a solid number. We do know for certain that it will be in the range of 10.5ms-40ms tops. Of course it’s in our best interest to get the playback latency as close to real-time as possible.

How is this going to help the DJ community when it’s only adding another step for us to worry about?

Pair, plug, play, and repeat. The only step you’re adding is making sure it’s charged before a performance. This product is for those who seek mobility and freedom while performing, without having to constantly be picking up your headphones and setting them down. Essentially the last thing you should have to worry about are your headphones during performance.

When will I get to choose my color?

Before we begin shipping (about a month before), we’ll send an email survey asking you which color you’d like – based on our collection of provided colors.

Why is the estimated shipping date so far out?

As mentioned throughout the campaign, we plan to raise the funds necessary for our final development phase. It can take up to 6 months or more to get to that point, but there’s also a chance we could start shipping sooner – as long as everything goes according to plan. Regardless updates will be issued.

The headphones I use aren’t made in bluetooth, will you be coming out with a receiver at some point?

If the demand is high enough, we’ve considered making a receiver. Although the entire purpose of our product is to completely cut the wires. This possibility would vary according to popular demand. Maybe we’ll run a two part campaign... 

---

Still have questions? Let us know, and we'll add them to our list!




Risks and Challenges

There are many challenges when it comes to designing and manufacturing a product like the ETHER Transmitter. Supply issues and manufacturing delays are not uncommon, and technical and design challenges can and do arise. With this bared in mind, we have aligned ourselves with experts in the manufacturing realm who have provided us with the best and worst scenarios as far as realistic timelines go. Our goal is black & white: create the highest quality product we can for our backers. While delays may occur at any stage, we are committed to delivering a product that exceeds the expectations of our backer community, while keeping them informed during the entire process. With a project like ours, making it right is the true game changer. We’re here to make it happen, and in advance, we thank our backers.

Prototyping & Development
Within less than a year, the ETHER Audio team has worked closely with our design and engineering partners to bring the ETHER Transmitter from a sketch to a sleek and finalized industrial design. Building on what we learned in testing (round 1) – the A/D converters in the standard Bluetooth chip can't process the audio signal fast enough – so we need to get to our next prototype finalized and tested once more before we can bring the ETHER Transmitter to the world as an official product.










Packaging Design Concepts


We’ve collected a small list of “reasons why most DJ’s haven’t trusted common transmitters”, and plan to tackle the remaining issue, latency. The critical next steps are to finish modifying the in progress Bluetooth chip for the final prototype, and begin testing the consumer version hardware (immediately). Now we’re turning to Indiegogo to raise the funds needed to finish our consumer-ready prototype and bring the ETHER Transmitter to the world.



Why IndieGoGo?
When we first started developing the ETHER Transmitter, we quickly realized that we had come up with a game changing solution for the DJ community/performing artists and musicians. The Indiegogo community has been responsible for supporting some amazing projects by creators like us, and we felt that they would be equally as excited about the ETHER Transmitter. Today, we’re proud to be sharing these exciting next steps with our backers and supporters.
Next Steps




Backer Perks




Special Edition ETHER Tee exclusively for our IndieGoGo supporters!



See "Perks" at the top of the page for more info on everything you'll get when you help make the ETHER Transmitter happen!








About Team ETHER
We are a small but skilled group of innovators who seek to share our creations with the world of audio heads. Our diverse backgrounds include experience in the music business, project management, finance, various aspects of product design and development, and more. After years of professional experience working on numerous projects, we all shared the common vision for this first ETHER Electronics, and decided to team up for this startup and selected the ETHER Transmitter as our pilot project. The idea for ETHER Electronics first came about during a rehearsal set, when a friend asked the simple question, “Can I pair my wireless headphones to your mixer?” Immediately we did the research to try to find a product – that we were sure exists – only to find nothing. We knew then that we had to break this barrier and change the game. After countless nights of no sleep, ETHER Transmitter began to take shape, and we enlisted the expertise of product designers, developers and engineers to help us bring the ETHER Transmitter to the point we’re at now. Just a few more steps and we’ll be able to bring the ETHER Transmitter to the world.










What’s different from the ETHER Transmitter compared to transmitters available
on the market right now? Why is it so expensive compared to those that already
exist?



The ETHER Transmitter is incomparable to existing transmitters on the market, since
we’re primarily focusing on the pro-audio users – and the professional standard is a 1/4
headphone jack. Even if you were to add a 1/4 headphone adapter to an existing
transmitter, you’re adding an extra step to the signal flow, therefore resulting to a
fraction of milliseconds added to the transmitters conversion latency rate. In short, the
ETHER Transmitter will still remain ahead of the race in regards to latency.

The ETHER Transmitter is a premium product, and the materials we’re choosing to use
aren’t cheap. We focused our attention on building a high quality product that’s not only
going to be durable and sleek, in feel, but will also survive a beating and still remain
functional. Once you feel it for yourself, we can assure you that you won’t be
disappointed.

Why isn’t there a specific latency rate being provided?

Our resource has been developing a proprietary chip for the past 4 years that offers
10.5ms of latency. We plan to integrate and develop that technology into our bluetooth
transmitter, and once the development has been paid for, we’ll be able to run tests on
the modified chip to provide a solid number. We do know for certain that it will be in the
range of 10.5ms-40ms tops. Of course it’s in our best interest to get the playback
latency as close to real-time as possible.

How is this going to help the DJ community when it’s only adding another step
for us to worry about?

Pair, plug, play, and repeat. The only step you’re adding is making sure it’s charged
before a performance. This product is for those who seek mobility and freedom while
performing, without having to constantly be picking up your headphones and setting
them down. Essentially the last thing you should have to worry about are your
headphones during performance.

When will I get to choose my color?

Before we begin shipping (about a month before), we’ll send an email survey asking you
which color you’d like – based on our collection of provided colors.








Why is the estimated shipping date so far out?

As mentioned throughout the campaign, we plan to raise the funds necessary for our
final development phase. It can take up to 6 months or more to get to that point, but
there’s also a chance we could start shipping sooner – as long as everything goes
according to plan. Regardless updates will be issued.

The headphones I use aren’t made in bluetooth, will you be coming out with a
receiver at some point?

If the demand is high enough, we’ve considered making a receiver. Although the entire
purpose of our product is to completely cut the wires. This possibility would vary
according to popular demand. Maybe we’ll run a two part campaign... 
---
Still have questions? Let us know, and we'll add them to our list!






Risks and Challenges
There are many challenges when it comes to designing and manufacturing a product like the ETHER Transmitter. Supply issues and manufacturing delays are not uncommon, and technical and design challenges can and do arise. With this bared in mind, we have aligned ourselves with experts in the manufacturing realm who have provided us with the best and worst scenarios as far as realistic timelines go. Our goal is black & white: create the highest quality product we can for our backers. While delays may occur at any stage, we are committed to delivering a product that exceeds the expectations of our backer community, while keeping them informed during the entire process. With a project like ours, making it right is the true game changer. We’re here to make it happen, and in advance, we thank our backers.

story:
Hi,

I am planning on making an app that will allow users to vote for what music is played. This will work when one device claims themselves as the host phone which is connected to a music device such as a bluetooth speaker.

The host phone will then create a lobby that anyone else with the app will be able to join. The host can make the lobby private with a password or can make it public making it available for anyone to join.

Once people are in the lobby, they will have access to music from Spotify and other music streaming apps, and maybe even be able to access music personally installed on there device.

Once someone has selected a song they like, they can add it to the queue. Therefore there will be a queue of songs from anyone who is in the lobby.

If there is a song on that someone doesn't like, they are allowed to vote for a skip, the song will skip if there is enough votes.

Differences between free and paid versions.

Free version: Limited songs allowed to queue from that persons device. (e.g. they are allowed to queue 3 songs every hour).  Limited times they cast a vote to skip. (e.g. they are allowed to vote to skip 3 songs an hour). Also maybe some adverts, not sure as of right now.

Paid Version: Allowed to queue more songs (Not sure on how many yet or whether or not to make it unlimited). Allowed to vote to skip more songs. (Again not sure how many to make it).

The amount of times people can queue and skip songs will change depending on how many people are in the lobby. e.g. (If there are only 2 people controlling the music at a party of 20, then the 2 people will join the lobby and they will be able to queue 10-20 songs per hour).

 

 

 

Challenges are going to be giving access to music already installed on someones device and being able to cast that to the host device through the app as the host device may not have that song installed on their device.
I feel like this might be possible but people will still have access to other music through Spotify, Youtube etc.

Not sure if I will be able to give people access to Spotify premium if they pay for my app without having to pay for Spotify Premium. 
Again people will still have access to the free version of Spotify if this isn't possible but they will also have access to other music streamers such as Youtube.

story:
Benefits of Graphene 

 

 

LA Startup !

Los Angeles is a rapidly growing city in Southern California and is the nucleus of the country's television and film industry and over all entertaiment .

 How ever is also the birth place of Henlein tech startup with fresh and new ideas to innovate on the technological industry 

What is Henlein?

Henlein came out from music and my desire to do better first I notice that I didn’t like any of the TWS Bluetooth earbuds offer by other name brands so I came out with my own version which provides twice of performance in comparation with other brands we also wanted to integrate the latest audio technology but still keep it affordable.

So, I sat down to work on it for about 18 month including holydays to present you the best product I could give you.

At designing these earbuds, we made sure of these 5 things

  1. Minimalistic design
  2. Make sure it looks good on any outfit
  3. Integrate the latest audio technology 
  4. provide hi fidelity sound
  5. but still keep it affordable

The Henlein Collection

The launch collection come in two colors Artic White and Obsidian Black we may introduce more colors in the future

Why We’re Raising Money

In order to turn this dream of ours into a reality, we need your support. Not only does this mean pledging for one of our awesome TWS Bluetooth earbuds but sharing the story with a friend. The important thing to remember with IndieGoGo is, if we don't reach our full funding goal.... we get nothing

We are going to do everything we can to spread the word in a variety of ways.  We hope through the use of social media and blogs we can drive enough outside traffic to our page which will result in us reaching our funding goal.

You could do also the same by joining to the ambassador program!

What is the ambassador program?

Well, theirs’s 3 tiers the first ambassador could purchase a henlein artic white and obsidian black at a 10% discount.

the second tier is ambassador plus you will get henlein artic white and obsidian black at a 10% discount plus a donation of five dollar.

 The third tier is the hi five contribution you could still contribute by promoting the crowdfunding on social media and donate five dollars to the cause. 

What we will do with the funds raised

There still Work on the inkwell first send the pre-sold earbuds to our IndieGoGo backers; composite materials such as graphene still expensive today; our company wants to change that there’s also money to be invest on the company web site, gear & also recruit talented staff to take the company to the next level.

how will you fulfill the orders?

Once Indiegogo releases the funds, we can pay the initial deposit to begin production.  Production time takes roughly 30 days depending on the quantity of the order.  Our team will then ship the orders to our awesome backers! We have experience with shipping software and thermal printers which should make for a very smooth process 

Risks and challenges

The challenges of Henlein will be getting the word out, and convincing IndieGoGo’s to participate. With so many great projects to choose from, we hope ours will stand apart from the rest. To reach as many people as possible, we are asking friends, families, and various blogs to help spread the word.

Once the funding is in place, the challenge will be producing on a large scale. Depending on outside help is difficult, but we have been dealing with a manufacturer for months and have established a solid relationship, which has given us a lot of confidence in them.

Sincerely

story:
Who are we?

We are a small mexican company formed by engineering students who want to change the world in which we live. Technology is evolving and we will be part of that evolution. We will work together to better this world, we are Change, we are Commitment, we are C. Technology and Services.

The Idea.

I am Daniel Cano founder of C. and i have been playing guitar since I was 13 years old. I know the pain of traveling arround carrying all your gear wich is why we created the RockOut! Mod.

Just plug your guitar and start rocking, With its 5w speaker and standard 1/4" mount jack you'll have your own amp in the palm of your hand. You can use different effects, a range of drum/bass/guitar backing tracks, and you can record those sick riffs any time any place. "What if I'm a singer?" I hear you ask, don't worry! Just connect your headphones to your Moto Z and record using it's integrated microphone! Sing like there's no tomorrow. Share your songs with your friends and use their tracks as your own backing tracks. But most importantly, don't forget to RockOut! \m/

 

In the begining there were four...

We are expanding our workforce so that we can deliver a functional prototype of this mod, complete with it's app, at the begining of march. Your contibution will help us pay not only the materials for more than one prototype, but our new software developers, robotics engineers and musicians team here at C.

First the mod, then the world!

Help us make this mod the best it can be and help it reach every corner of the world, if you can't donate help us with your opinion, share this with your friends and family. Be part of the evolution of technology!

We are Composers, we  are C.

RockOut!, a Moto ModsTM concept for Moto Z smartphones.”“*Moto Mods™ is a trademark of Motorola Trademark Holdings, LLC.

story:
Introducing GABBY

GABBY, our latest waterproof speaker, has been designed for people who are looking for fun and practical speakers - yet still want to experience high-quality sound with friends or on their own. With so many IoT listening and spying on us, this voice-controlled, smart speaker has the uniqueness to work with or without Wifi.

Wifi-free: Gabby connects via Bluetooth to your phone so you don’t need any Wifi connection – ideal for outdoor activities with family and friends. No-one is listening to your conversation

UNCOMPROMISED HIGH FIDELITY SOUND

360 omnidirectional crisp sound to fill up your room with clear, intelligible HD sound and deep bass – a pleasure for everyone 

Deep bass, full midrange, crisp highs to enjoy all your music through the Mymanu Play dedicated App

Unique technology to stick on any surface(i.e. wood, glass, metal, plastic…) and create a unique feature in the room

STYLISH AND PRACTICAL TO IMPRESS

Iconic oval metal plate gives understated premium look that complements any fashion style

Unobtrusive charging contact points for great fit

Beautiful harmony of different high-end materials and finishes combined into one unique design

Lightweight and convenient carrying base

Dust-free

 

 

SMART FOR A MORE COMFORTABLE EXPERIENCE

Simplified controls for ease of use and higher execution (one button)

Voice control

VIDEOS / IMAGES of actual voice control situations with captions. 

Someone in the shower answering a call

Someone by the pool getting his text message read

 

Receive notifications of incoming texts, calls and emails

Secured and private connect

Bluetooth . 

Mymanu will not be listening or monitoring your conversation with GABBY. Your privacy will be protected

Proprietary operating system powering Gabby. App uniquely designed to enable music lovers and audiophiles to easily access from one platform all their playlists and streams whilst discovering and creating new music

Supports:

iPhone and Android Phone Application for User, 

 

Please note that shipping to any country outside the United Kingdom, Europe, USA, Canada and China may be delayed or cancelled depending on the feasibility of local product approval requirements or local import regulations. In a case of cancellation, we will refund your pledge. There may be additional duties, fees or taxes raised by the authorities in your country. You may need to take care of them yourself when receiving the shipment.

story:
By combining the features of headphones with a massager we have developed the world's first wireless earphones with an integrated pulse massager, the DrowseBuster-P. 

 

 

DrowseBuster-P allows you to enjoy high quality music as well as improve your overall wellbeing anywhere and at any time. By using our integrated pulse massager, DrowseBuster-P can help you safely stimulate your ears and boost your overall health.

 

 

 

 

The DrowseBuster-P Bluetooth earphones were developed with an integrated pulse massager that uses modern scientific principles to target and stimulate ear-related nerve endings. When using DrowseBuster-P to listen to music, the audio signals are converted into targeted pulse stimulation of your nerve endings effectively helping you by reducing stress levels and boosting overall health.

 

 

By intelligently matching the pulse intensity and frequency with the music’s rhythm DrowseBuster-P allows you to stay productive by directly stimulating your brain using high frequency sound wave music like rock and pop music.

By playing comfortable and soft music on your DrowseBuster-P you can easily relieve some of the built-up pressure and achieve a more relaxed state of mind. 

 

By taking advantage of DrowseBuster-P’s high frequency mode when listening to upbeat high frequency music you can prepare your body to face bigger challenges. 

The correct stimulation of your nerve endings can decrease the gastrointestinal hunger signals sent to the brain hypothalamus and therefore reduce appetite to improve your body shape.

 

High quality sleep is essential in order to maintain good mental and physical health. Using the DrowseBuster-P before sleeping by listening to suitable music will improve your quality of sleep by providing low frequency stimulation of your brain.

 

 

The latest Bluetooth 5.0 technology and advanced acoustic components ensure brilliant sound quality with deep bass and crystal-clear treble.

 

The neckband design allows you to comfortably enjoy the full benefits of DrowseBuster-P all day long. Enjoy HIFI music, phone calls and a pulse massager in a compact and comfortable form factor that allows you to stay active and do so much more than with any other headphones currently on the market. 

 

DrowseBuster-P is equipped with 4GB memory of internal storage, more than 1000 songs or audio files can be pre-saved in your DrowseBuster-P. Meanwhile, a 330 mA/h battery will guarantee more than 15 hours of playback time. You no longer need to carry your mobile phone to enjoy high quality music everywhere.

 

The functional magnetic design of our earbuds makes it easy to keep the wires from entangling and keeps them neat and organized. An interactive flowing light looks the design very unique and cool. 

 

 

DrowseBuster-P is equipped with Bluetooth 5.0 technology that significantly improves performance over previous generations, effectively preventing various WIFI, Bluetooth, and other signal interferences. This technology makes sure you will enjoy an uninterrupted music stream, all without compromising on comfort and usability.

 

 

 

DrowseBuster-P has a transfer rate of 2MB/s, and audio latency is kept below 0.1s, providing remarkable sound quality delivery with no delay in gaming audio or music.   

 

After you have paired DrowseBuster-P for the first time, it will automatically connect to your device by simply turning it on. 

 

 DrowseBuster-P provides 15 hours of music listening on a single charge and fully charges within 2 hours. 

 

Standard wireless Bluetooth headphones usually provide only up to 3~6 hours of listening time. In comparison, DrowseBuster-P’s battery life is 2~5 times greater than most headphones on the market.

 

Rated IPX4, you can enjoy your DrowseBuster-P even during the most intense workouts by relying on its strong water-resistance performance.   

 

Avoid having to use your phone by relying on our innovative knob button to control your music.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Foshan Drowse Buster Tech. Ltd was established in Feb. 2015 in China by a group of young people from British and Canadian universities, affiliated company of Moral Trend Dev. Ltd HK, We are an innovative company with a mission to bring you the most technologically advanced, multifunctional wireless headphones you've ever seen. 

 

We believe even the smallest innovations can lead to profound changes in our daily lives. It is with this belief that over the course of 700 days the DrowseBuster-P was created. Leading with the DrowseBuster-P as its forerunner, DrowseBuster seamlessly integrates wearable tech into any active lifestyle.

By using our integrated pulse massager, DrowseBuster-P can help you safely stimulate your ears and boost your overall health.    The DrowseBuster-P Bluetooth earphones were developed with an integrated pulse massager that uses modern scientific principles to target and stimulate ear-related nerve endings. When using DrowseBuster-P to listen to music, the audio signals are converted into targeted pulse stimulation of your nerve endings effectively helping you by reducing stress levels and boosting overall health.  By intelligently matching the pulse intensity and frequency with the music’s rhythm DrowseBuster-P allows you to stay productive by directly stimulating your brain using high frequency sound wave music like rock and pop music.By playing comfortable and soft music on your DrowseBuster-P you can easily relieve some of the built-up pressure and achieve a more relaxed state of mind.  By taking advantage of DrowseBuster-P’s high frequency mode when listening to upbeat high frequency music you can prepare your body to face bigger challenges. The correct stimulation of your nerve endings can decrease the gastrointestinal hunger signals sent to the brain hypothalamus and therefore reduce appetite to improve your body shape. High quality sleep is essential in order to maintain good mental and physical health. Using the DrowseBuster-P before sleeping by listening to suitable music will improve your quality of sleep by providing low frequency stimulation of your brain.  The latest Bluetooth 5.0 technology and advanced acoustic components ensure brilliant sound quality with deep bass and crystal-clear treble. The neckband design allows you to comfortably enjoy the full benefits of DrowseBuster-P all day long. Enjoy HIFI music, phone calls and a pulse massager in a compact and comfortable form factor that allows you to stay active and do so much more than with any other headphones currently on the market.  DrowseBuster-P is equipped with 4GB memory of internal storage, more than 1000 songs or audio files can be pre-saved in your DrowseBuster-P. Meanwhile, a 330 mA/h battery will guarantee more than 15 hours of playback time. You no longer need to carry your mobile phone to enjoy high quality music everywhere. The functional magnetic design of our earbuds makes it easy to keep the wires from entangling and keeps them neat and organized. An interactive flowing light looks the design very unique and cool.   DrowseBuster-P is equipped with Bluetooth 5.0 technology that significantly improves performance over previous generations, effectively preventing various WIFI, Bluetooth, and other signal interferences. This technology makes sure you will enjoy an uninterrupted music stream, all without compromising on comfort and usability.   DrowseBuster-P has a transfer rate of 2MB/s, and audio latency is kept below 0.1s, providing remarkable sound quality delivery with no delay in gaming audio or music.    After you have paired DrowseBuster-P for the first time, it will automatically connect to your device by simply turning it on.   DrowseBuster-P provides 15 hours of music listening on a single charge and fully charges within 2 hours.  Standard wireless Bluetooth headphones usually provide only up to 3~6 hours of listening time. In comparison, DrowseBuster-P’s battery life is 2~5 times greater than most headphones on the market. Rated IPX4, you can enjoy your DrowseBuster-P even during the most intense workouts by relying on its strong water-resistance performance.    Avoid having to use your phone by relying on our innovative knob button to control your music.       Foshan Drowse Buster Tech. Ltd was established in Feb. 2015 in China by a group of young people from British and Canadian universities, affiliated company of Moral Trend Dev. Ltd HK, We are an innovative company with a mission to bring you the most technologically advanced, multifunctional wireless headphones you've ever seen.  We believe even the smallest innovations can lead to profound changes in our daily lives. It is with this belief that over the course of 700 days the DrowseBuster-P was created. Leading with the DrowseBuster-P as its forerunner, DrowseBuster seamlessly integrates wearable tech into any active lifestyle.

story:
cable3 is a stylish minimalist Bluetooth cable management


Why you need it?


Apple has already launched the new Apple watch. It has fantastic functions which give a new user experience to us. It can wireless control all kind of things. However, many high quality earphones have not provide wireless version.. That means we must buy a Bluetooth earphones or a Bluetooth receiver. However,,,

Most existing Bluetooth ear buds are too large and uncomfortable, or very expensive


Using Bluetooth receiver can turn most of the ear buds into wireless earphones. However, existing design is for specific short cable earphones. Using with normal earphones such as Apple earpods will be inconvenience

Advantage of using cable3

cable3 combine the function of Bluetooth receiver and cable management which provide a new wireless experience for user. It is simple and cool!

Simple and quick steps to manage your cable

Simple & tidy

Easy to store

Comparison with existing solutions


Size & spec


Timeline of Project

After a few months of intensive prototyping, we have arrived at a finalized form/function that we satisfied with. With a successful demand at indiegogo, we will rapidly move to manufacturing plans and delivery.


Who we are?

We are informalhour, a design brand from Hong Kong. Informal hour means the moment of relaxation. We hope our designs are easy to use, and even help you to solve some little problems of daily life.


Why we need your funding?

By FUNDING our campaign, we will be able to proceed with the actual manufacturing process of cable3, which will require a minimum quantity to achieve the best lowest cost for you. We would also require funding for the final stage of manufacturing, tooling and packaging costs. To make our campaign a success, we need your support and contribution.


Why funding us?

If you are interested in our design, please FUND us now as we would need to keep the momentum going. We are sure that you will love it more when you get a real one! Every dollar counts and we will really appreciate all your support to bring cable3 to reality.

Become a backer! This campaign is a very secure and exclusive way for you to get our products at an unbeatable price.


Where does your money go?

We just want to bring cable3 to reality so nearly 100% of the money we will collect will be used to making the product themselves. It will cover the tooling, unit price and packaging cost.


Other ways you can help

Sharing our campaign to friends you think might be interested. Let us know if you're connected to any bloggers or press who might be interested to our design.


Risks and Challenges

We have dedicated countless of hours working together with our experienced manufacturer, trying to mitigate as much risks in all aspects of the product. Although we understand that there will be unexpected challenges along the way, we are confident that we will be able to deliver as per our projected plan. We will keep things transparent and inform our supporters of any hurdles/delay along the way.

FAQ

What is the compatibility of cable3?

cable3 compatible with both iPhone and Android smartwatch / smartphones / tablet with support for Bluetooth


Can I buy the cable3 after the campaign?

After the indiegogo campaign, cable3 will be available for sale at selected retailers. The retail price will be US$59 + shipping fee, so you save a lot during this campaign!


When will I receive cable3?

We have worked hard on shortening the production lead-time . Therefore, we will be able to deliver the cable3 to you from Oct 2015!


Do you ship everywhere? How much does it cost?

All price including shipping fee, wherever you are! No extra shipping cost required.


Will there be any additional fees?

There may be additional fees specific to your countries such as VAT, import and customs fees. We do not cover these possible extras.


How can I know the progress after the campaign?

Please follow us on Facebook as we will keep updating the manufacturing progress.


Contact us!

Any question? comments? Please do not hesitate to reach us at any time by email at informalhour@gmail.com

story:
Hi IndeGoGo! My name is Ryan and I love creating new products, developing software, and solving problems. My latest project is a solution for retaining the flexibility and comfort of your Apple headphones.

I’ve used the Apple Earbuds for quite some time, but they constantly fall out of my ears. I decided to come up with a preventative measure for buying new headphones while keeping them comfortably in my ears. When purchasing a new iPhone, you receive a great pair of headphones but unfortunately, there is one big problem, they just don't fit well/comfortably.

With Apple's new wireless AirPods, everyone has the obvious concern of losing them and as the world moves away from wires and ports, there should be adequate options to prevent the loss of small wirelessly connected devices.

All AirBand designs take into consideration the potential of loss but also the accommodate the desire for flexibility and freedom with Apple's wireless or wired headphones.

Quick and easy attachment to your Apple EarBuds or AirPods

AirBands provide a simple solution that don't change the size, shape or fit of your EarBud or AirPod headphone speaker. By mechanically fixing itself to the outside of the Apple headphones you retain a natural flexibility and fit for Apple’s design. The ear clip helps the headphones stay connected to your ear without increasing the diameter of the speaker area itself.

 

Quick and easy to insert and remove from your ear

From a manufacturing standpoint, I am utilizing the same material as the Apple iWatch bands, fluoroelastomer. It is a very high-quality medical grade material that allows for the final product to be strong and flexible while being very soft to the touch. 

Because every ear is different, AirBands are available in different sizes making them very comfortable regardless of the varying shapes and sizes of everyone's ears.

 

AirBand Tether - For AirPods

I understand people are going to lose their AirPods and the market is currently flooded with this type of product right now. Is this really the entire solution? For some, yes! The AirBand Tether is a simple way to retain connectivity between your AirPods and prevent loss. The goal of this design is to support the interaction pattern between taking your headphones on and off frequently. 

I have a lot of meetings on a day to day basis but I love having my headphones with me all the time. In this case, I might not always want to re-insert the Ear Clips repeatably all day and instead have my AirPods tethered to me.

 

AirBand EarClips - For AirPods or EarBuds

The AirBand EarClips come in sizes SM, MD, LG and are designed for the AirPods or EarBuds. Like the Clip & Tether, the stand alone EarClips are designed for a variety of triangular fossa sizes. You know -- that part of your ear that's just above the ear canal. These are the perfect companion for AirPods or EarBuds when freedom is an absolute must. 

Airbands are just as easy to insert or remove from the ear but, do not have a tether to keep them together. Mechanically designed to connect to the outside of the AirPods or Earbuds, they do not change the size of the speaker itself. Just snap them on and you’re done!

 

AirBand Ear Clip Tether - For AirPods

Available in sizes SM, MD, and Large, the AirBand EarClip Tether has an attached band between the Ear Clips to prevent your AirPods from getting lost. The Tether lengths are the same for all sizes but the ear-insert is specifically designed for various ear triangular fossa sizes. The design is specifically great for people on the go, playing sports, running or at the gym. They are easy to take on and off and can be easily worn around your neck.

 

Sizes for all ears -- This is really the most important part of the design. The EarClips (tethered or stand alone) will be offered in small, medium and large sizes. Comfort is key.

 

12 colors -- The material is the same as the Apple Watch Band, you can color match with your watch or mix things up.

 

Comfortable Ear Clips -- If you are active, working, or lounging around, your Apple EarBud's or AirPods will always stay in your ears.  The material can be easily trimmed for a customized fit.

Easy to use and maintain -- AirBands slide easily on and off when needed making them simple to wash with soapy water or remove as needed.

 

 

Timeline

This project is really straight forward. I have some mechanical engineering to complete on the other sizes (small and large). From there, it's a matter of cutting injection molds and making sure the manufacturing process runs smoothly. I've also got to get some packaging finished, make sure there are UPC codes in place and finish some copywriting

Final words

I'd really like to thank you for all of your support. If you are interested in becoming an international reseller or distributor of this product please reach out to me directly.

Thank you!
Ryan Roberts

story:
At Flykers we believe that the wireless is the future, so we are proud to present the Air One model, the next generation of wireless earphones, comfortable, stable, with the best sound quality, and at an affordable price.

Take a look at some features of the Air One model.

 

The time of the cables is over, Air One lets you listen to music, make calls, exercise, and perform the active tasks of your busy life brings with your hands totally free so you will fell comfortable and stylish.

 

We are really proud to have designed Flykers Air One using a carbon nanotube diaphragm which provides an excelent, sophisticated, clear and precise sound.

Moreover, we have implemented CVC 6.0 Noise cancellation technology, guaranteeing the best listening experience while you listen to music, make calls or watch movies or TV.

 

We wanted to delve into two fundamental aspects such as comfort and aesthetics obtaining unique earphones. On Flykers we did not want that the earphones look like a hearing aid, Air One is a elegant wireless player that preserves the aesthetics of old headphones removing unnecessary cables and adding a couple of microphones.

 

Comfort is something essential so the Air One model adapts perfectly to the auditory canal achieving a comfort and stability that allows hours and hours of reproduction without feeling the typical ear discomfort of old earphones.

To ensure the fit, we have analyzed different types of ears, after that we decided to design three different sizes of silicone tips to achieve the best adaptation to the ear canal, easy placement and good grip

 

The playback time of the Air One is more than 3 hours and the charging box offers more than 24 additional hours of battery.

 

 

The Flykers Air One use Bluetooh 4.2, the most reliable bluetooh version  that guarantees optimal connection and excellent data transfer. Air One connects over IPV6 to decrease energy consumption and provide safer internet access.  

We have tested the new version bluetooh 5.0 which causes a multitude of errors when you connect to other devices and interrupts the connection during data transfer, so we consider that it is  still an immature version.  

We consider that bluetooth version 4.2 is currently the most suitable and reliable for wireless players.

 

If while you are using them starts to rain you don´t need to worry because Air One model is sweatproof so you can use it when the weather conditions are not good. 

 

Once the first pairing is done,  Flykers will automatically connect by pressing both buttons at the same time.

 

You can do all kinds of activities with the Air One model.

 

 

Air One is designed to perform multiple functions with a single button control.

 

 

You can connect Flykers Air One with all kinds of devices and operating systems with Bluetooh.

 

General

  • High-Fidelity Sound
  • True Wireless Stereo Bluetooth
  • Dual omni-directional microphones
  • Sweatproof
  • Silicon Digital MEMS
  • CVC 6.0 Noise cancellation
  • Weight: 5g

Audio

  • Driver Diaphragm: 998 Carbon Nanotube
  • Driver Unit: 0.20” (5.2 mm) Hi-Fidelity MicroDrivers
  • Magnet Type: Neodymium
  • Sound: AAC, mSBC, SBC, and CVSD audio codec
  • Acoustic Architecture: Closed
  • Impedance: 16 Ohms
  • Frequency Response: 8Hz to24kHz
  • Sensitivity: 101dB SPL/1mW
  • Max. Input Capability: 30mW (IEC)

Connections

  • Wireless: Bluetooth 4.2 with IPV6 connection, +10m (free space)
  • Support Headset (HSP 1.2), Handsfree (HFP 1.6), A2DP 1.3 and AVRCP 1.6 profiles
  • Charging Box: USB-C connector 

Battery and Power

  • Charging box: 24+ hours listening time (8 full loads)
  • Earphones: 3+ hours listening time
  • Standby: +500h 
  • Battery Earphones: DC 5V 45mAh
  • Charging Box Battery: DC 5V 900mAh
  • Recharge: about 30 minutes 70% / about 60 minutes 100%

Dimensions

 

 

We have reduced campaign promotion spending to the maximum in order to offer the greatest possible discount to our backers. 

Please, share this campaign to make this project a reality. Even if you can not afford to cooperate economically, you will help us sharing because it is possible that some of your friends are interested.

You can contribute with your grain of sand to make this project possible, we collect all the names of those who share the campaign on social networks (whenever possible) and we will add everyone to our thank you page.   

Thank you very much :)

 

Our project was born in April 2016 to improve your quality of life. We are a group of engineers and entrepreneurs who try to combine our skills to develop a new alternative of wireless earphones. 

Nowadays there is no doubt that cables are unnecessary, so with our Air One model we combine the most aesthetic wireless design with the best audio quality, implementing the best technology and materials.

In less than two years, we have designed, developed and tested different prototypes to achieve the best possible quality at an affordable price. In this way we want to avoid that only some people can have the innovative technological products.

We need your help to make our project real and we want you to be part of it. 

Thank you so much for getting here!

story:
INTRODUCING JM2 

The World's Slimmest True Wireless Earbuds

 

LIGHT AS A FEATHER

Instead of fat TWS earplugs which you can find on any marketplace, we have created JM2 TWS.  They're half the size of the typical TWS earbuds you see online and are as light as a feather.

 

SUPERB SOUND QUALITY

JM2 is one of the smallest and most recommended earbuds in the market and is backed with superb sound quality. It is a fantastic digital sound earbud set to bring out the best experience in music and videos.

 

FASHIONABLE APPEARANCE

These aluminum earbuds are fashionable and elegant. They come in different colors which makes it even more exciting and exclusive.

 

THE BEST SMART CONNECTION TECHNOLOGY

JM2 earbuds have the best smart connection technology, making it easy to set up and use.   Take out both earbuds from the case and connect them to your phone. 

 

CUTTING THIN BUILD WITH SMOOTH AND GRIPPY SURFACE

The cutting edge thin build, extra smooth and grippy surface, ensure that it seats perfectly in your ears. 

 

THE DREAM EARBUDS FOR THIS GENERATION

Packed with incredible features like noise cancellation, waterproofing, and next-generation wireless functions, the JM2 TWS is the dream earbud for this generation. 

 

JM2 DESIGN & MAIN FEATURES

 

 

ULTRA SMALL & POWERFUL EARBUDS

At a width of 25mm and length of 24mm, the JM2 TWS is ultra small and half of most earbuds out there. Backed with the lightweight and feel, the JM2 offers you extreme comfort.

 

Beautiful Sounds That'll Fit into Your Lifestyle

 

DESIGN THAT FITS YOUR LIFESTYLE

Remember how time flies when you are into doing something you love? The JM2 earbud is here for you to ensure that you don’t take your trips, workouts, and runs alone or with poorer sound quality.

 

 

JM2 VS COMPETITORS

 

OUR STORY

 

 

100% customer satisfaction is our goal for the JM2 earbuds. For this reason, we hope to raise $20,000 to wrap up its final preparation and release. These include both sampling and marketing and of course, its mass production.

Here is your chance to secure early the JM2 special editions and support our project by picking any of the great rewards we have to offer.

Find someone who loves to enjoy the experience of listening to a really spectacular sound quality? Or want to be part of this cutting-edge invention? We invite you to share our campaign with such a person be it a friend or family!

Thanks so much and it is our wish to be shipping the JM2 Earbuds your way soon!
story_txt: INTRODUCING JM2 The World's Slimmest True Wireless Earbuds LIGHT AS A FEATHERInstead of fat TWS earplugs which you can find on any marketplace, we have created JM2 TWS.  They're half the size of the typical TWS earbuds you see online and are as light as a feather. SUPERB SOUND QUALITYJM2 is one of the smallest and most recommended earbuds in the market and is backed with superb sound quality. It is a fantastic digital sound earbud set to bring out the best experience in music and videos. FASHIONABLE APPEARANCEThese aluminum earbuds are fashionable and elegant. They come in different colors which makes it even more exciting and exclusive. THE BEST SMART CONNECTION TECHNOLOGYJM2 earbuds have the best smart connection technology, making it easy to set up and use.   Take out both earbuds from the case and connect them to your phone.  CUTTING THIN BUILD WITH SMOOTH AND GRIPPY SURFACEThe cutting edge thin build, extra smooth and grippy surface, ensure that it seats perfectly in your ears.  THE DREAM EARBUDS FOR THIS GENERATIONPacked with incredible features like noise cancellation, waterproofing, and next-generation wireless functions, the JM2 TWS is the dream earbud for this generation.  JM2 DESIGN & MAIN FEATURES  ULTRA SMALL & POWERFUL EARBUDSAt a width of 25mm and length of 24mm, the JM2 TWS is ultra small and half of most earbuds out there. Backed with the lightweight and feel, the JM2 offers you extreme comfort. Beautiful Sounds That'll Fit into Your Lifestyle DESIGN THAT FITS YOUR LIFESTYLERemember how time flies when you are into doing something you love? The JM2 earbud is here for you to ensure that you don’t take your trips, workouts, and runs alone or with poorer sound quality.  JM2 VS COMPETITORS OUR STORY  100% customer satisfaction is our goal for the JM2 earbuds. For this reason, we hope to raise $20,000 to wrap up its final preparation and release. These include both sampling and marketing and of course, its mass production.Here is your chance to secure early the JM2 special editions and support our project by picking any of the great rewards we have to offer.Find someone who loves to enjoy the experience of listening to a really spectacular sound quality? story:
Don’t go anywhere without your Budbank

Introducing the NEW Turbo S Budbank. It’s going to be the first thing you grab when you leave your home. Energy and music in one awesome shell. 

It’s sleek, simple to use, and will soon become something you can’t live without.

 

 

Turbo S Budbank = DZAT Audio Technology Earbuds + 10000mAH Power bank with wireless charger

 

 

Turbo S Budbank brings you the power of a wireless phone charger with the precision sound of Bluetooth 5.0 True Wireless Stereo earbuds. They’ll transform the way you use your phone and the way you listen to music. 

It’s the ultimate travelling companion. It’s as essential as your wallet or your passport when you’re going on a journey!

We’ve built two different devices that you can’t live without, and put them together in a single product. Top-quality earbuds and a high-capacity power bank with wireless charging, in one beautiful black box.

If you hate it when your phone runs out of power, Turbo S is a power pack that keeps you running for days, without the need for annoying wires.

BudBank gives you a safe place to store those earbuds. No more fumbling around in your bag searching for them. But it also keeps them fully-charged, so you’ll never run out of power when listening to your favourite song.

 

460 hours of battery life
With TURBO S, you can ignore the need to charge the Bluetooth earbuds from now on.

 


 

Did you know that the idea for TURBO S came from a team of techies? 

As techies, music keeps us going as we work, so we all have our earbuds or earphones hooked to our ears all day. But once we leave the office, more often our earbuds would run out of power juice. It’s not fun when you’re your favorite song cuts out in the middle of a workout! 

Another problem that we used to have was during our business trips. While waiting in the terminal, the phone battery runs out and all the public plugs are unavailable. What a nightmare!

That is why we wanted to create something really practical and convenient to solve both problems, and that’s where the TURBO S Budbank comes in. 10000mAH, plenty of power, space-saving, easy to carry everywhere, and it fits on the plane as a carry-on.

There is no need to bringing multiple chargers in your bag, because this wireless charging budbank will keep you going for the entire day. It’s is the fuss free solution! 

 

 

Got a long-haul flight or planning a long road trip? Pack the Turbo S Budbank for the music and power supply.

 

 

 

Forget to bring your cable? No worries. Turbo S Budbank frees you from the scourge of wires. While most wireless chargers require you to remove the casing for better wireless charging, we save you from that hassle! Our Budbank has a powerful 8mm charging range that will keep your phone charging while it’s well-protected in its case.

 

 

It also has plenty of power. 10000mAh to be precise. It can charge your devices to deliver a total of 460 hours of playtime!

 

 

None of us can afford to be wasting power. BudBank is eco-aware, so when it's not used for 20 seconds, it turns itself off. Also, it automatically stops when your device is fully-charged.

 


 

Conventional power banks with smooth and sleek feel can get a bit slippery. For our case, we designed a non-slip surface that make sure your power bank stays where you put it. It also comes with IP55 Standard Protection that makes it splash proof.

 

 

 

Turbo S Budbank enables you to charge all your devices, with wireless and wired charging.  

          

 

 

The power bank contains smart battery indication for your earbuds and your power bank. It is simple and handy.

              

 


 

Budbank comes with its own set of TWS (True Wireless Stereo) 3.0 Earbuds. They're sleek and compact, and the sound they deliver is truly incredible.

These can be safely stored inside the power bank, so you need never lose an earbud again.

Get 4 hours of play time from both earbuds, or 6 hours if you use just one.

With each having its own Bluetooth, it enables each ear bud to connect to a different device. You can share your device with your friend or partner without arguing about the choice of music! Choose to keep both buds to yourself, or share with a buddy and listen to different tunes at the same time.

 

 

 

Budbank gets its Turbo S prefix from the smart noise cancellation technology in the earbuds. It adjusts the sound to match your surroundings. This way, calls come through clearer and music sounds sharper.

 

 

 

DZAT eight years audio technology creates high-quality surround sound.

The Bass, Mids and Treble have all been tested and fine-tuned to ensure you receive an awesome all-round audio experience.

Based on the characteristics of the Bluetooth earphones, a composite diaphragm unit with a highly compliant material has been developed to restore the delicate and detail sound quality. The bass is surging and flexible, and the voice is clear. It is really difficult for you to imagine that the Bluetooth earphones can give you such a great audio experience.

 

 

 

 

Smart technology lets you control your earbuds by touch alone.

1 tap - accept calls and end calls;

2 taps - skip to the next track;

3 seconds hold down -  activate your voice assistant.

 

 


 

To build the Turbo S, we selected lightweight components combined with mature structural design. As a result, Turbo S unilateral headphones weigh only 4.0 grams. We applied the principles of Humanized Design, so your budbank works without flashing lights. You can achieve a comfortable and concealed wearing experience without the strain of heavy weights.

 

 

 

We collected a huge amount of real eardrum data, performed simulation analysis comparisons accurate to 0.01mm, fine-tuning the arc of the headsets thousands of times. Using ergonomic design to fit the ear canal, combined with two unique ways of wearing it, the Turbo S earbuds are stable and comfortable, even during strenuous exercise.

 

 

 

You can wake your voice assistant by saying “Hey Siri” while wearing your earbuds. 

 

 

 

TWS stands for True Wireless Stereo. Our earbuds with TWS 3.0 allow you to share the ear buds with your friend or partner without conflicting on the choice of music. With each ear bud having its own Bluetooth, it enables each of the ear bud to connect to different device.

 

 

No wires, no limitations, literally wireless 
20m stable transmission that will amaze you.


The FPC antenna and 5.0 Bluetooth technology are used to achieve a stable transmission distance of 20 meters, it also reduces power consumption by 35% compared to the previous generation. Effectively realize stable and uninterrupted transmission. 

 

 

 

 

You've seen Turbo S Budbank's functionality, now take a moment to savor its beauty.

Turbo S Budbank uses award-winning design to bring artistry and designer quality to power banks.

No more ugly and clunky chargers.

No more losing your earbuds.

Turbo S Budbank brings you a smart and stylish power bank together with awesomely advanced earbuds you can store safely.

It's a powerful and precision-driven partnership made to make your life easier.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Young, energetic, and vibrant. Turbo S Budbank is founded by a team of millennial engineers and product designers that have witnessed the evolution of innovation.  We’ve seen how music player and electronics became smaller and smaller. Now, we simply combine the two things that we can’t live without together, music and power. If you own wireless earbuds and other devices you probably know the pain of packing those stuff in your backpack. Our team aimed to solve this, and now we have made chargers more than what they used to be.

 

 

The creation of Turbo S Budbank would not be possible without your support, and we hope to design more cool and awesome devices in the future.

story:
ADVANCED GT-R is an open-back full-size over-ear headphones that are built from the ground up to deliver uncompromising audiophile sound from its proprietary planar magnetic drivers.

 

 
 

We have been showing our GT-R headphones at various headphone shows around the globe and have received approval from many seasoned audiophiles. 

Following are some of the comments and reviews from the revered audiophiles:

  • Perhaps it's the softer, smoother characteristic up top, but I find the GT-R to be quite easy and enjoyable to listen to.  I might even prefer it to the Alpha. (link) - Jude Mansilla, Founder @ Head-fi.org
  • Yeah, these feel like they are in your brain.  These are in-your-brain headphones. (link) - Zeos, Reviewer @ Youtube.com
  • The GT-R’s detailed sound is engaging and well rounded with a mid-range focus that makes vocals the central focus. (link) - B9Scrambler, Reviewer @ Head-fi.org
  • The most impressive part of these headphones, in my opinion, has to be the lows. Bass notes had just the right amount of power and didn’t linger longer than they needed to. They weren’t overly emphasized and seemed to be fairly neutral-sounding, regardless of which type of genre I was listening to. (link) - Adam Molina, Editor @ SoundGuys.com
  • The slightly more compact GT-R is an over-ear semi-open planar magnetic design that's a little more efficient for use with portable devices. It's warmer sounding than it's rather neutral big brother. To my ears it seemed like a good headphone for metal and rock. (link) - Tyll Hertsens, Former Editor-in-Chief @ InnerFidelity.com

We also received an official, independent measurement of the GT-R from Head-fi.org using their state-of-the-art headphone measuring system to strengthen the credibility of our claim for high sound quality.

Check out the interview of co-founders Peter and Joe from the video below:

 

 

The proprietary single-sided 65mm planar magnetic driver used to power the GT-R provides extremely transient and quick bass response and treble extension that far exceeds regular headphones in the market.

 

 

The open-back design means that the back of the headphone housing is open. This allows the sound-stage to be ever so expansive, and its imaging to be accurate and realistic.

 

The GT-R is designed to be comfortable for long listening sessions by utilizing the self- adjusting headband, exquisite protein leather and super-soft memory ear pads and padded headband. The ear cups rotate 180-degree to fit the contour of your head perfectly.

 

The GT-R is beautifully constructed with the premium high-strength steel and highest quality protein leather for prolonged durability. Each part is meticulously prepared and precision- assembled with near-zero tolerance for play.

 

The GT-R measures competitively and comparably to today's highest quality audiophile headphones in the market that cost up to 5 times its cost.

 

The GT-R has already gone through prototype stage of development and is in its final stage of development. The fund from Indiegogo will allow us to open required tooling and secure raw material in order to kick off the production.

It was for the love of music. It was the respect for all musicians of the past, present and future. It was for the struggling instrumental buried under the heavy bass line. It was for the audiophiles craving that crystal clear and mind-blowing detail.

We began as a small Kickstarter campaign in 2015 and naturally grew into a bigger body that thrives on the enthusiasm and passion for music. We design, develop and produce ground-breaking audio products that span widely from earphones, headphones, DAC / amp to musical instruments. We are focusing on staying forefront with the latest proprietary audio technology, while continuing to explore creative ways to allow everyone to experience the audiophile-grade sound.

We have an open mind and open doors for new ways to collaborate with musicians, audio engineers, manufacturers and brands - as we strive to mature into a platform where the advanced sound converge.

ADVANCED SOUND GROUP™ - Designed for Musicians™

Music credit to Antonio Gallucci - Newborns
