story:
FREE YOUR EARS WITH JUNO WHILE INCREASING YOUR PERSONAL SAFETY AND MAKING YOUR LIFE A LOT EASIER!

WITH JUNO YOU CAN:

• Make and receive phone calls via bluetooth

• Listen to music without earphones or earbuds

• Activate siri / cortana / google now with a touch of the button

• Communicate with gps systems and other electronic devices and be able to hear surroundings sounds like voices traffic, alarms, etc. 

• Drive, ride, cycle, ski or sail, run, climb and much more with your ears 100% free to hear every sounds around you! 

• Juno are fully compatible with iphone, android and most bluetooth devices

• Juno is the perfect device to increase yours and other's people's safety immensely.

• Make and receive phone calls via bluetooth

• Listen to music without earphones or earbuds

• Activate siri / cortana / google now with a touch of the button

• Communicate with gps systems and other electronic devices and be able to hear surroundings sounds like voices traffic, alarms, etc. 

• Drive, ride, cycle, ski or sail, run, climb and much more with your ears 100% free to hear every sounds around you! 

• Juno are fully compatible with iphone, android and most bluetooth devices

• Juno is the perfect device to increase yours and other's people's safety immensely.

Everything With Juno Can Now Become Hands-Free With Also 100% Awareness! 

No More Complex Devices That Plug Your Ears And Get Lost All The Time, No More Cables Around Your Neck! 

MORE ABOUT JUNO:You can compare the sound experience of the JUNO to cars. Let’s take, for example, a BMW M3 and a Tesla Model S. Are they both powerful? Yes, are they both rewarding from a driving point of view? Absolutely yes. Do they both take you places? Yes! Are they the same? No, they are radically different on a philosophical level and they both accomplish excellence in their own field. Can we compare Bone Conduction to, let's say, a Bose headset? No. They both serve a purpose, they both do the same job, but in different ways. Would we suggest you to use Bone Conduction to listen to Mozart's Ave Maria as the ultimate gadget to experience it? Probably not. Would we suggest you to use the JUNO while riding your motorcycle? Absolutely yes! We don't pretend that Bone Conduction is your perfect HiFi music companion, but we can say that it serves a specific purpose, which increases your safety in an infinite number of situations. The Military and Google chose Bone Conduction for some of their devices...They must have thought it was not that bad, and so did nature with Dolphins and whales. It is totally possible to have a good quality phone conversation with the JUNO, and best of all without looking completely weird, because let's not forget, the JUNO are kind of good looking too. Wind and movement are handled quite well, provided you're not driving at 150 mph without a helmet. The Microphone is awesome and much better than most phones due to the specific positioning in the nose bridge, which is 100% original to this project.

The battery can be replaced, although it comes with a 2 years warranty. It requires some minor and simple soldering. The reason we chose this solution was to save weight and space. JUNO are light, cool looking, flexible yet very solid and compact. We tested BT through bodies, quite some distance (More than 30 ft.) and it handled things perfectly, BT 5 works amazingly well. We can safely say that for the amount of resources we had so far (We're not a billion dollars company), we managed to develop a product that goes beyond expectations. We came up with real solutions and in an original way, which is also why we filed or are filing patents. We're pretty proud of what we achieved so far. We're very proud of the pros that using BCT brings to the general public. 

 

 

General Dimensions Of JUNO

BENEFITS OF JUNO

  • Ears free
  • Handsfree
  • PC 2.0 CAT 3 anti-scratch lenses that ensure an excellent shock protection
  • Ergonomic design based on three-dimensional scans of different head shapes ensures comfort and fit for a wide range of faces
  • JUNO allows you to take advantage of all the information directly from your smartphone, thanks to the Bluetooth 5 which guarantees speed of data transmission. 
  • Available profiles: A2DP - AVRCP - HFP - HSP
  • The cutting-edge bidirectional microphone is integrated into the bridge of the sunglasses, assuring that the transmission is clear and not disturbed by wind.
  • water resistant
  • The commands are grouped together and can be activated using only one hand for quick and safe use of your JUNO
  • iPhone, Android and Windows compatible

story:
We designed the QiPods for comfort and unbeatable sound quality.  The QiPod has a lightweight body with a strong and compact build, including wireless charging capabilities to fully charge your smartphone twice on a full charge.  Be one of the first to get the QiPods at a fraction of the future retail price.

The earbuds fit seamlessly into the charging Pod, and are magnetically held in place.  The Pod also has a secure magnetic lid that easily closes back into place. 

 

With our extensive research, consisting of the world's best sound engineers and product designers from 2 Continents and 4 Countries, we have designed the earphones of the future.

We designed the earbuds with comfort in mind, to fit into any ear.

 

Auto-Pairing

Once initially paired with your device, Pod automatically pairs to your device by touching the side of the left or right POD for 6 seconds.  

 

The earbuds have an amazing 8 hours of battery life, but with its powerful charging case you can get up to 100 hours of battery life on a single charge of the case!

Pod's battery life is so impressively long, you might not even remember you need to charge it.

With its 8 hours of initial playtime and up to 12.5 full charges from its charging case, the QiPods will keep you entertained for hours.

The charging case also serves as a handy power bank that can give your mobile phones or tablet a full charge when you need it.  Simply place your phone on top of the Pod to activate the wireless charging. 

As a backup, you can also plug into the USB port to charge any device.

 

The volume level is huge in comparison to other earbuds.  

With enhanced drivers delivering ear throbbing deep low base, the QiPods will transform your music listening experience.

With a simple touch, access Siri or Google Assistant to get things done while on the go.

You can also answer and end calls, play, pause and skip tracks and control the volume.

 

 

QiPod is perfect for...

We've designed the QiPods to be functional in everyday use, from workouts to exploring.  The small casing fits into your pocket and can easily be taken anywhere. 

 

You can choose from Black, White or Pink. 

 

 

 

Our Story

We first came up with the idea while waiting in an airport, needing to charge our phone and carrying around earphones and a phone charging pack.  We thought, what if we could combine the two!

We spent 12 months developing the QiPods, from initial concept to designs, flying out to find a manufacturer in China, touching the first prototype and then tweaking until we  got the perfect final product - an amazing pair of earbuds with great sound quality and a wireless charging phone pod.

story:
We design the Loqu NanoBuds headset to meet the real needs of the person. Stunning sound quality, instant pairing, waterproof case IPX5 standard, long working time, ergonomic design and reasonable price - Loqu NanoBuds headphones mission.

Loqu NanoBuds Headset Presentation

We have tested many headphones from different price segments and could hardly find a suitable option that would fit our needs. But was the only issue - the price of these headphones more than $ 150 that he could not make them the best option to choose. That is how we came to the concept of Loqu NanoBuds.

Loqu NanoBuds is freedom in motion! These wireless headphones are designed with ergonomic features of the human ear and modern design. You can enjoy every moment of sound in the car, in training or on the way to work and forget about unnecessary wires.

One-touch for easy operation

Touch buttons on all models of our headphones provide a simple and intuitive control your music, accept and terminate voice calls, call the voice assistant.

 

Small size and great features

Loqu NanoBuds UNO

Loqu NanoBuds UNO is designed with a good indicator of battery life. They provide 5 to 8 hours of talktime or music listening. And thanks to the charging case, the battery life can be increased up to 48 hours. In standby mode, the headphones can work up to 200 hours.

We have provided our Loqu NanoBuds UNO headphones with fast charging function. 30 minutes is enough to fully charge the earphone and about 10 minutes to work for several hours.

Loqu NanoBuds DUO

Loqu NanoBuds DUO is the eldest brother of the Loqu NanoBuds UNO headphones. These headphones can offer more opportunities to the owners. The battery life indicator also boasts good battery life. Loqu NanoBuds DUO can provide up to 4.5 hours of listening or talking. And thanks to the charging case, the battery life can be increased up to 37 hours. In standby mode, the headphones can work up to 200 hours.

We have provided our Loqu NanoBuds DUO headset with a fast charge function. 60 minutes is enough to fully charge the earphone and about 30 minutes to work for several hours. Connect one earpiece or a pair of headphones and increase the time listening to music. With Loqu NanoBuds DUO is no longer a problem!

Ergonomic design and comfortable fit

Our team has been working on headphone design for a long time. We were able to combine minimalism, modern trends and a comfortable fit with ease of use. Thanks to its design and size, you can move around, play sports and not be afraid that Loqu NanoBuds will fall out.

Bluetooth 5 technology

Many headphones are still built on BT 4 / 4.1 technology. In our device, we use BT 5 with backward compatibility with older devices. This means that you can use Loqu NanoBuds with any cheap or expensive products.

BT 5 provides instant pairing and the most reliable connection to your device along with minimal audio playback delay. Just open the headphone case, take out the Loqu NanoBuds and you can immediately plunge into the world of music. Manual configuration is no longer needed!

The radius of Loqu NanoBuds is also amazing! In open space, the radius of the headphones up to 15 meters and up to 10 meters indoors. This is real freedom from wires.

New sound level

Yes, we also love listening to music and sound quality for us on high place. That is why we have tried to do everything possible to ensure that Loqu NanoBuds meets the requirements of even the most captious music lover. HiFi, heavy bass, clean vocals, 10 mm Graphene driver and technology of 360º - that's all you need to feel at a concert favorite artist.

Small and comfortable

Loqu NanoBuds small and light as a feather! The size of one earphone is 2.5x1.4 cm, and the weight is only 4 grams. They will not give you discomfort.

IPX5 moisture protection

Loqu NanoBuds headphones are IPX5 protected. This means that you can play sports and not be afraid of moisture or sweat. Your headphones will remain intact.

Comparison with competitors

Specs/specification

Main

  • High quality sound
  • Waterproof (IPX5)
  • True wireless stereo

Colour

  • Loqu NanoBuds UNO - white and black
  • Loqu NanoBuds DUO - black

story:
My tube rolling journey... 

...started in 2009 following the loss of my older brother, Lt Col Mark Jennings (left). I inherited his vinyl collection with no playback system. Eventually I bought an old turntable for $50 and a receiver which blew a circuit. I went online and found a video on how to fix it. Next came vintage speakers and then vacuum tube audio and one DIY project led to another.

In the 12 years since his passing I developed an eye (and ear) for high-end vintage audio equipment and by necessity taught myself to refurbish and repair a wide variety of electronics. Late last year I set out to build a vintage style tube based preamplifier from scratch. In the process I invented the world's first Tube Rolling Preamplifier and shortly after filed a patent application with the USPTO.

My formal education in design, combined with 20+ successful years in tech (10 years of support, documentation, development, sales, consulting and another 10 years Project Management), and my obsession with audio reproduction make me ideally suited to deliver this project. 

I call it the Leghorn for no other reason than it has a chicken-head knob for the tube select switch and Leghorn is the name of a chicken that reminds me of Saturday mornings growing up with my brother Mark.

A successful campaign will ensure GlassCity Amplifiers is first to market and in a position to capitalize on the pending product patent. 

OUR campaign goal

Minimum campaign funding of just $30,000.00! (approximately 10 units)

  • Orders for these first 10 units will enable us to craft another 90 units for a total limited supply of 100 Leghorn Tube Rolling preamplifiers
  • Orders for the next 40 units will recover our investment to date
  • Orders for the last 50 units provide operational funds for the next phase of product development

 

YOUR goal

Support a winning campaign for vintage style audio reproduction and tube rolling on the fly!

  • For the first time ever it is possible to HEAR THE DIFFERENCE when tube rolling.

  • The Leghorn preamplifier is capable of holding three preamp tubes in a hot and ready state:
    • Where one and only one preamp tube is actively processing the audio signal, and
    • Where you can instantly switch the processing of the audio signal to the adjacent tube and
    • Where switching is made without interruption, distortion, or overlap in the output signal
  • A few tube rolling applications of the Leghorn preamplifier: 
    • MUSICAL PREFERENCES : Ability to hot switch between tubes thought to be better suited to a particular input device or musical genre. I enjoy music of all kinds and I use my own Leghorn to switch between preamp tubes when I listen to Jazz recordings from the 50s vs British Invasion recordings from the 60s. 
    • COMPARE DIFFERENCES: No-hassle no-waiting A/B/C comparison between tubes from different manufacturers or different variants from the same manufacturer helps you squeeze the most performance out of each recording. Getting down to the nitty gritty you can listen to the same song switching between the three tubes to determine the best tube for that song: more bottom end, more top end, better midrange, whatever it takes!
    • COMPARE SIMILARITIES: Isolate and perform A/B comparison between electrically identical tubes from the same manufacturer to verify there is no audible difference before dropping them into your main power amplifier or another system.

  • The Leghorn tube rolling preamplifier:
    • Hand crafted from natural materials
    • Distinct and timeless vintage-mod design
    • The essence of what makes a preamplifier worthy of the audiophile moniker
    • Serviceable and meant to last for generations
    • There are no tradeoffs for frivolous features or overengineered fool-proofing.
      • On one hand this makes for an audio circuit which is very pure and unhindered
      • On the other hand some simple operational precautions are required.
      • See FAQ for more detail.
  • We plan to introduce a few features for contributors to vote on during the promotional period so you also get the opportunity to participate in the creative process
  • And the satisfaction of helping to bring a new product and new business into existence

Watch the extended demo, interview, and other videos to learn what is unique about this preamplifier.

Supplies of the premier version of the Leghorn are limited to 100 units so be sure to order your perk today!

The Impact

Your contribution will allow GlassCity Amplifiers to be the first to market with this technology. First to market means gaining mind-share which in turn has a huge impact on establishing the company as the first name in tube rolling. Future market share for tube rolling and non-tube rolling audio products requires the Leghorn to deliver exceptional audio reproduction out of the gate so quality is our top priority.

Depending on how successful the campaign is we also hope to invest in:

  • Enhancing the Leghorn,
  • Developing the Leghorn Mk II with Arduino 
  • Development of OTL tube rolling headphone amplifier
  • We also see a huge potential for both live music and the recording industry

More about the campaign and the difference your contribution will make:

  • A successful campaign will change tube rolling to a much more objective exercise because the listener can actually HEAR THE DIFFERENCE when switching between tubes
  • Success with this Indiegogo campaign opens up the opportunity to create more products with the same patented tube rolling technology
    • Utility style tube rolling device
    • Audiophile grade tube rolling headphone amplifier
    • Full featured preamplifier with multiple inputs -  phono, tape, CD and so on
    • Wireless version with Bluetooth for digital control and music streaming
    • Single channel device for live instruments or audio engineering and recording studios

  • Success means the opportunity to compete for a portion of the non-tube rolling market with new non-tube rolling GlassCity Amplifiers products such as a main power amplifier or phono amp

 

Risks & Challenges

Supply chain is the biggest risk and biggest unknown. Availability of parts and materials may vary depending on a number of factors. A high percentage of the device is machined from high-quality raw materials that are basically commodities. This should help mitigate risk because we can change vendors or make substitutions. For example, we can get aluminum and steel from more than one source or we could substitute walnut for mahogany if needed. 

Other parts like Transformers and Filter Capacitors traditionally have the lowest on-hand inventory with the vendors and if on backorder may require the longer lead times.  In many cases these components can be substituted. The challenge with substitution is fitment which can create more delays than waiting for the backordered item. We will assess and commit to make choices that get you a tube rolling preamplifier in a timely fashion and that also keep us on target financially.

We are taking steps to mitigate risk in other ways. We have enough k40y-9 Russian military grade output capacitors to build ~50 units and are slowly stocking up on other components like potentiometers, RCA jacks and control knobs.

This product is the creation of a hobbyist with a strong aptitude for repairing vintage audio equipment and for building audio components from kits and from scratch. Electrical engineering and manufacturing are not yet among our core competencies or deep experience here at GCA.

Therefore we are prototyping with our in-house CNC and farming out the manufacture of the chassis and faceplates to a local vendor with decades of manufacturing experience. We may also work with them to deliver the cabinet sides and rear rail. Good partners with experience will help us achieve success. 

Lastly is the circuitry itself which, in this application, is the simplest and purest form of the tube rolling preamplifier; uncomplicated by relays and microchips and so many useless features that no single person could use them all. The simple elegance of the circuit is a benefit to you because it processes audio signals extremely well and is uncomplicated by features that can take away from the core function of processing of audio signals.

The simplicity of the circuit is a benefit to GlassCity Amplifiers because less complexity means:

  • Fewer parts
  • Faster to market
  • Less to test
  • Less to break
  • Less expensive to build
  • Easier to build/Less time to build
  • Fewer defects 
  • Fewer returns

Simplicity will also streamline the certification process which is presently underway. The implementation of the patent pending tube-rolling technology in this incarnation (the Leghorn) is a throwback in more than just outer styling. I have made a wide survey of audio devices; from mechanical devices of the 1910's through the decades of electrically amplified audio including the 20's, 30's, 40's, 50's 60's, 70's, 80's, up to modern amplifiers and microchip controlled wireless devices.
 
I have owned and operated devices from every decade and in most cases (starting in the 30s through 80s) found a circuit diagram and repaired and replaced broken or aging components no longer up to spec. In the course of my 12 year journey it has become clear to me that improvements in audio reproduction have been made since my 1912 Edison Diamond Disk hit the market! It is also clear that in the decades that follow improvements, tradeoffs are made to reduce cost and expand features.
 
GlassCity Amplifiers products are intended as a contemporary look back at slivers in time where the core function of a class of devices (like amplifiers or preamplifiers) took a specific form that delivered a remarkably high level of quality in terms of pure audio reproduction. We are interested in situations where the core function of a class of devices is essentially unchanged but where the evolution in design, component technologies, and manufacturing methods have caused the audio reproduction experience of that class of device to drift over time. Drift to the point where something desirable has been lost. 
 
So the circuit design is intended to be as optimized as possible to achieve the goal of what makes a tube based preamplifier but with all the convenience and safety of a modern device. In this design there are no microchips or EMF emissions to worry about because all the features are physical or mechanical. From an electrical perspective it should not be much more complicated to certify than a lamp.
 
The design also incorporates pre-certified components and safety precautions:
  • Chassis mounted three-prong plug receptacle
  • Detachable three prong plug
  • Fuse holder & fuse
  • x/y type safety capacitor
 
I built the first Leghorn prototype in December 2020. I have been using it for entertainment and demos for months. I move it around a lot too so it's getting heavier than normal use and it is rock solid. I built the Mark II prototype in early February. I have been using that one in my theater for 3 months now without turning it off so while it doesn't move around it has at least 2,000 hours and is also rock solid. 
 

Both of the first two prototypes are wired point-to-point and hand soldered. Hand building each unit takes more time than outsourcing the manufacture of a printed audio circuit with integrated components such as resistors. Hand building also requires skilled labor. 

We have designed and CNC etched a prototype for a small circuit board that is essentially a bank of resistors. The idea is to accelerate assembly and reduce defects by organizing all the resistors on a small circuit board and then hand wiring the rest point-to-point. 

There are two final design prototypes in progress. In the month of June we will finish building out both: one with the etched circuit board and one completely point-to-point. If demand is high we will likely move to the resistor bank on a printed circuit board which will initially slow us down. Getting another vendor onboard and through additional prototyping with that vendor will take time and rework but once complete will allow us to scale much more quickly. 

Other Ways You Can Help...

If now is not a good time to contribute with a monetary donation, that is ok! You can still help us by sharing our campaign  to your friends, to any social media platform ( facebook, instagram, twitter, youtube, tumbler, and so on). Tube Rolling is a niche so we need to spread the word far and wide.

If you know anyone that is into or thinking about getting into tube audio please share our campaign directly. Indiegogo makes it easy with their share tools.

Thank you for your time and consideration!

story:
Who we are

We are musicians who are passionate about our guitar tone. Whether we're tweaking knobs on our amp, building pedals, or modifying our guitars, we are always searching for that perfect sound. One thing we have noticed is that with all of the customization options on the market now, there are so few for guitar pickups. We want to provide an experience in pickup buying that will help others on the same "tone journey" get the exact tone they are looking for.

What We Need

We can't get to where we want to be without your help. All contributions to this campaign will be used to help us purchase the supplies and tools we need to get started.

First and foremost, we'll need a 3D printer. In the past, we have worked with outside sources for this, but that is no longer an option if we want to be able to provide the response time and quality we want. Take a look at the printer we're looking at here: http://shop.prusa3d.com/en/
If you want your contribution to go directly towards the printer purchase, check out our special perks that will do just that!

After that amount is raised, anything else earned will be used to provide further customization options for our pickups, including pole pieces, magnets, additional pole spacing options, and anything else we (or you) can think of.

If our full goal is reached, we are confident we will be able to fully and quickly develop our new pickup buying and customization experience.

A new way to find your tone

With all of the options available to guitar players, we've found one piece of equipment falling behind the rest with new innovation. Pickups have been made in the same way using the same materials and looks for years. Our goal is to combine new and old techniques to make buying new pickups and full immersive, personalized experience rather than a chore.

Combining 3D printing technology with good old fashioned hand winding techniques, we're creating a unique experience of personalization and customization. We want to be able to produce on-demand designs for our pickups, giving you unprecedented control over the look and sound of your purchase. Match the look to your guitar, or make them stand out! It's all in your hands now.

The reality check section

We have some lofty goals for the future, but right now we are focusing on creating the best experience we can for you, our supporters. We're going to face some challenges on the way there, though. From setting up and learning to use our 3D printer, to making sure each pickup ends up exactly how you want it, it will all be a learning experience. Our #1 goal is to make sure you are happy. If you're not, let us know! We'll do everything we can to make it right.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, we'd love to have your support! Just by sharing our campaign on your social media pages, you can help us reach our goal!

We want to provide an experience in pickup buying that will help others on the same "tone journey" get the exact tone they are looking for.

story:
Zeeny Comes with the Latest Hearable Technology

ZEENY is loaded with the latest tech in the hearable earbud space: 

Equipped with QCC3026 and TrueWireless Stereo Plus

Zeeny is equipped with Qualcomm’s new QCC3026 SoC. With the balanced power distribution between the earbuds, the new technology allows for lower power consumption and improved wireless connectivity.

The new TrueWireless Stereo Plus (TWS Plus) supports an even easier pairing experience, and as both earbuds are connected directly to the smartphone, it also reduces latency. Together with QCC3026, they are especially designed for the next-generation hearable experience.

Compatible with Bluetooth 5.0

Zeeny is compatible with Bluetooth 5.0, the new standard for the latest smartphones. Compared to previous versions, Bluetooth 5.0 is faster and caters a wider range, which means a more convenient and better wireless listening experience. Zeeny works with phones which support the earlier versions as well.

Battery lasts for more than 9 hours

With Zeeny, you can enjoy high quality music for more than 9 hours from one charge. And with the carrying case 800mAH battery capacity, you can charge Zeeny up to 8 times without the need for extra power.

Supports high sound quality codecs

Zeeny supports the following codecs: SBC, AAC and aptX. The Advanced Audio Coding (AAC) allows for better sound quality and is especially compatible with iOS devices. Leading manufacturers are also increasingly using aptX to provide the highest quality wireless sound quality (reduced latency), which we want to offer with Zeeny as well. With all three codecs, Zeeny caters to users with various needs and wishes.

IPX7: Waterproof

Zeeny is designed and manufactured for everyday use in different conditions. With an ergonomic design, Zeeny can be safely used on the go, at work and when exercising. 

 

Zeeny is your Wireless Personal Assistant

In addition to the latest earphone's technologies, Zeeny App enhances the user experience with the latest voice UI technologies.

Hear your important messages and reply hands-free

You can select from the Zeeny app which notifications you want Zeeny to read out for you. This way you can stay up-to-date with the information when you need it, without the need to look at your phone, and continue whatever you were doing without being distracted. With Zeeny, you can also reply to the messages directly hands-free.

Gain smart suggestions and directions

Zeeny can automatically pick events from your calendar, build a travel itinerary for you and suggest when you need to leave. This will save your time from doing the search yourself - just follow Zeeny’s guidance.

 

Compatible with other voice assistants

Zeeny is completely compatible with other voice assistants, such as Siri. You can do internet searches, add events to you calendar, call your friends or even use Zeeny to help translate between languages in real-time.

 

Zeeny enhances your music experience

Spicetone: Add HD EQ filters to your favorite songs

Ever felt like listening to your favorite songs but somehow they just don’t fit your current mood? Spicetone is a feature in the Zeeny app which allows you to customize your songs by selecting filters in a same way as you choose filters for your pictures. This way you can personalize your listening experience to fit your current mood and enjoy your favorite music.

 

Detailed list of Specs

Software and Hardware:

Battery capacity: 1 device 50mAh / Battery case 800mAh
Battery performance: Music 9h
SoC: QCC3026
Qualcomm ADK ver.: 6.3.x.
Bluetooth ver.: 5.0
Bluetooth profile: A2DP, AVRCP, HFP, HSP
Connection: Bluetooth BLE, TWS, TWS Plus
Codec: SBC, AAC, aptX

Audio:

Driver: φ6mm dynamic
Sensitivity: 91dB±3db
Impedance: 16Ω
Speaker frequency: 20Hz - 20,000Hz
Microphone frequency: -42db/±3db

Accessories:

Ear chip x 3(S/M/L)
USB cable
Battery charging case

 

Our Mission

Our mission is to create a world where we can all focus on events and happenings around us, and let virtual assistants take care of operating our devices. From now on, XR (VR/AR/MR) will become a natural part of our lives, and we at Nain will continue to create XR experiences through hearables, as we have since 2016. 

Voice UI is just one step towards XR. With your help, we can accelerate the adaptation of XR technologies, and eventually free ourselves from being absorbed by our smart devices.

story:
Augr is something completely new. An AI device that talks, listens and interviews as you make a broadcast quality recording of your life story. It's as easy as having a conversation with a friend. Simple and fun to use for everyone.

The device is programmed to respond to your voice, and then initiates conversations to help you tell stories from your past in a relaxed and natural way. It guides you as you reminisce, producing a broadcast quality recording of your life story. 

 

 

With the device comes a lifetime subscription to your personal, cloud-based biography space. Here you can upload your recordings, curate stories and choose who to share with. It's a home for your photographs, videos and written materials too.

 

 
 
 
The Augr device works using leading edge AI software, developed by our world beating team of software and hardware engineers. It's a team that brings together cutting-edge American technology and innovative British product design.

Based in New York City and in London, England, our people have worked tirelessly. It has taken us close to two years to develop the exciting AI concept that sits at the heart of Augr. It has been a remarkable journey.

We hope our technology will bring people of all ages together and help make the world a happier place. Its a fun thing to do. Listen for yourself to Mo (one of our supporters) as she talks with the Augr AI and reminisces about her mother.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
The great thing about Augr is that it's so easy to use. It is 100% voice controlled. You just take it out of the box, turn it on and you are away. There is no need for any complicated apps or downloads. Just you, Augr and the stories that you want to record.
 
Augr is perfect for people who find technology difficult.
 
It offers all sorts of little touches to make the experience warm and friendly. You have a choice of four different Augr voices. Most importantly, you are the person in charge. You record at your own pace, in your own time and in your own way.
 

It’s a sad fact of history that stories of everyday people remain almost completely untold. Only the lives of the rich, powerful and famous are recorded.  It's a terrible loss, so we’ve decided to do something about it.

That was the inspiration for Augr.  To help people tell their own story, in their own way and their own voice. To give everyone the opportunity to record and share the story of their life with friends, family and the wider world.

 

 

Other people like what we are doing too. We have reached three million people on Facebook. Four thousand people registered with us pre-launch. And Augr has been featured on the BBC, Daily Telegraph, Metro and over a hundred titles in the US.

 

 

Our stories are so important. They help us to understand where we have come from and how we belong. They help bring families and friends together. And if there’s anything we’ve learned recently, it’s that we need to find ways to be forever close to the people that we love.

Recent research has confirmed how strongly people feel about this. 70% of people believe it’s important to keep loved ones’ memories alive forever. Three-quarters say they have stories they want to share that their families don’t know about.

Most people just don't get around to it, but when they do they find they have made something very special. Remembering and sharing our stories helps to bring back good times. They also bring families and friends closer together.

 

 

You can get your own Augr device by clicking on the perk box at the top of the screen. That offers a ground breaking AI device, a free lifetime subscription to the Augr biography space and (if you wish) the chance to add additional users.

Each device is capable of servicing up to five different user accounts. 

You will want to know the technical details too and when you can expect to receive it. Everything you need to know about the Augr device features and specification is outlined below, together with the project timeline.

 

Augr is set up as a non-profit organisation. It's aim is very clear. To help as many people as possible record and share their life stories. And to give people the freedom to do that in a safe and secure environment. 

You, as the user, will decide how you wish your recordings to be shared. Only you and the people you give access will be able to look at your data. The choice and control is all yours. Downloadable at any time, all personal data will be encrypted in transport and storage.

Most important of all, it is you who has full ownership of your recordings. Augr will lay no claim on the ownership or copyright of the recordings that you make. Augr will not make commercial use of your data and will enforce a total ban on digital advertising.

 

It has taken 21 years to get here! That was when Justin, our founder, first sat down with his grandfather to make a recording of his most treasured memories. It was a marathon session. At the end of it, they had seven hours of stories from when his grandfather was little boy, all the way through to his 80’s.

Unfortunately, his grandfather died soon after that. He was in his mid-eighties so he wasn’t a young man, but this was unexpected. He’d had a sudden heart attack. The family was devastated. They went back to the recordings and then they realised they had something amazing

They had all those wonderful memories captured forever.  Justin's grandfather telling his own stories in his own words and in his own voice. So although they had lost him, they hadn’t lost who he was, what he thought and what he sounded like. Hearing his voice brought them such joy.

 

Augr founder Justin Hopkins (with his wife Grainne) in Connecticut last year.

 

When things had settled a little bit, Justin thought it would be wonderful if he could help other people record and share their life stories and the stories of those that they love. To make sure their stories were told and  remembered in the purest authentic way.

Fast forward to 2014/15 when Amazon Alexa and Microsoft Cortana burst onto the scene, introducing AI speech recognition and command response algorithms that would change how we communicate with many of our devices forever.

For the first time Justin could see a way forward. He set up Augr to put together an AI based approach to personal biography and help make professional life story recording affordable for the average person.  He had the tools to make Augr a reality.

 

That is our story. If you like it, and you like what we are doing, then please share it with your family and friends. We want as many people as possible to be part of what we are doing.

story:
The world's first magneto-static technology has been developed to enable ultra-high-resolution sound reproduction equivalent to electrostatic technology.
 

  • It conveys the artist's emotions and breaths, and the concert's sense of space and vivid thrill to the listeners.

  • It play without missing even very fine and small sounds.

  • The sound of all range of bass, mid, and treble is listened in detail and clearly separated.

  • It provides very clear and precise sound.

  • It is excellent for reproducing the original tone of the signal.

 

Variable module structure that can be assembled and disassembled
 

  • Color and sound patterns can be replaced and combined.

  • You can easily repair the damaged parts yourself.

 

 

 

Head-Fi Audio Forum

  • Head-Fi Review

 

GIZMODO

  • Gizmodo

Republic of Korea AUDIO Forum Review

  • Dr. Headphone
  • Scheherazade
  • DC Inside headphone & earphone

Twitter

  • Twitter Review 01
  • Twitter Review 02
  • Twitter Review 03
  • Twitter Review 04 

Instagram

  • Instagram Review 01 - Undergraduate
  • Instagram Review 02 - Writer
  • Instagram Review 03 - Student

Facebook

  • Facebook Review 01 Korean Student 
  • Facebook Review 02 King rudi Form 
  • Facebook Review 03 The.Indian.Audiophile.Forum
  • Facebook Review 04 Avex Entertainment Sound expert

Youtube

  • ミノケンジ

Personal blogger

Blogger 01 - Korean Undergraduate

Blogger 02 - Japanese Blogger

Blogger 03 - Japanese Blogger

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The heart of the earphone is a driver(speaker) that is a sound conversion device.
The driver is responsible for calling the sound signal from the sound source.
 

  • It is a safe and innovative next-generation ultra-high resolution speaker that was born after the ElectroStatic Type.

  • It has overcome the limitations of conventional drivers (Dynamic, Balanced Armature) that are not suitable for ultra-high resolution sound reproduction.

  • It is designed with the most ideal structure for ultra high resolution sound reproduction.

  • The electrostatic (ELECTRO-STATIC) does not require an essential high voltage drive amplifier, so you can enjoy ultra high resolution sound anytime, anywhere.

  • You can listen to ultra-high-resolution sound that was not possible with small earphones.

  • Even very fine and small sounds are clearly reproduced without being buried. Therefore, it is good for hearing protection because it is easy to listen to all sounds at low volume.

 

  • Magnetic-static method, vibrating membrane is a super-low mass metal thin film with high magnetic permeability.

  • Magnetic-static method, The moving part of the vibrating membrane is in a physical non-contact

  • Magnetic-static method, vibrating membrane moves by itself only with the power of pure magnetism. Because there are no parameters that interfere with super-fast manoeuvres other than equivalent mass, elasticity and acoustics and mechanical resistance, a powerful ultra-high resolution acoustic transformation synchronized in real time to very fine or fast complex signal changes is performed.

  • Magnetic-static method, vibration membrane, is a single path that simultaneously implements vibration and acoustic deformation to eliminate loss, distortion, and delay of multiple pathways, such as dynamic and BA, to provide a very clean and delicate sound.

  • Magneto-static method, clearly distinguish even minute sounds and greatly increase sound separation.

 

 

 

  • Filter-less 2Way hybrid

  • A combination of multiple speakers commonly  used in advanced conventional earphones, Replace with a single MSHD speaker, ultra high resolution It is very advantageous for the realization of market generalization of the market.

  • Bright and clear and detail portrayal of a wide range of high purity sounds

 

 

  • MSH DRIVER is used by various sound companies such as Noble-M3, Itsfit-fusion, SHUOER- Tape / Singer, spear labs-triton 1

  • Their attractive sound tuning technology makes the MSH DRIVER even more brilliant.

 

 

Magneto-static structure is patented and registered technology. EARBRIDGE Inc holds the following patents.

 

  • High resolution sound conversion technology using Magneto-Static method-> 10.

  • Interchangeable module structure technology-> 2.

  • Dynamic ultra-slim high power sound conversion technology-> 2.

  • Spatially variable structure portable audio technology-> 1.

  • Wing membrane multi-function sound conversion technology-> 1.

  • Representative patent application and registration countries of Magneto-Static technology are Korea, USA, China, Europe and Japan, etc.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

  • To make it easier to distinguish between right and left, we added a protrusion on the left.

  • Easily distinguish left and right even in dark environments.

  • There is no protrusion on the right side.

 

 

  • Vegetable leather 

 

  • Pueblo Leather

 


 

 



 




 

 

 

 

 

Introduce

 

  • Representatives and members of EARBRIDGE Inc have developed speakers from various companies such as Samsung, LG, Sony, and Philips for a long time, and through decades of research, development, and manufacturing, they have had various and rich experiences.

  • EARBRIDGE Inc aims to produce earphones that can combine colors, sound patterns, designs, etc. to suit individual tastes, and popularize ultra-high-resolution speaker structure technology that can reproduce the sound closest to the original sound.

  • We aim to grow into a company that can lead the ultra-high-definition earphone market through continuous research and development and efforts based on innovative technologies.

 

EARBRIDGE Inc.

story_txt:
The world's first magneto-static technology has been developed to enable ultra-high-resolution sound reproduction equivalent to electrostatic technology. 
It conveys the artist's emotions and breaths, and the concert's sense of space and vivid thrill to the listeners.
It play without missing even very fine and small sounds.
The sound of all range of bass, mid, and treble is listened in detail and clearly separated.
It provides very clear and precise sound.
It is excellent for reproducing the original tone of the signal.
 Variable module structure that can be assembled and disassembled 
Color and sound patterns can be replaced and combined.
You can easily repair the damaged parts yourself.
   Head-Fi Audio ForumHead-Fi Review GIZMODOGizmodoRepublic of Korea AUDIO Forum Review
Dr. Headphone
Scheherazade
DC Inside headphone & earphone
Twitter
Twitter Review 01
Twitter Review 02
Twitter Review 03

Twitter Review 04

Instagram Review 01 - Undergraduate

Instagram Review 02 - Writer

Instagram Review 03 - Student
Facebook
Facebook Review 01 Korean Student 
Facebook Review 02 King rudi Form 
Facebook Review 03 The.Indian.Audiophile.Forum
Facebook Review 04 Avex Entertainment Sound expert
YoutubeミノケンジPersonal bloggerBlogger 01 - Korean UndergraduateBlogger 02 - Japanese BloggerBlogger 03 - Japanese Blogger                The heart of the earphone is a driver(speaker) that is a sound conversion device.The driver is responsible for calling the sound signal from the sound source. 
It is a safe and innovative next-generation ultra-high resolution speaker that was born after the ElectroStatic Type.
It has overcome the limitations of conventional drivers (Dynamic, Balanced Armature) that are not suitable for ultra-high resolution sound reproduction.
It is designed with the most ideal structure for ultra high resolution sound reproduction.
The electrostatic (ELECTRO-STATIC) does not require an essential high voltage drive amplifier, so you can enjoy ultra high resolution sound anytime, anywhere.
You can listen to ultra-high-resolution sound that was not possible with small earphones.
Even very fine and small sounds are clearly reproduced without being buried. Therefore, it is good for hearing protection because it is easy to listen to all sounds at low volume.
 
Magnetic-static method, vibrating membrane is a super-low mass metal thin film with high magnetic permeability.
Magnetic-static method, The moving part of the vibrating membrane is in a physical non-contact
Magnetic-static method, vibrating membrane moves by itself only with the power of pure magnetism. Because there are no parameters that interfere with super-fast manoeuvres other than equivalent mass, elasticity and acoustics and mechanical resistance, a powerful ultra-high resolution acoustic transformation synchronized in real time to very fine or fast complex signal changes is performed.
Magnetic-static method, vibration membrane, is a single path that simultaneously implements vibration and acoustic deformation to eliminate loss, distortion, and delay of multiple pathways, such as dynamic and BA, to provide a very clean and delicate sound.
Magneto-static method, clearly distinguish even minute sounds and greatly increase sound separation.
   
Filter-less 2Way hybrid
A combination of multiple speakers commonly  used in advanced conventional earphones, Replace with a single MSHD speaker, ultra high resolution It is very advantageous for the realization of market generalization of the market.
Bright and clear and detail portrayal of a wide range of high purity sounds
  
MSH DRIVER is used by various sound companies such as Noble-M3, Itsfit-fusion, SHUOER- Tape / Singer, spear labs-triton 1
Their attractive sound tuning technology makes the MSH DRIVER even more brilliant.
  Magneto-static structure is patented and registered technology. EARBRIDGE Inc holds the following patents. 
High resolution sound conversion technology using Magneto-Static method-> 10.
Interchangeable module structure technology-> 2.
Dynamic ultra-slim high power sound conversion technology-> 2.
Spatially variable structure portable audio technology-> 1.
Wing membrane multi-function sound conversion technology-> 1.
Representative patent application and registration countries of Magneto-Static technology are Korea, USA, China, Europe and Japan, etc.
      

 
   
To make it easier to distinguish between right and left, we added a protrusion on the left.
Easily distinguish left and right even in dark environments.
There is no protrusion on the right side.
  Vegetable leather 
 Pueblo Leather
         Introduce 
Representatives and members of EARBRIDGE Inc have developed speakers from various companies such as Samsung, LG, Sony, and Philips for a long time, and through decades of research, development, and manufacturing, they have had various and rich experiences.
EARBRIDGE Inc aims to produce earphones that can combine colors, sound patterns, designs, etc. to suit individual tastes, and popularize ultra-high-resolution speaker structure technology that can reproduce the sound closest to the original sound.
We aim to grow into a company that can lead the ultra-high-definition earphone market through continuous research and development and efforts based on innovative technologies.
 EARBRIDGE Inc.

story:
Introducing to Bearfree OnPods

BearFree was born with the dream of  connecting the digital and natural world   through the sense of hearing. To achieve this, we developed a new device combining the best of today's hearing systems. The lightness and aesthetics of the TWS (True Wireless Stereo) in-ear headphones based on natural hearing, which limit during use, with the comfort and auditory permeability provided by bone conduction systems. For this, a new system is developed that by vibration stimulates the cartilage of the auditory pavilion called cartilaginous conduction that allows the headphone user to hear the surroundings while enjoying their favorite music or having a conversation by telephone. 

Conéctate al mundo (Vídeo en español)

 

    Opinions (Independent Influencer)

     

    Post de Rafa Rodriguez de ActualidadGadget:

    https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0/?tab=wm1#inbox...

     

    Preview de Paco Barcenas de PakiuReview:

    Preview deDavid Muñoz de PhoneBoyTecno:

    What is it?

    EarbudsTWS ( TrueWirelessStereo) on-ear. Allow maximum connection with your smartphone without isolating yourself from the environment. 

    • Patented system

    • 4 ultralight 3.5g earbuds
    • Bluetooth 5.0 TWS PLUS
    • IP68 Water Resistant
    • Voice control: SIRI, Google
    • Advanced controls: +/- ► / ‖
    • Autonomy of more than 20h
    • Inductive charge
    • Ergonomic Fit

    How does it work?

    New cartilaginous conduction hearing technology

    Cartilaginous conduction technology allows you to hear the sounds of the environment.

    Air conduction (Pink): natural hearing, sound waves travel through the ear canal, passing through the middle ear, to the inner ear.

    Bone conduction (Blue): vibrations are transmitted through the bone (avoiding the middle ear) to the inner ear.

    Cartilaginous conduction (Green): the vibrations travel through the cartilage to the eardrum where they meet and follow the same path of natural hearing.

    Placement and fixation

    OnPods is placed on the back of the auditory pavilion and fixed with a magnet on the front

    Explanation Video (audio in Spanish)

     

    Advantage

    • Lets hear the surroundings

    • Great discretion, almost invisible 
    • Great comfort, free ear canal
    • Sharper bass
    • Does not cause hearing damage
    • Reduces the risk of infections and wax plugs

    ​

    Advanced touch control

    Voice control: OkGoogle/SIRI

     

    Patented system

    Prototypes

    2.0 prototype

    • Mono sound
    • 3 hours of autonomy
    • Bluetooth 5.0
    • Answer calls
    • Easy USB charging
    • Stop / start playback

    3.0 prototype 

    • Stereo sound
    • Bluetooth 5.0
    • Advanced controls: +/- ► / ‖
    • Receiving Calls
    • SIRI connection, Google Assistant
    • 3000 mA portable charging

    4.0 prototype 

    Big success

    Approaching  the final objective

    12% weight reduction only 5g

    Maximum volume increase 10%

    63dB maximum output

    More information on my YouTube channel: 

    Explanation prototype 4.0 (audio in Spanish)

     

    Technical specifications

story:
Most guitarists agree that their fretting hand is more developed than their picking hand so Pickatto was designed to bring accountability back to the picking hand. When humans can see their efforts in numbers it becomes easier to set and meet goals which is the premise for Pickatto and why it is like a Fitbit for a guitar player.



Last time we checked guitarists use two hands to play.  So why is every training tool and exercise designed for developing the fretting hand?





See how you measure up for the day and know how close you are to hitting your daily and weekly goals.

Why count plucks?  It takes millions and millions of repetitions to develop the picking hand.  The easiest way of measuring huge numbers is simply to count them to have a numerical goal each day(similar to a bracelet that counts steps).  Stephan Curry has a goal to shoot 500 three pointers in practice each day so do you think that is part of the reason he is the best shooter in the NBA?

Why show up and down strokes in percentages?  A new player shouldn't even know what an upstroke is and should be taking 100% down-strokes during the first couple weeks.  The upstrokes are slowly integrated over time and most intermediate and advanced players will fall around 60/40.


Why measure pressure?  The secret to building speed and endurance in the picking hand is with a relaxed hand.  The pressure EXERTED BY THE PLAYER ON THE PICK can show when a player's hand is tensing up and squeezing too hard.  There are also articles about tendinitis being developed over many years of over squeezing the pick so Pickatto can make players aware of this instantly.


"The Speed Challenge" Requested by many guitarists who have tried the pick.  If you go into the "red" which means your picking hand is tensing up, it shuts down the challenge so be aware of this when trying to achieve the gold star.

Have you ever noticed that every guitar training tool focuses on improving the fretting hand?  Every feature and design in the software is intended to help make you a better and more consistent player while focusing on making picking hand repetition as perfect as possible.  At the price of 2 or 3 guitar lessons, Pickatto is affordable and worth it for a guitarist of any level to take his or her playing to the next level.

To get from the handmade prototype to the final production model is why we need your help.



"If you use Pickatto each time you practice and set tough, but obtainable goals each day this product WILL make your picking hand more consistent and reliable." 

- Brad Egler





CEO and inventor, Michael Murawski, demonstrating the first prototype at our booth at the Anaheim NAMM show which is the largest music convention in the world.

“I have devoted the last year of my life to this project and believe this will revolutionize how guitarists practice. As a guitar player of 25 years, I know how ambiguous it is to “make sure you practice an hour a day” because each player can accomplish something different during that hour. The new age of learning any instrument is trending toward “quantified musician” technology to make practice time more efficient and goal oriented; Pickatto is right in line with this way of thinking.” 

- Michael Murawski



The Pittsburgh Tribune Review - "The software is really accurate."

NARIP - "Many incredible inventions were featured throughout the convention but the most innovative was the Pickatto."

InCommunity - Spring 2016 - "A measure of music"

guitarplayer.com - "But to date no pick has been able to provide guitarists with any data about their playing. Pickatto hopes to change that."

musicradar.com - "Countless picks come through these hallowed doors - some are designed as learning aids, others claim to revolutionise the plectrum, but the Bluetooth-enabled Pickatto aims to do both."



  • Thinnest battery that can be produced
  • Smallest tech that exists to produce the most practical pick possible
  • Custom shape to maximize comfort while still housing a USB port.
  • App is free for iOS and Android devices

Pickatto barely weighs more than your average pick but that is what is great about it. The extra weight is the same concept as a batter warming up in the on deck circle with a weighted "donut" on his bat so when he takes it off and approaches the plate the bat feels lighter and easier to swing. 


- Silo Ornelas

Pickatto's first sponsored guitarist


- Art Machuca

Singer, songwriter, and guitar player.


"As someone who loves to get back to basics to improve skills, like working on the bad wrist break in my golf swing, this pick immediately made me recognize that I hold a guitar pick incorrectly. Just like my natural tensity screws up my golf swing, the death grip I put on the pick became immediately evident through the software"

- Greg Vaslowski‎

Part-time guitar and bass player


"Great tool for anyone looking to improve their overall picking technique."

- Chad Koza

Guitar player and music store sales associate




"If you understand the importance of having goals to improve at anything in life.... Then you need this pick to become a better player!" 
- Dan Ising




  • Michael Murawski - CEO - Schooled in music theory with 25 years of guitar playing experience as well as 16 years as a customer service specialist.
  • Brad Egler - Distinguished technologist with 20 years designing and developing software for Fortune 500 companies.
  • Dan Ising - 12 years of product development & project management with a focus on pricing and branding strategies as well trade show execution.



I am not interested in purchasing an item but would like to make a contribution to help see this product succeed.  How do I do that?

At the top of the campaign page there is a "Back it" button that you can select and then type in the amount you would like to contribute.  Thank you for your support.

Can I use this pick on other instruments?

Yes, Pickatto will work on any stringed instrument that a plectrum can be used on.

Will this pick work for guitarists that pick with their left hand?

The “wing” was placed strategically to accommodate right-handed players since that covers 90% of guitarists. The pick will work for left-handed players but the shape of the pick might feel a little awkward and it will be up to the player to decide for themselves. We have future plans to produce a limited amount of picks with the wing at the top right of the pick that will be more accommodating to left-handed players.

When will I receive my product?

The T-shirts will ship approximately 5 weeks after the campaign ends.

Much like all other crowdfunding campaigns that average 4-9 months after the campaign ends to receive the product, we are no different. The company that will be producing the final production model estimates total completion in November so this is perfect timing to order a Pickatto as a Christmas gift.

Will my pick wear down? 

Picks inevitably wear down over time but some plastics are much more effective in preventing wear. The polycarbonate plastic we will be using is incredibly hard to wear down and also sounds great against the strings.

What is the money that is raised used on?

Funds are used for a few different things: 

  • Building the best production model possible with help from the company we trust.  The first model of state of the art, micro technology is very expensive and that is why WE NEED YOUR HELP to make this happen.
  • Manufacturing thousands of units to fill all of the orders placed on Indiegogo as well as shipping them. 
  • Printing enough shirts to fill all of the orders and shipping them. 
  • The remaining funds going to advertising during the campaign and our U.S. patent application filing since we currently only have a filing date.

What is some additional info on the prototype?

For the person that would like to own a piece of history involving a product that will revolutionize how guitarists develop their picking hand. Two prototypes were used at the 2016 NAMM convention for hundreds of guitarists to test and try out. These signed prototypes will be shipped in November.

What’s the additional info on the Skype session?

We are very excited about this perk. You will be one of the first guitarists to have a Skype session while you can see each others’ Pickatto stats in live time. You can decide on the musical material covered during the 45min session. Silo is an accomplished guitar instructor who lives in California and is Pickatto’s first sponsored guitarist. You can read his bio and see him play at siloguitar.com. Challenge him during your session to the Speed Challenge and take him down!!

What does the T-Shirt look like?


We will be using Hanes tagless shirts (100% pre-shrunk cotton) in men’s (S-3XL) and women’s (S-3XL) styles. 

Size Chart - Mens

Size Chart - Womens

The color choices are: 

  • Men’s – White, Ash(light gray), and Denim Blue
  • Women’s – White, Light Blue, and Pink

What does the sticker look like?




Email Us
Follow us on social media!
Facebook

Twitter

Instagram

story:
Introducing Riverwood Acoustics

 

Quality meets style

Our flagship Hi-Fi speaker  has been engineered to produce unparalleled sound while being a visual statement. We use 100% reclaimed birch Riverwood to create a natural acoustic response and clarity. The specialized high efficiency 3" full-range drivers and bottom-coupled passive radiators generate audio precision and harmony.  All this power in a compact 12x6x6" cabienent. 

"Acoustic Perfection" 

 

Check out our reviews from audiophiles and musicians. 

"Sounds Incredible!" - Bruce Croxon (Round13, Dragons Den, BNN)

" I HAD THE PRIVILEGE OF HEARING WHAT COULD VERY WELL BE THE BEST SOUNDING SPEAKER EVER " - STEWART WISEMAN (APT613.CA)

Historic Eco-Timber

Over a century ago, the Ottawa River was used to float logs downstream as transportation to ship to the world.  Many of these logs  sank during their voyage and have been preserved at the bottom of the river.  These heritage logs are superior to today's timber since they grew hundreds of years ago in ideal light/temperature conditions, causing a tighter annual ring density and stronger/low resonant wood.  Why cut down new forests when we can reclaim these unique pieces of history?

We are passionate about both high-quality audio and our environment.  Founders, Ben Seaman and Scott Rathwell, are both raising families on the beautiful Ottawa river, which has brought them together as good friends and now business partners.  In their spare time they are often found outdoors with their families.

Ben (Electrical/Acoustical) and Scott (Mechanical) combined, offer 30 years of engineering and product management expertise, giving them the ability to drive perfection into their design.  Ben's past design experience on award winning speakers, such as Definitive Technology and Golden Ear flagship speakers has provided him with the skills necessary to produce superior speaker that surpasses acoustic expectations.

We have merged the HIFI sound quality expected by audiophiles and integrated the convenience of bluetooth to create a speaker that people will showcase in their home for years  to come.  Each speaker has a unique stunning grain pattern and will be a statement piece in any surrounding.  We formed Riverwood Acoustics because we demanded a home speaker with serious sound and style..

Funding Target

We are using crowdfunding for pre-sales of our home wireless speaker.  Here is our setup and pilot production run costing breakdown.

  • Company production infrastructure setup
  • Material cost (Premium solid birch River wood)
  • Assembly cost (Handcrafted in Canada)
  • Tooling and machining cost
  • FCC and UL/CSA approvals testing

The Impact

Not only will you receive a premium solid wooden wireless speaker but you will help change the world, here is how:

  • Reclaimed River wood creates a solid non-resonance, non-toxic speaker enclosure.
  • We source our timber from the Ottawa River to minimizes our carbon footprint. We pay a premium price for this wood but when you see and feel its historic grain, you will understand why.
  • Handcrafted locally in Canada to help generate local jobs.
  • We partner with WaterRangers.ca to provide funding for youth waterway testing and education, as a way for us to give back to our community.

Risks & Challenges

Our biggest program risk is manufacturing our product within proper cost controls.  All the components we used in our design are high-end, causing a high bill of material cost.  We are working with suppliers to buy in volume to minimize impact.

We have already built 6 working prototypes and are confident in our industrial design and sound quality.  Check out our website for independent reviews and more detailed specifications

Please help back this project and own a piece of history.

Timeline

Check us out in the news:

http://apt613.ca/old-growth-timber-speakers/

https://twitter.com/bruce_croxon/status/930792750680743936

http://www.insidehook.com/nation/riverwood-acoustics-speakers-home-audio

https://www.insideottawavalley.com/news-story/7622886-hortons-riverwood-acoustics-launches-new-bluetooth-speakers/
story_txt:
Introducing Riverwood Acoustics


 
Quality meets style
Our flagship Hi-Fi speaker  has been engineered to produce unparalleled sound while being a visual statement. We use 100% reclaimed birch Riverwood to create a natural acoustic response and clarity. The specialized high efficiency 3" full-range drivers and bottom-coupled passive radiators generate audio precision and harmony.  All this power in a compact 12x6x6" cabienent. 


"Acoustic Perfection" 

 
Check out our reviews from audiophiles and musicians. 

"Sounds Incredible!" - Bruce Croxon (Round13, Dragons Den, BNN)




" I HAD THE PRIVILEGE OF HEARING WHAT COULD VERY WELL BE THE BEST SOUNDING SPEAKER EVER " - STEWART WISEMAN (APT613.CA)
Historic Eco-Timber
Over a century ago, the Ottawa River was used to float logs downstream as transportation to ship to the world.  Many of these logs  sank during their voyage and have been preserved at the bottom of the river.  These heritage logs are superior to today's timber since they grew hundreds of years ago in ideal light/temperature conditions, causing a tighter annual ring density and stronger/low resonant wood.  Why cut down new forests when we can reclaim these unique pieces of history?
We are passionate about both high-quality audio and our environment.  Founders, Ben Seaman and Scott Rathwell, are both raising families on the beautiful Ottawa river, which has brought them together as good friends and now business partners.  In their spare time they are often found outdoors with their families.
Ben (Electrical/Acoustical) and Scott (Mechanical) combined, offer 30 years of engineering and product management expertise, giving them the ability to drive perfection into their design.  Ben's past design experience on award winning speakers, such as Definitive Technology and Golden Ear flagship speakers has provided him with the skills necessary to produce superior speaker that surpasses acoustic expectations.

We have merged the HIFI sound quality expected by audiophiles and integrated the convenience of bluetooth to create a speaker that people will showcase in their home for years  to come.  Each speaker has a unique stunning grain pattern and will be a statement piece in any surrounding.  We formed Riverwood Acoustics because we demanded a home speaker with serious sound and style..

Funding Target

We are using crowdfunding for pre-sales of our home wireless speaker.  Here is our setup and pilot production run costing breakdown.

Company production infrastructure setup
Material cost (Premium solid birch River wood)
Assembly cost (Handcrafted in Canada)
Tooling and machining cost
FCC and UL/CSA approvals testing


The Impact
Not only will you receive a premium solid wooden wireless speaker but you will help change the world, here is how:

Reclaimed River wood creates a solid non-resonance, non-toxic speaker enclosure.
We source our timber from the Ottawa River to minimizes our carbon footprint. We pay a premium price for this wood but when you see and feel its historic grain, you will understand why.
Handcrafted locally in Canada to help generate local jobs.
We partner with WaterRangers.ca to provide funding for youth waterway testing and education, as a way for us to give back to our community.



Risks & Challenges
Our biggest program risk is manufacturing our product within proper cost controls.  All the components we used in our design are high-end, causing a high bill of material cost.  We are working with suppliers to buy in volume to minimize impact.
We have already built 6 working prototypes and are confident in our industrial design and sound quality.  Check out our website for independent reviews and more detailed specifications
Please help back this project and own a piece of history.
Timeline

Check us out in the news:
http://apt613.ca/old-growth-timber-speakers/
https://twitter.com/bruce_croxon/status/930792750680743936
http://www.insidehook.com/nation/riverwood-acoustics-speakers-home-audio
https://www.insideottawavalley.com/news-story/7622886-hortons-riverwood-acoustics-launches-new-bluetooth-speakers/

story:
As you already know Apple's new earphones are wireless so there is a bigger chance to lose them. We thought you need something which will not allow you to do such a horrible thing. At least they cost $159. Also they have really short battery life. So we solved that problem too. You can secure your expensive AirPods from being lost by this cheap holder. You can charge them while listening to music with this small and effective charger. Also it's really beautiful!

Exploded view

 

Other advantages?

CRPods help you put off your AirPods and talk to someone and after that remember EXACTLY where are your AirPods even after a very long conversation. You could forget it right?

How it works?

The screen of earring is covered by a solar panel which passes energy to LTC3588 chip. Chip converts energy to direct current (DC) and charges you AirPods.

Where the project stands?

We have successfully developed and tested the power of solar panel covered by transparent plastic. We don’t foresee major issues in materializing the production. The next step is to make contract with earring manufacturers to have "safe to wear" earrings.

story:
More details




























*A.I = Artificial Intelligence

(Site en français)


Today, receiving information at the right time has become an important standard for saving time. 

That's why we've created an object that predicts all of your daily wishes and that marries your smartphone, connected objects, speakers, and remote for a more intelligent and quicker use. 

With MYShinzo, you have a wide range of features at your fingertips in order to not only indulge your passion for music, among others, but to also, and especially, control your home (a truly smart home).

MYShinzo connects to your speakers to stream music via WiFi.  

It's equipped with high quality WiFi audio streaming in order to update your existing hi-fi setup and speakers.

It syncs music from your smartphone or the Cloud with compatible devices from anywhere in your house.

The music played automatically by MYShinzo will always be your genre of music, and at other times a mix of the musical genres of all the MYShinzo users in the same room.

MYShinzo's artificial intelligence also uses your speakers to communicate vocally with you.

MYShinzo is constantly analyzing TV programs in order to suggest the show that you want at the appropriate time.  

All you need to do is settle down on your couch, the TV will turn on and automatically switch to the channel of your favorite show.


MYShinto boosts your WiFi's power! No more need for your guests to enter codes to connect to Wi-Fi. All you need to do is tell MYShinzo, who can access your setup, and the application will give your guests access when they arrive.


With the help of MYShinzo's multi-sensors, you'll live in a healthier house! It measures the temperature, humidity, and noise for your inner well-being.  

MYShinzo also monitors the weather outside in real time and will let you know before you leave so you can make sure you're wearing suitable clothing (umbrella, coat, etc.). It will also suggest the best method of transportation and can even call an Uber for you.


It's compatible with all connected objects that use the AllJoyn framework and protocols like BACnet or Z-Wave with AllJoyn Device System Bridge (DSB).

     



Why have we created MYShinzo ?

Before anything else, we wanted to change our way of interacting with daily electronic objects with a simple and intelligent app that everyone can use easily.

According to Garner, a typical house will have 500 connected objects in 2022.

So we created MYShinzo to bring together all of the features of the applications that control these connected objects in one single app that's easy to use. 

Through an interface that everyone knows, text messaging apps, MYShinzo allows you to control connected objects with predefined text messages (turn on the TV, the lights, make me a coffee, etc.). 

Since MYShinzo is intelligent, you won't even need your smartphone to control your connected objects anymore–MYShinzo's artificial intelligence takes care of it all.




We want to provide you with a quality product that's capable of controlling the greatest number of connected objects on the market. To do so, we're working with the best partners.

Hi Indiegogo, my name is Tahina Rabetsitonta. I'm a .NET Developer (Microsoft Certified Solutions Developer).  

After winning several application development and IoT competitions with my team, organized by Microsoft France and BeMyApp (the Versailles award for Pollen Alert to Devkings in 2013, Nokia Lumia award to Publish in 2014, and this year, the 1st prize for Smartcube to Zone61), today I want to launch a start-up that creates extraordinary objects.

I've always dreamed of an artificial intelligence like JARVIS in Iron Man, so I began to develop MYShinzo to change our way of interacting with the world. MYShinzo is still in its early stages, and I've planned plenty of awesome things for the years to come in order to offer you an exceptional product. Thanks to you, this project may be able to come to life somewhere else than in my living room!

The funds collected will mainly allow us to finance production.

LinkedIn



We're aware that our product incorporates several brilliant features, but also needs a great deal of work. We've given ourselves a large margin of time to ensure the timely delivery of MYShinzo. Even if setbacks may occur, we will always do everything possible to offer you a product with a great deal of added value. We're confident that you will have MYShinzo before the date indicated.

Security and privacy

MYShinzo uses your data, to become more intelligent and to offer you a quality service. Your information will be used with respect and never shared with third parties without your autorisation.

You can delete all your data at anytime on MYShinzo. You control who has access to your installation. You can also authorise automatic personalisation of your devices whenever you have a guest.

MYShinzo's brain works even when you're disconnected. You can always control your heating system, alarm system, and everything else from your phone - in offline mode.

Your privacy is very important to us. Since our goal is to also create a unique technology, you can activate "offline mode" at any time and your information will never be sent to our servers.

Instead, your data stays on your device in your home - which means that MYShinzo becomes much more secure and completely private.

Accompanied by "Pépinière Microsoft France"
Press kit

story:
Short Summary

I am a hybrid designer who are interested in enhacing the ability of people. I am going to graduated from a Double-mastered course about innovation design at Royal College of art and Imperial College London.

This project aims transform people's bodymovement into sound engineering, make the creativity creative.SoundEngineering(SE-1) allows user to making electronic music by body moving. With using several high sensitivity distance sensors and a joystick, the SE-1 could make the process of edit music a better experience. Adding beats, effects are available now. As basing on open source platform, SE-1 allows users to develop it with electronic develop kits.

The SE-1 has three main features now
-Changing the effect of sound and a piece of music
-Adding beats to a music project
Both the features are available in music-making and performance

What We Need & What You Get

The fund will go in to develop the prototype and make it a well-founded product. OEM production, marketing test, branding and the user experience will be developed with the fund. And for the further promotion, there will be also next generation product and different type of product facing to different target customers.

Further Testing and develop--13500 GBP

OEM production--18800 GBP

Marketing Test-- 8000 GBP

Branding --12000 GBP

Other Cost( Material, Oversea post....)--2500 GBP

Total-------54800 GBP

 

The perk is a early bird chance to get this innovative piece. The product will sell as 170-220 GBP. If the project do not meet the goal, every one donate over 50 GBP will get a refund by a rate(cause the project may under further development) and a gift related to this project. I hope my project will become a success like the Pocket Operator of Teenage Engineering. While my product will lead the way of creativity and bring the music experience to a new era.

Any ideas and tueorials are welcome, and if you from a professional in sound, engineering and design, welcome to refresh my mind and take the project further.

Thanks everyone who are curious about the future and love music
